Susie Gharib , born in 1950 , is an award - winning business news journalist .
Frédéric Sanchez ( born 23 September 1966 ) is a French sound artist and music producer , best known for his career in the fashion industry .
Mohammed Salem Saleh Al Saadi ( Arabic : محمد سالم صالح الساعدي‎ ; born 28 October 1982 ) , is an Emirati footballer who currently plays as a Midfielder for Al Ain FC .
Jean Wills ( 1924 - ) is a model ( person ) who became Miss Southern California of 1948 and Mrs. Southern California of 1949 .
Hal Roth ( 1927 -- October 18 , 2008 ) was an American sailor and author .
Sunday Abalo ( born 14 May 1995 ) is a Nigerian footballer who plays for Rio Ave .
Phoebe Washburn ( born 1973 ) is an American installation artist who lives and works in New York . Washburn is best known for producing large - scale installations : assemblages of garbage , detritus , cardboard , scrap wood , and , more recently , organic matter such as sod or plants .
Frank Ullrich ( born 24 January 1958 ) is a German former biathlete and current trainer of the German national team .
Harish Chandra Mukherjee ( Bengali : হরিশ্চন্দ্র মুখোপাধ্যায় ) ( 1824 -- 1861 ) , was an Indian journalist and patriot , who fought tooth and nail for the indigo cultivators ( and against the indigo planters ) and forced the government to bring about changes .
Agnes de Lima ( 1887 - -1974 ) was an American journalist and writer on education .
Wyatt Mason ( born 1969 ) is an American journalist , essayist , critic and translator .
Zhu Yongxin ( Chinese:朱永新 ; born August 1958 ) is the deputy secretary general of 12th of Chinese People 's Political Consultative Conference , the vice chairman of China Association for Promoting Democracy , vice president of Chinese Society of Education ( CSE ) .
Aboud El Khodary ( 27 November 1947 ) is an Egyptian former footballer who played most of his career for Al - Masry .
Ketil Gudim ( born 6 November 1956 ) is a Norwegian dancer and actor .
Marco Sansovini ( born 17 June 1980 ) is an Italian footballer who plays as a striker for Italian Serie B club Pescara .
Roswell Gardinier Benedict ( 9 December 1815 -- 5 February 1859 ) was a civil engineer by profession and became involved in land development and the manufacturing of rolling stock for railways .
Pascale Schnider ( born 18 October 1984 in Flühli ) is a former Swiss road and track racing cyclist .
Uri Alon ( born 1969 ) is a Professor and Systems Biologist at the Weizmann Institute of Science .
Paul Farbrace ( born 7 July 1967 ) is a former English First - Class cricketer , and is currently England assistant cricket coach following Peter Moores 's sacking .
Rabbi Pinchas David Horowitz , ( 1876 -- November 28 , 1941 ) was a Hasidic rebbe and the founder of the Boston Hasidic dynasty , one of the first Hasidic courts in America .
Mervyn Travers ( born on 9 October 1985 ) is an Irish sportsperson who formly played Gaelic football for Wicklow Senior Football Championship club AGBFC and the Wicklow senior team since making his debut in 2007.In 2010 in a match vs Westmeath Mervyn ruptured his patellar and broke his knee cap .
Orlando Hubbs ( 18 February 1840 - 5 December 1930 ) was a skilled carriage builder , ship 's joiner and politician .
Jack Marsh ( c. 1874 -- 25 May 1916 ) was an Australian first - class cricketer of Australian Aboriginal descent who represented New South Wales in six matches from 1900 - -01 to 1902 - -03 .
Liam Cort ( born in 1989 ) is a basketball player for the Milton Keynes Lions , an English basketball team .
Richard Raine Barker ( 29 May 1869 -- 1 October 1940 ) was an English football player who played for England in 1895 .
John A. Smolin ( born 1967 ) is an American physicist and Fellow of the American Physical Society at IBM 's Thomas J. Watson Research Center .
Regis Ghezelbash ( born in 1951 in Tehran ) is a Paris - based documentary creator , a feature film animator and live action director and producer .
István Plattkó also known as Esteban Platko ( 1898 -- 1966 ) was a Hungarian football player and manager who coached Real Valladolid , Granada CF , CD Atlético Baleares and RCD Mallorca in Spain .
Jacques de Bela ( 15 February 1586 -- 28 May 1667 ) was a French - basque lawyer and writer in basque language , born at Mauléon .
Peter Jenni , ( born 17 April 1948 ) is an experimental particle physicist working at CERN .
Vivekrao Vasanthrao Patil ( born 1956 ) is an Indian politician , educationalist , author and an industrialist .
Cecil Reginald Burch , FRS ( 12 May 1901 -- 19 July 1983 ) was a British physicist and engineer .
Christopher Fabian ( krɪstəfər feıbıən ) ( @hichrisfabian on Twitter ) ( born April 18 , 1980 ) is a technologist and innovator who co - leads UNICEF 's Innovation Unit alongside Erica Kochi .
Qin Yi ( Chinese : 秦怡 ; Wade -- Giles : Ch'in I ; born 31 January 1922 ) is a Chinese film and drama actress .
Stanisław Stadnicki ( c. 1551 , Nowy Żmigród or Dubiecko -- 1610 , Tarnawiec ) , a Polish nobleman , Lord Starosta of Żygwulsko ( Sigulda ) , a known troublemaker , called ' the Devil of Łańcut ' ( Polish : diabeł łańcucki ) for his violent behaviour .
Claudia Reinhardt ( born 1964 ) is a contemporary German photographer .
Herman T. Schladermundt ( 1863 - -1937 ) was a notable American artist known for murals and stained glass .
Jordan Harrison ( born 1977 ) is a playwright based in Brooklyn , New York .
Michel Callon ( born 1945 ) is a Professor of Sociology at the École des mines de Paris and member of the Centre de sociologie de l'innovation .
Kay Gardner ( born 1927 ) , was a municipal politician in Toronto , Ontario .
Samet Hasan Yıldıran ( born 19 September 1992 ) is a Turkish footballer who plays for Aksaray 1989 SK .
Amiram Levin ( Hebrew : עמירם לוין‎ ; born 7 July 1946 ) is a retired Aluf ( Major General , res . ) who was commander of the IDF Northern Command .
Friedrich Jacobsohn ( born 1894 ) was a German urologist and writer on sex .
Kimberly Rivera ( born c. 1982 ) is an Iraq war resister and former U.S. Army Private First Class who went AWOL in February 2007 after a year of service .
Frank E. Eulner ( born 1963 ) is a sound editor who is also a member of Skywalker Sound .
Lucas Jakubczyk ( born 28 April 1985 ) is a German athlete who competes in the sprint and long jump with a personal best time of 10.07 seconds at the 100 metres event .
Timothy Ray Brown ( born 1966 ) is an American considered to be the first person cured of HIV / AIDS .
Katica Ivanišević ( born 11 January 1935 in Omišalj ) is a retired Croatian university professor and politician .
Maroš Kolpak ( born 23 March 1971 in Prešov , Czechoslovakia ) is a Slovak handball goalkeeper and coach .
Jane Wattenberg ( born 1949 ) is an American author , photographer , and illustrator of books for children .
Joris Oprins ( born 1980 , Tilburg ) is an Academy Award nominated animation director .
Chris Nickson ( born 1954 ) is a British novelist , music journalist , and biographer .
Anagnostis Striftombolas ( Greek : Αναγνώστης Στριφτόμπολας , 1778 - -1821 ) was a Greek revolutionary leader .
Norman Hitchcock ( born circa 1929 in Oklahoma -- died August 28 , 2006 in Oklahoma City , Oklahoma ) was an American Pool player .
Liam Burns ( born 30 October 1978 ) is a Northern Irish former professional footballer who played as a centre - back .
Alberto Ibargüen ( born February 29 , 1944 ) is President and CEO of the John S. and James L. Knight Foundation in Miami , Florida .
Halima Begum ( Bengali : হালিনা বেগম ; born 18 October 1975 ) is a British civil servant , international development professional and Director Education of East Asia at the British Council .
Richard A. Lanham ( born 1936 ) is probably most widely known for his textbooks on revising prose to improve style and clarify thought .
Zhang Baixi ( simplified Chinese : 张百熙 ; traditional Chinese : 張百熙 ; pinyin : Zhāng Bǎixī ; Courtesy Yěqiū ( 埜秋 ) ; Posthumous name : Wéndá ( 文達 ) ) ( 1847 -- March 30 , 1907 ) was a Chinese government official during the late Qing Dynasty who is known for initializing the education reform .
Nikos Pourtoulidis ( Greek : Νίκος Πορτουλίδης ; born 7 October 1983 ) is a Greek footballer who plays for Iraklis in the Greek Football League .
Tacumwah ( c. 1720 -- c. 1790 ) , alternate spelling `` Taucumwah '' , aka Marie - Louise Pacanne Richerville ( Richardville ) , was a businesswoman and prominent chieftess of the Miami tribe .
Azotti was born in Kiev , Ukraine , on 23 February 1985 , and grew up in Litky ( a small village on the outskirts of Kiev ) .
Jérémie Galland ( born 8 April 1983 ) is a French former professional road cyclist , who competed as a professional between 2007 and 2013 .
Charles Richard Crane ( 1858 - -1939 ) was a wealthy American businessman , heir to a large industrial fortune and connoisseur of Arab culture , a noted Arabist .
Mauro Di Francesco ( born 17 May 1951 ) is an Italian actor , comedian and television personality .
Moustafá Moustafá ( Greek : Μουσταφά Μουσταφά ; born 1955 ) is a Greek politician of Turkish descent .
Dawn Olivieri ( born on 8 February 1981 ) is an American actress , model and voice actress who has appeared in a number of television shows and feature films .
Constantinos Decavallas ( born 1925 Athens ) is a Greek modernist architect .
Charles Clinton ( 1690 -- 19 November 1773 ) was an Anglo - Irish soldier in colonial America .
Noralma Vera Arrata ( born 28 August 1936 ) is a former Ecuadorian prima ballerina and choreographer .
Govind Das Richharia ( born 26 February 1920 ) was a leader of Indian National Congress .
Roman Bugaj ( born 9 August 1973 ) is a Polish heavyweight boxer .
Karin Astrid Maria Hjulström ( born 31 August 1963 ) , better known as Carin Hjulström , is a Swedish television presenter , journalist and author .
Karen Farley ( born 2 September 1970 ) is a former English women 's international footballer .
David Zwilling ( born 24 August 1949 ) is an Austrian former alpine skier and world champion .
Barry Goldin ( born 24 July 1978 ) is a BriSCA Formula 2 Stock Cars racing driver from Bolton , Greater Manchester who races under number 401 .
Paul Ghalioungui or Ghalioungi ( 1908 - -1987 ) ( Arabic : بول غليونجي‎ ) , MD ( Cairo ) , MRCP ( Lond ) , Professor of Medicine and former Chairman of Internal Medicine department , Ain Shams University Faculty of Medicine .
Basanta Regmi ( first name also spelled as Basant ) ( Nepali : वसन्त रेग्मी ) ( born 6 April 1986 ) is a Nepalese cricketer .
Arno Funke ( born 14 March 1950 ) , alias Dagobert , is a reformed German extortionist , now an author .
Sajad Abarghouei Nejad ( born on 17 September 1987 ) in Isfahan is a footballer .
Fiona Thornewill ( born 10 July 1966 ) is an English explorer who reached the South Pole solo and unaided in a record 42 days in 2004 , walking and skiing over 700 miles in the process .
John Schoonraad ( born 2 October 1952 ) is a life - cast and special effects artist and has more than 2000 lifecasts under his belt throughout his 30 year career .
Amos Tutuola ( 20 June 1920 -- 8 June 1997 ) was a Nigerian writer famous for his books based in part on Yoruba folk - tales .
Kayne Tremills ( born 23 January 1987 ) is an Australian television presenter best known for his role as a host on Australian children 's television programme Studio 3 , which is broadcast on ABC3 .
Lula Galvão ( born Luiz Guilherme Farias Galvão in 1962 in Brasilia ) is a Brazilian guitarist .
Neville Gruzman , AM ( 1925 -- 1 May 2005 ) was an Australian architect , mayor of Woollahra , writer and architectural activist .
John Walter Guerrier Lund CBE FRS ( 27 November 1912 - March 21 , 2015 ) was an English phycologist .
Jargalsaikhany Enkhbayar ( Mongolian : Жаргалсайханы Энхбаяр ; born 31 July 1977 ) is a Mongolian international footballer .
Judy Dan ( Chinese : 但茱迪 ) ( born 1931 ) is a Chinese - American actress .
The eldest son of William Munk , an ironmonger , and his wife Jane Kenward , he was born on 24 September 1816 at Battle , Sussex , and after education at University College , London , graduated M.D. at the University of Leiden in 1837 .
Friedrich von Hausen ( Middle High German : Friderich von Hûsen ) was a mediaeval German poet , one of the earliest of the Minnesingers ; born some time between 1150 - -60 ; d. 6 May 1190 .
Christopher John Millar ( born 30 July 1955 ) , known by his stage name Rat Scabies , is a musician best known for his tenure as the drummer for The Damned .
Norman Burtenshaw ( born February 1926 ) is an English former football referee , who officiated in the English Football League and was also on the FIFA list .
Sergio María Ginés Jesús Hernández y Martinez ( born 1 July 1959 ) , known by his supporters as Gregory XVIII , is the current pope of the Palmarian Catholic Church .
Henk Nijhof ( born 8 April 1952 ) is a Dutch politician and former educator .
Alison Stephens ( 1 March 1970 -- 10 October 2010 ) was an English classical mandolin player and film musician .
Liu Qibao ( Chinese : 刘奇葆 ; pinyin : Liú Qíbǎo ; born January 1953 ) is a Chinese politician .
Alois Heldmann 's native town was Grevenbrück , 100 km eastern from Cologne , where he was born on 2 December 1895 .
Lidija Liepiņa ( Latvian pronunciation : ( ˈli.di.ja ˈli͡ɛ.pi.ɲa ) , Russian : Лидия Карловна Лепинь ; 4 April 1891 -- 4 September 1985 ) was a Latvian chemist , and one of the first women to receive a doctorate in chemistry in Russia .
Fr . Ivan Payne ( born August 1943 ) is an Irish Roman Catholic priest and convicted child molester .
Krisztián Lovassy ( Budapest , born 23 June 1988 . -- ) is a Hungarian road bicycle racer .
Sigrid Lorenzen Rupp ( 1943 -- May 27 , 2004 ) was a German - American architect .
Kane Brigg ( born 14 January 1988 ) is a retired Australian high jumper and triple jumper .
Iarfhlaith Davoren ( born 12 May 1986 ) is an Irish professional footballer who plays as a left back or left winger for Tulsa Roughnecks FC in the USL .
Peter Van Hooke ( born 6 April 1950 ) is a British rock drummer who was the drummer for the English band Mike + The Mechanics ( from 1985 to 1995 ) and also drummed for Van Morrison 's band , Headstone , and Ezio .
Master E. S. ( c. 1420 -- c. 1468 ; previously known as the Master of 1466 ) is an unidentified German engraver , goldsmith , and printmaker of the late Gothic period .
Philippe de Gaspé Beaubien , OC ( born 1928 ) , is a Canadian media proprietor , who was chairman and CEO of Telemedia .
Jochem Jacobs ( born 26 March 1977 ) is a Dutch guitarist , producer and recording engineer , noted for his work as founder , guitarist and producer for Textures .
Khalid Adem ( born 1975 ) is an Ethiopian American who was both the first person prosecuted and first person convicted for female genital mutilation ( FGM ) in the United States , stemming from charges that he had personally excised his 2-year - old daughter 's clitoris with a pair of scissors .
William Christopher Friley , known as W. C. Friley ( July 12 , 1845 -- April 11 , 1911 ) , was a Southern Baptist clergyman and college president .
Max Jeffers ( 14 November 1929 -- 29 January 1988 ) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Melbourne in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) .
Stephen Yenser ( born 1941 Wichita , Kansas ) is an American poet and literary critic who has published two acclaimed volumes of verse , as well as books on James Merrill , Robert Lowell , and an assortment of contemporary poets .
Paulo Carcasci ( Sao Paulo , 7 January 1964 ) is a former Brazilian racing driver .
Pierre Moukoko Mbonjo ( born 25 July 1954 ) is a Cameroonian politician who served in the government of Cameroon as Minister for External Relations from 2011 to 2015 .
Susan Christine O'Meara Getzendanner ( born 1939 ) is a former United States federal judge , and in 2013 was listed as a NAFTA adjudicator .
Richard Dumbrill ( born 19 November 1938 in Wandsworth , England ) is a former South African cricketer who played in five Tests from 1965 to 1966 .
Frederick William Nolan ( born 7 March 1931 in Liverpool ) is an English editor and writer , mostly known as Frederick Nolan ; he also uses the pen names Donald Severn , Daniel Rockfern , Christine McGuire , and Frederick H. Christian .
Paul Sharry ( born 14 January 1989 ) is a Westmeath Gaelic footballer .
Arthur Conlin ( 1883 - -1947 ) was a pioneer Australian rugby league footballer of the early 20th century .
Maurice Nicoll ( 19 July 1884 -- 30 August 1953 ) was a British psychiatrist , author and noted Fourth Way teacher .
Bruce Odland ( born 1952 in Milwaukee ) is a composer and sound artist known for public space sound installations .
Jan Jiraský ( born 1973 Vysoké Mýto ) is a Czech pianist and pedagogue .
Gino Peruzzi Lucchetti ( Spanish pronunciation : ( peˈruθi ) , locally : ( peˈrusi ) ; born 9 June 1992 ) is an Argentine footballer who plays as a right back for Boca Juniors in the Argentine First Division .
Majida El Roumi Baradhy ( Arabic : ماجدة الرومي برادعي‎ ; born 13 December 1956 ) is a Lebanese soprano .
Howard Merrill Shelley ( 1879 - 1956 ) was known primarily as a Philadelphia theater and opera personality .
Spencer Fearon ( born 20 December 1973 , London , England ) is a boxing promoter and media personality .
Antonio Franja ( born 8 June 1978 ) is a retired Croatian professional footballer who played as a left winger .
Nathaniel Foote ( 21 September 1592 -- 20 November 1644 ) , was an early English immigrant to Connecticut who was born in Colchester , England .
Gao Guangbin ( Chinese : 高广滨 ; born May 1963 ) is a Chinese politician , serving since 2015 as the Executive Vice Governor of Jilin and a member of the Jilin provincial Party Standing Committee .
Hermann Berthelsen ( born 2 March 1956 ) is a Greenlandic politician and affiliated with the Siumut party .
Nathaniel Lardner ( 6 June 1684 -- 24 July 1768 ) was an English theologian .
Vygantas Čekaitis ( 28 March 1961 - 22 June 2008 ) was a Lithuanian sprint canoer .
Tzeli Hadjidimitriou was born in Mytilene , Lesbos in 1962 from a family of primary school teachers .
Peyman Hooshmandzadeh ( born 1969 in Tehran ) is an Iranian photographer and author .
Mihajlo Zurković ( Serbian : Михајло Зурковић ; born 1978 ) is a Serbian pianist who was born in Sombor and completed elementary music school there .
Hannah England ( born 6 March 1987 ) is a British middle - distance running athlete who specialises in the 800 metres , 1500 metres and mile run .
Thomas Jeannerot ( born 30 March 1984 ) is a French professional athlete in parachuting .
Marc Stears ( born 1971 ) is a British political theorist , and Professor of Political Theory and Fellow of University College , Oxford .
Rajiv Ranjan Singh ( born 24 January 1955 ) is the Cabinet Minister for Road Construction and Science & Technology Departments in the Bihar Cabinet under Nitish Kumar .
Anri Matsumura ( born 21 June 1991 ) is a Japanese handball player who plays for the club Hiroshima Maple Reds .
Harri Mänty ( born 31 July 1971 in Västerås ) is a Swedish musician , brought up in Finland , who was a member of the Swedish pop - rock band Kent between 1996 and 2006 .
Warren Goodhind ( born 16 August 1977 ) is a South African professional footballer who last played as a right back for Thurrock .
Berthold Weisz a Hungarian deputy ; born at Budapest in 1845 .
Sun Yung Shin ( born 1974 ) is a Korean American poet , writer and educator living in Minneapolis , Minnesota .
Yannos Margaziotis ( born 1967 ) is a Greek violinist with a career as a soloist with several major orchestras and ensembles including the Greek National Opera Orchestra , the Athens State Orchestra , the Royal Danish Orchestra , and the Orchestra of Contemporary Music of the Hellenic Broadcasting Corporation .
Enam Ali , MBE , FIH , FRSA ( Bengali : এনাম আলি ; born 1 December 1960 ) is a Bangladeshi - born British businessman .
Vinesh Phogat ( born 25 August 1994 ) is an Indian wrestler who comes from a very successful background of wrestling with her cousins Geeta Phogat and Babita Kumari , both international wrestlers and Commonwealth Games medallists as well .
Peter Wollen ( born 29 June 1938 in London ) is a film theorist and writer .
Yani Tseng ( Chinese : 曾雅妮 Zēng Yǎní ; born 23 January 1989 ) is a Taiwanese professional golfer playing on the U.S .- based LPGA Tour .
Todd Payten ( born 18 January 1979 in Parramatta , New South Wales ) is a former Australian professional rugby league footballer and current assistant coach for the North Queensland Cowboys in the National Rugby League ( NRL ) .
João Tiago Oliveira Rodrigues ( born 15 March 1988 ) , simply known as Carela is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for Oliveirense mainly as a right back .
Elia Favilli ( born 31 January 1989 ) is an Italian professional road bicycle racer who rides for UCI World Tour team Lampre - Merida .
Shirley Bottolfsen ( born 12 February 1934 ) is an Irish woman who lives in Bodø , Norway .
Igor Bachner ( born 16 September 1946 ) is a retired Czechoslovak - born Canadian football player .
Samantha Bond ( born 27 November 1961 ) is an English actress , best known for her role as Miss Moneypenny in the James Bond films during the Pierce Brosnan years .
Kubilay Uygun ( born 1955 in Ankara ) is a former Turkish politician known for switching parties during his single term in parliament ( 1995 - 1999 ) .
Marta Tomac ( born 20 September 1990 ) is a Norwegian - Croatian handball player .
Takis Würger ( born 1985 ) is a German investigative journalist , author , war correspondent and staff writer for Der Spiegel , reporting from warzone locales such as Afghanistan , Libya , Ukraine , and throughout the Middle East .
Phylis Smith ( née Watt , born 29 September 1965 ) is a former sprinter from Great Britain who won an Olympic bronze medal in the 4 x 400 metres relay in Barcelona 1992 .
Shavit Elimelech ( Hebrew : שביט אלימלך‎ , born 7 September 1971 ) is a retired Israeli football goalkeeper .
Fanny Sanín Sader ( born 1938 ) is a Colombian born artist from Bogotá who resides in New York City .
Gavin Walsh ( born 1965 or 1966 ) is an Irish computer programmer , non - fiction writer , and collector of rare music memorabilia .
Elena Cué ( 1972 ) is a Spanish businesswoman , art expert and writer .
Delia Matache ( Romanian pronunciation : ( ˈdelia maˈtake ) , born 7 February 1982 ) , known by the stage name of Delia , is a famous Romanian eurobeat singer - songwriter , TV celebrity , dancer , philanthropist , former model , fashion designer , and coach from television music competition franchise X Factor .
Barbara Jacobs Rothstein ( born 1939 ) is a United States District Judge on senior status since September 1 , 2011 , having served on the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington from February 20 , 1980 .
Xue Yuanchao ( Chinese : 薛元超 ; 622 - -683 ) , formal name Xue Zhen ( 薛振 ) but went by the courtesy name of Yuanchao , formally Baron of Fenyin ( 汾陰男 ) , was an official of the Chinese Tang Dynasty who served as a chancellor during the reign of Emperor Gaozong .
Kenny Elissonde ( born 22 July 1991 ) is a French professional road cyclist , currently riding for FDJ .
Sam Sunderland ( born 15 April 1989 in Poole ) is a Dubai - based British rally raid motorcycle rider , best known for his participation in the Dakar Rally .
Amila Eranga ( full name Amila Eranga Witharana ; born 23 September 1986 ) is a Sri Lankan cricketer .
Ivana Španović ( Serbian Cyrillic : Ивана Шпановић , born 10 May 1990 ) is a Serbian long jumper , reigning European indoor champion .
Emilio Merino Lacoste ( born 3 February 1950 ) was the 35th Mayor of the commune of Pichilemu , office which he held between 1983 and 30 August 1984 , after being appointed by the military government of General Augusto Pinochet .
Matteo Liviero ( born 13 April 1993 ) is an Italian professional footballer who plays for Lecce , on loan from Juventus , as a left back or as a wide midfielder .
Ruth Stuber Jeanne ( née Stuber ; b. 13 May 1910 , Chicago ; d. 6 Apr. 2004 , Newark , Ohio ) was an American marimbist , percussionist , violinist , and arranger .
Guerin Austin ( /ˈɡɛrən ˈɔːstən/ ; born November 30 , 1980 ) is a television host , model and beauty queen from Seattle , Washington who has competed in the Miss USA pageant .
Belaynesh Oljira Jemama ( born 26 June 1990 ) is an Ethiopian long - distance runner who competes mainly in 10 K and half marathon races .
Takatsugu Uda ( born 25 October 1991 ) is a Japanese cross country skier .
Stewart McAllister ( 27 December 1914 -- 27 November 1962 ) was a British documentary film editor who collaborated closely with Humphrey Jennings during the Second World War to produce films for the Crown Film Unit of the Ministry of Information .
Trent Vanegas ( born 12 July 1974 ) is an American blogger from Michigan who is best known for his celebrity gossip blog , Pink is the New Blog ( PITNB for short ) , which he launched in 2004 .
Chris Bachelder ( born 1971 ) is an American writer , e - book pioneer and frequent contributor to the publications McSweeney 's Quarterly Concern and The Believer .
Jelena Lengold ( born 1959 in Kruševac ) is a Serbian poet , novelist and journalist .
Antigone Metaxa - Krontera ( Greek : Αντιγόνη Μεταξά-Κροντηρά ; 1905 - -1972 ) was a Greek children 's author .
Lonnie Dupre ( born 17 April 1961 ) is a contemporary Arctic explorer whose achievements include the first Pacific to Atlantic winter traversal of the Northwest Passage by dog sled in 1991 and the first human - powered circumnavigation of Greenland , by sled and kayak , in 2001 .
Sankho Chaudhuri ( 25 February 1916 -- 28 August 2006 ) was an Indian sculptor , a noted figure in the art scene of India .
Irinej Dobrijević ( Serbian Cyrillic : Иринеј Добријевић , English : Irenaeus Dobrijević ; United States , Cleveland 6 February 1955 ) is a Serbian Orthodox Bishop of Metropolitan of Australia and New Zealand .
William Dale Cardwell ( born 1962 in Greenville , Kentucky ) is a consumer investigator and television journalist based in Atlanta , Georgia .
Knut Bohwim ( born 12 March 1931 ) is a leading Norwegian film director .
Frank Swift Chase ( 12 March 1886 -- 3 July 1958 ) was an American Post - Impressionist landscape painter and a founder of the Woodstock Artists Association in Woodstock , New York , the art colony at Nantucket , Massachusetts , and the Sarasota School of Art in Florida .
Gene Petit ( May 19 c. 1949 -- September 29 , 2013 ) was an American professional wrestler best known for his portrayal of Cousin Luke in the World Wrestling Federation .
Tharcisse Gashaka ( born 18 December 1962 ) is a Burundian athlete who specialized in marathon and long - distance running .
Padmavathy Bandopadhyay ( born 4 November 1944 ) is the first woman Air Marshal of the Indian Air Force .
Alibhai Mulla Jeevanjee ( 1856 - -1936 ) was an Indian merchant , politician and philanthropist who went on to play a large role in the development of modern day Kenya during colonial rule .
Einar Jansen ( 27 March 1893 -- 13 December 1960 ) was a Norwegian historian , genealogist and archivist .
Protais Zigiranyirazo ( born 1938 ? ) commonly known as Monsieur Zed ( `` Mr . Z '' ) , is a Rwandan businessman and politician .
Guru Tegh Bahadur ( Punjabi : ਗੁਰੂ ਤੇਗ਼ ਬਹਾਦਰ , Punjabi pronunciation : ( ɡʊru teɣ bəhɑdʊɾ ) ; 1 April 1621 -- 24 November 1675 , ) , revered as the ninth Nanak , was the ninth of ten Gurus ( Prophets ) of the Sikh religion .
Steve Brignall ( born 12 June 1960 ) is a former English footballer who played in the Football League for Arsenal .
Leander Ditscheiner ( 4 January 1839 -- 1 February 1905 ) was an Austrian physicist and mathematician , best known for his research on birefringence .
Ruth Posner ( born 20 April 1933 as Ruth Wajsberg ) is a Polish Holocaust survivor , former dancer and choreographer and is today an actress and a former member of the Royal Shakespeare Company .
Odysseu Guy Ramos ( born 16 August 1985 ) is a Cape Verdean international footballer who plays professionally as a centre back .
Kenneth Amis ( born 1970 ) is the tuba player with the Empire Brass .
Girolamo da Ponte also known as Gerolamo Bassano ( 3 June 1566 -- 8 Nov 1621 ) was an Italian painter of the Renaissance period .
Sharon Maguire ( born 28 November 1960 ) is a Welsh film director who came to prominence with Bridget Jones 's Diary .
James Schwarzenbach ( 5 August 1911 - 27 October 1994 ) was a right - wing , Republican Swiss politician and publicist .
Enzo Gragnaniello ( born 20 October 1954 ) is an Italian singer - songwriter and composer .
James Anthony Coburn ( 10 December 1927 -- 28 April 1977 ) was an Australian television writer and producer , who spent much of his professional career living and working in the United Kingdom .
Frederick Lowenheim ( 1870 - November 14 , 1929 ) was widely known for his front page magazine illustrations of the Country Gentleman and Woman 's Home Companion .
John Caesar ( 1764 -- 15 February 1796 ) , nicknamed `` Black Caesar '' , was the first Australian bushranger and one of the first people of recent African descent to arrive in Australia .
Mary Hunter Wolf ( 1905?--November 3 , 2000 ) , born Mary Hunter , was an American theater director and producer .
Štěpán Rak ( born 8 August 1945 ) is a Rusyn , Ukraine - born Czech classical guitarist and composer .
Keith Gillhouley ( 8 August 1934 , Crosland Moor , Huddersfield , Yorkshire , England ) is an English first - class cricketer , who played for twenty four games for Yorkshire County Cricket Club in 1961 , 83 for Nottinghamshire from 1963 to 1966 , and one for the MCC in 1963 .
Zoe Newson ( born 24 March 1992 ) is a British Powerlifter .
Pierre - Ambroise Bosse ( born 11 May 1992 ) is a French athlete competing in middle distance running .
Shazad Latif ( born July 1988 ) is a British actor , who starred in the BBC TV series Spooks as the highly skilled technician and data analyst Tariq Masood in series 8 - -10 .
Astratijs Roškovs ( born 1939 ) is a former Lithuanian - Russian - Latvian football central defender who from 1960 to 1970 played for FK Daugava Rīga .
Choi York Yee ( Chinese : 蔡育瑜 ; Jyutping : coi3 juk6 jyu4 , born 11 May 1953 ) is a retired Hong Kong football player and is now a sports commentator in Hong Kong .
Łukasz Adamczyk ( 24 December 1982 ) is a Polish footballer , currently based in Belfast , Northern Ireland and playing for Newry City F.C ..
Daniel G. Birmingham ( born 1968 ) , better known as `` Dan Birmingham '' , is the Chairman of the nine - member County Legislature in Putnam County , New York .
Marty McMillan ( born 17 February 1953 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played for Richmond and Footscray in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) during the early 1970s .
Eder Kurti ( born 29 October 1984 ) is a British Professional boxer with Albanian heritage who competes in the supper middleweight division currently residing in Woolwich , London .
Algis Kizys ( born in Chicago , 1960 ) is a New York City bass guitarist most well known for his long - time membership in New York band Swans .
Andy Cato ( born Andrew Derek Cocup ; 7 June 1969 ) is an English musician , producer and DJ who is currently one half of the electronic music band , Groove Armada , the other half being Tom Findlay .
Frederick Wilkes ( 1869 -- after 1892 ) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football Alliance for Small Heath .
Ali Morteza Samsam Bakhtiari ( 1945 - 2007 ) was a senior expert employed by the National Iranian Oil Company ( NIOC ) .
Known as `` Teddy Niedermaier '' , Edward Niedermaier was born in November 1983 in Annapolis , MD , and grew up in Minneapolis , MN .
Ludger Fischer ( born 30 October 1957 in Essen ) is a German historian on building history , reviewer of contemporary architecture and political scientist .
Kira Poutanen ( born 1974 ) is a Finnish Nobel listed writer , translator and actress .
Paul Blackford ( * 1982 ) is a Detroit - influenced electro artist , best known for fast bass driven electro .
Skyla ( born Lucy Batty ; 5 March 1991 ) is an English dance singer from Altrincham .
Noël Valis ( born 24 December 1945 ) is a writer , scholar and translator .
Tony Mansfield ( born 19 January 1955 ) is an English songwriter , musician and record producer .
Diego de Arroyo , a miniature painter , who was born at Toledo in 1498 , is supposed to have studied either in Italy or under an Italian master .
Kieran McGuinness ( born 8 July 1983 ) is an Australian rules footballer who formerly played with the Western Bulldogs in the Australian Football League ( AFL ) .
Sewell Collins ( 1876 - -1934 ) was an American dramatist and producer .
Vincent Solano ( 1923 - -1992 ) was a gangster , a caporegime for the Chicago Outfit who ran a corrupt Laborers Union local in Chicago .
Sir Charles Michael Dennis Byron ( born July 1943 ) is the President of the Caribbean Court of Justice .
Gundis Zámbó ( born 5 June 1966 in Gratwein , Styria ) is a German actress with Austrian and Hungarian origin .
Irena Borowik ( born 1956 ) , is a Polish publisher and professor of religious studies at the Jagiellonian University in Krakow .
Valnice Milhomens Coelho ( born 16 July 1947 ) is a Brazilian pastor , apostle , author , and televangelist , founder and president of Ministério Palavra da Fé and the Igreja Nacional do Senhor Jesus Cristo ( Insejec ) , currently based in Brasilia .
Michael Urvan ( born 1973 ) was the first individual to successfully defend against a domain name dispute brought against an individual by a famous celebrity .
Irene Eber ( born 1930 in Halle , née Geminder ) is an Israeli Orientalist .
Prof . Rivka Carmi ( born 1948 ) is an Israeli pediatrician and geneticist who , since May 2006 , has served as President of Ben - Gurion University of the Negev .
Claudia Akdemir Udenta ( born 1965 ) is a German - Turkish writer and journalist .
Manya Joshi ( born 1972 ) is a Marathi poet based in Mumbai .
Bertie Brownlow ( born 20 May 1920 , in Portland , New South Wales ) was a Tasmanian cricket player , who played first class cricket for Tasmania eight times between the 1952 - -53 season until the 1956 - -57 season .
Angela Vincent ( born 1942 ) is a professor at Somerville College of Oxford University .
Pavle Nenadović ( Serbian Cyrillic : Павле Ненадовић , pronounced ( pâːʋle nenǎːdoʋit͡ɕ ) ; 1703 - -1768 ) was the Serbian Orthodox Metropolitan of Karlovci from 1749 to 1768 .
Jeanne Martinet ( born March 24 , 1920 ) , a recognized semiotician , is proprietor of a semiotics school .
Philip Heselton ( born 1946 ) is a retired British Conservation Officer , a Wiccan initiate , and a writer on the subjects of Wicca , Paganism and Earth mysteries .
Edward Dryhurst ( 1904 - 1989 ) was an English screenwriter , film producer and director .
Exodus Lale ( born 21 September 2005 ) is a Brisbane , Australian - born performer , actor and singer who plays Young Simba in Disney 's the Lion King Musical Australian tour .
Boris Gardiner ( born 13 January 1943 ) is a Jamaican singer , songwriter and bass guitarist .
Noah Ashenhurst ( born 1972 ) is the author of the novel Comfort Food which won the 2006 Independent Publisher Book Award for Best Regional Fiction ( West - Pacific ) .
Neil Humphreys ( born London , England , 5 December 1974 ) is a British humour columnist and author of three best - selling humorous books about Singapore - Notes From an Even Smaller Island ( 2001 ) , Scribbles from the Same Island ( 2003 ) and Final Notes from a Great Island ( 2006 ) .
Haris Tarin ( born 1978 ) is an Afghan American Muslim leader .
Mimi Alemayehou ( born 1969 ) is a development finance executive who served as Executive Vice President of the Overseas Private Investment Corporation ( OPIC ) from March 2010 to April 2014 .
Amon Buchanan ( born 10 October 1982 ) is a former Australian rules football who played for the Brisbane Lions and the Sydney Swans in the AFL .
Matylda Kowal ( née Szlęzak ; born 11 January 1989 in Rzeszów ) is a Polish middle- and long - distance runner .
Atanas Mladenov ( Bulgarian : Атанас Младенов , born 3 January 1960 ) is a retired Bulgarian high jumper .
Antonio Rodríguez Medero ( 1712 - April 10 , 1760 ) was the mayor of San Antonio , Texas in 1741 .
Margaret Susan Cheshire , Baroness Ryder of Warsaw and Baroness Cheshire , CMG , OBE ( 3 July 1924 -- 2 November 2000 ) , best known as Sue Ryder , was a British volunteer with Special Operations Executive in the Second World War , who afterwards led many charitable organisations , notably the charity named in her honour .
Mike Furber ( 28 September 1948 -- 10 May 1973 ) was an English - born entertainer popular in the mid-1960s as the lead singer of Mike Furber and the Bowery Boys .
Franck Moutsinga ( born 12 August 1985 ) is a German international rugby union player , playing for the Berliner RC in the Rugby - Bundesliga and the German national rugby union team .
Orazio Samacchini ( 20 December 1532 -- 12 June 1577 ) was an Italian painter of the late - Renaissance and Mannerist style , active in Rome , Parma , and his native city .
Al Aspen ( 5 June 1893 Philadelphia , Pennsylvania -- 1956 ) was an American racecar driver .
Franklin Cox ( born Charleston , Illinois , United States , 1961 ) is an American composer and cellist .
Ofra Strauss ( Hebrew : עפרה שטראוס‎ ; born 22 August 1960 ) is an Israeli businesswoman .
Rob Gell AM ( born 25 August 1952 ) is a geomorphologist and weather presenter , with a degree in meteorology .
Günter Ambraß ( born 16 September 1955 ) is a retired East German weightlifter who competed in the lightweight category .
Nataša Petrović ( Macedonian : Наташа Петровиќ ; Serbian : Наташа Петровић ; born 31 August 1988 ) , also known as Natasha Petrovic , is a Macedonian actress of Serbian descent .
Hezekiah da Silva ( also Hezekiah Silva ) ( 1659 - -1698 ) ( Hebrew : חזקיה בן דוד די סילוא ) was a Jewish author born at Livorno , Grand Duchy of Tuscany , son - in - law of the dayan Mordecai Befael Malachi .
Amin Tarif ( Arabic : أمين طريف‎ , Hebrew : אמין טריף ; born 1898 , died October 2 , 1993 ) was the qadi , or spiritual leader , of the Druze in Palestine and then Israel from 1928 till his death in 1993 .
Li Xuepeng ( simplified Chinese : 李学鹏 ; traditional Chinese : 李學鵬 ; pinyin : Lǐ Xuépéng ; born 18 September 1988 ) is a Chinese footballer who currently plays for Guangzhou Evergrande in the Chinese Super League .
St. John Emile Clavering Hankin ( 25 September 1869 -- 15 June 1909 ) was a British Edwardian essayist and playwright .
Jess Robinson ( born 1 February 1983 in London ) , is an English comedy actress and impressionist .
Sharanya Srinivas ( born 3 January 1991 ) is an Indian vocalist who has notably worked in Tamil films as a playback singer .
Daniel Sarokon ( 1928 - January 1 , 2006 ) was a NASA Launch Conductor , described as ' one of the most influential people in the history of space travel .
William Hendy Harrison ( 27 May 1863 -- 15 July 1939 ) was an English first - class cricketer , who played three matches for Yorkshire County Cricket Club , against Middlesex , Cambridge University and Sussex in 1888 .
Harry Bickerton ( 1922 - -1994 ? ) was a British engineer in the fields of aerospace engineering , aircraft engine design , and bicycle construction and design .
Aleksandr Aleksandrovich Shmuk ( Russian : Александр Александрович Шмук ) ( November 9 ( O.S. 28 October ) 1886 in Moscow - January 22 , 1945 , Moscow ) was a Soviet biochemist and recipient of the Stalin Prize in 1942 .
Burkat Shudi ( variants : Burkhart , Burkhardt , Schudi , Tschudi , Tshudi ) ( 13 March 1702 -- 19 August 1773 ) was an English harpsichord maker of Swiss origin .
Serkan Özkaya ( 1973 ) is a Turkish conceptual artist whose work deals with topics of appropriation and reproduction , and typically operates outside of traditional art spaces .
Dakota Darsow ( born 1987 ) is an American professional wrestler .
Juan José Lerena y Barry ( Cádiz , 1796 - -Madrid , 1863 ) was a Spanish naval captain who attempted to establish Spanish control over the Gulf of Guinea during the mid - nineteenth century .
David Holton ( born 1946 ) is a British professor of Modern Greek at the University of Cambridge .
Denny Laine ( born Brian Frederick Hines , 29 October 1944 ) is an English musician , singer , songwriter and guitarist .
Edward William Binney FRS , FGS ( 1812 - -1882 ) was an English geologist .
Anita Włodarczyk ( born 8 August 1985 ) is a Polish hammer thrower , and the first woman in history to throw the hammer over 80 m ; she currently holds the women 's world record of 81.08 m .
Kanny Theng ( born 10 March 1987 ) is a Singaporean model turned actress .
Walter Fyrst ( né Fürst ; 6 July 1901 -- 23 February 1993 ) was a Norwegian filmmaker .
William E. Dunn ( born 1926 ) was elected mayor of Murray , Utah for two four - year terms during 1965 - 1970 , and elected as a Salt Lake County Commissioner from 1970 to 1979 .
Georgios Hatziioannidis ( Greek : Γεώργιος Χατζηιωαννίδης ; born 1951 in Soviet Union ) is a Greek wrestler .
Tony Cohen ( b. 1956 ) is an Australian music record producer and sound engineer based in Melbourne .
Maryna Godwin ( later Maryna Proctor , born 9 September 1944 ) is a retired South African tennis player .
Peter Nigri ( Latinized from Schwartz ) , known also as Peter George Niger ( b. 1434 at Kaaden in Bohemia ; d. between 1481 and 1484 ) , was a Dominican theologian , preacher and controversialist .
Lisa Gormley ( born 29 September 1984 ) is an English - born Australian actress and best known for playing Bianca Scott on the Channel 7 serial drama Home and Away .
Lieutenant - General Kanwar Bahadur Singh , MBE , ( 5 August 1910 -- 8 May 2007 ) was a senior officer in the Indian Army .
Richard Bowchier was the Archdeacon of Lewes from 1693 until 1723 .
Claude Littner ( born 1949 ) is a British business executive and the former chairman of Viglen , also known from his appearances on the BBC - produced British version of The Apprentice , interviewing for his former boss Alan Sugar .
Alex Mutucumarana ( born 15 June 1979 ) is a cricketer .
Gavin Relly ( 1926 in Cape Town , South Africa -- 10 January 1999 in Hermanus , South Africa ) was a South African businessman and former chairman of Anglo American .
Eliodoro Camacho ( 1831 -- 1899 ) was a noted Bolivian politician , party leader , and presidential candidate .
Rabbi Avigdor Nebenzahl ( born 1935 ) is the former chief rabbi of the Old City of Jerusalem after handing over the post to his son Rabbi Chizkiyahu Nebenzahl who also learns in Yeshivat Netiv Aryeh , Rabbi of the Ramban Synagogue , a posek and a noted author of weekly essays on the torah portion .
William Arnold Bromfield ( 1801 - -1851 ) , was an English botanist .
George Boateng ( born 5 September 1975 ) is a former Dutch footballer who is of Ghanaian descent .
Roger Laurin ( born 1936 in Montreal , Quebec ) is a trainer of Thoroughbred racehorses in the United States and Canada .
Anirvan Ghosh was born in 1964 in Bloomington , Indiana and grew up in Kanpur , India .
Edwin K. Barker ( born 8 August 1928 ) was the first principal of Iowa City West High School , and was chosen as one of the 150 most notable people in the 150 year history of Iowa City , Iowa .
Sir Edward Albert Stone KCMG ( 9 March 1844 -- 2 April 1920 ) was an Australian lawyer , lieutenant governor , politician and the fourth Chief Justice of Western Australia .
Hjalmar Waage ( 8 February 1892 -- 1939 ) was a Norwegian newspaper editor and writer .
Richard Platt ( born 15 April 1953 ) is a British writer of nonfiction and information books and multimedia works , primarily for children .
Leonard Whiting ( born 30 June 1950 ) is an English actor who is best known for his role as Romeo in the 1968 Zeffirelli film version of Romeo and Juliet opposite Olivia Hussey 's Juliet , a role which earned him the Golden Globe Award for New Star of the Year - Actor .
Louise Hulland ( born 6 September 1979 in Burnley , Lancashire ) is an English presenter and journalist currently working for ITV London , ITV News , BBC Watchdog and BBC London 94.9 .
Ger Owens ( Gerald , Gerry ) born 13 July 1979 in Dublin is an Irish sailor .
Juana Alicia Araiza ( born 1953 ) is a muralist , printmaker , educator , activist and , painter .
Mary - Anne Fahey ( born 19 August 1955 as Mary - Anne Waterman ) is an Australian actress , comedian and writer .
Emanuel Dimas de Melo Pimenta ( born 1957 ) is a Brazilian musician , architect , and intermedia artist .
Li Fanwen ( simplified Chinese : 李范文 ; traditional Chinese : 李範文 ) ( born November 1932 ) is a Chinese linguist and Tangutologist .
Peter Long ( born 4 June 1952 ) is an English businessman and Joint Chief Executive of TUI Group
Zacheus Isham , D.D. ( 1651 - -1705 ) was a Church of England clergyman and religious author .
Harm Lagaay ( 28 December 1946 , The Hague ) is a Dutch automobile designer .
Emil Farkas ( Born 1946 ) is a Hungarian American martial arts instructor and writer known for his appearances in numerous films and in television shows .
Low Thia Khiang ( simplified Chinese : 刘程强 ; traditional Chinese : 劉程強 ; pinyin : Liú Chéngqiáng ; Pe̍h - ōe - jī : Lâu Thiâⁿ-kiàng ; born 5 September 1956 ) is a Singaporean politician and businessman .
Salaheddine Bassir ( Arabic : صلاح الدين بصير‎ ) ( born 5 September 1972 ) is a former Moroccan football player .
Marcella Polain ( born 1958 ) is an Australian - resident poet , novelist and short fiction writer .
Pythagoras Papastamatiou ( Greek : Πυθαγόρας Παπασταματίου , 1930 -- November 12 , 1979 ) , mainly known by the mononym Pythagoras , was a Greek lyricist and playwright .
Marina Azyabina ( Russian : Марина Азябина ; born 15 June 1963 ) is a retired Russian hurdler .
Ahmet Şık ( IPA : ( ähme̞t̪ ʃɯk ) ; born 1970 , Adana ) is a Turkish investigative journalist , author of several books , and a trade unionist .
Mehdi Bagheri ( Persian : مهدی باقری‎‎ ) , ( born 16 November 1980 ) , is an Iranian kamancheh player and composer .
Klaus Behrens ( born 3 August 1941 ) is a retired German rower who was most successful in the eights .
Zeng Guo Yuan ( simplified Chinese : 曾国原 ; traditional Chinese : 曾國原 ; pinyin : Zēng Guŏyuán ; born 1953 ) , also known as Zeng Guoyan , Thomas Chan Hock Seng and , erroneously , Zeng Guoyung , is a Singaporean businessman , philanthropist , politician , author , and former acupuncturist .
Daniel Tarantola was born in Ajaccio ( Corsica ) , France , in 1942 .
Ofek Fishler ( Hebrew : אופק פישלר‎ ; born 24 August 1996 ) is an Israeli footballer who plays for Hapoel Haifa .
Ignacio Canto ( born 21 January 1981 ) is a Spanish épée fencer .
Park Sea - kyun ( born 1 June 1971 ) is a South Korean Paralympian shooter .
Janice Hally ( born 18 March 1959 ) is a Scottish playwright and television screenwriter who has written more than 300 broadcast hours of prime - time British television drama serials and individual screenplays .
Robin Batteau ( born 12 January 1948 ) is an American Grammy - winning , Emmy - winning , Clio - winning , and Oscar - nominated composer , singer - songwriter - soloist and music producer .
Shen Chen ( Chinese : 沈晨 ; pinyin : Shěn Chén ; born 28 July 1990 ) is a Chinese sabre fencer .
Daniel Kjörling ( born 12 November 1973 ) is a Swedish former bandy player who most recently played for Västerås SK as a goalkeeper .
Bessie Bardot ( born Bessie Wilson on 10 September 1974 ) is an Australian businesswoman , author , body model , television host , and socialite .
Anna Hingley ( born 1982 ) is the first woman to ride on horseback across the Australian Outback , which she completed on 5 August 2006 .
Ernst Lorsy , ( in Hungarian : Lorsy Ernő , born 28 November 1889 in Mezőszilas , Hungary -- 23 August 1960 in New York City ) Hungarian journalist , translator and historian of Jewish descent .
Emma Bossons ( born 1976 in Congleton , Cheshire ) is a ceramic artist and designer for Moorcroft Pottery .
Bobby Issazadhe(born 21 February 1961 ) is a Swedish former professional race car driver and Performance Racing team manager .
Norman Brudy ( 1919 - -2000 ) was a salesman , government lobbyist and a Canadian Communist politician and election candidate .
Alexander Svirsky or Alexander of Svir ( 1448 - -1533 ) was an Eastern Orthodox saint , monk and hegumen of Russian Orthodox Church .
Lawrence A. Oxley ( 1887- 1973 ) was one among 45 prominent black community leaders appointed by President Franklin D. Roosevelt to what was called his Black Cabinet , positions in numerous executive agencies and to serve as advisers during his administration .
Bola Agbaje ( born c. 1981 ) is an award - winning British playwright of Nigerian origin , who is under commission with Paines Plough and Tiata Fahodzi .
Charles Jerry Vines ( born September 1937 ) is an American preacher and former pastor of the then nation 's third largest Southern Baptist church , the First Baptist Church of Jacksonville , Florida .
Juan Pablo Torres Amaya , stagename Pablo Ríos ( San Salvador , 9 November 1934 - 10 January 2006 ) was a Salvadorian popular singer .
Jacob Juel ( 1744 -- 21 April 1800 ) was a Norwegian timber trader and civil servant .
Kevork Malikyan ( born 2 June 1943 ) is an Anglo - Armenian actor and teacher .
Robert Wringham ( born Robert Westwood on 28 November 1982 ) is a British humorist , best known as the editor of New Escapologist magazine .
Heike John ( now Heike Walpot ; born 19 June 1960 ) is a retired German swimmer who won a bronze medal at the 1977 European Aquatics Championships .
Christopher Tookey ( born 9 April 1950 ) is an award - winning English film critic .
Alma Delia Fuentes ( born 22 January 1937 ) is a Mexican actress of film , television , and theatre .
William Stopford Kenny ( born 1788 ; died London , November 16 , 1867 ) was a British schoolmaster , a writer and compiler of educational works , and an accomplished chessplayer who published and translated several works on the game .
Jacques Testard de Montigny ( 1663 - -1737 ) was an officer in the colonial troupes de la marine of New France .
Carolyn Steinberg ( born 1956 ) is an American flutist and composer .
Born in Malaya on 29 September 1920 , Michael Codner was educated at Bedford School and Exeter College , Oxford University .
Ashok Patki ( born 25 August 1941 ) is an Indian music director and composer ; working predominantly in Marathi cinema , theatre and television .
Ejnar Knudsen III ( born 1968 ) is a US investment manager who focuses on food and agriculture investments .
Maria Zemankova ( born 6 January 1951 ) is a Computer Scientist who is known for the theory and implementation of the first Fuzzy Relational Database System .
Albert Boyd Douglas , known as Boyd Douglas ( born 13 July 1950 ) is a politician in Northern Ireland .
Lieutenant - Colonel Henry Haversham Godwin - Austen FRS FZS FRGS MBOU ( 6 July 1834 -- 2 December 1923 ) , known until 1854 as Henry Haversham Austen , was an English topographer , geologist , naturalist and surveyor .
Aleksandër Xhuvani ( 14 March 1889 , Elbasan , Manastir Vilayet - 22 March 1961 ) was an Albanian philologist and educator .
Randall Dougherty ( born 1961 ) is an American mathematician .
Robin Pilcher ( born 10 August 1950 ) is a British author , the eldest son of author Rosamunde Pilcher .
Anna of Greater Poland ( Polish : Anna wielkopolska ; b. 1253 - d. aft . 26 June 1295 ) , was a Greater Poland princess member of the House of Piast and Abbess at Owińska .
Zachary Muburi - Muita ( born in 1957 ) is a national of Kenya who from 2010 until June 2013 has served as the Head of the United Nations Office to the African Union .
Alvin Lee Marts , born 4 August 1923 at Wilsonville , Nebraska , enlisted in the Navy at Denver , Colorado , 2 July 1941 .
Dr. Pierre De Muelenaere ( born 25 October 1958 ) is a Belgian entrepreneur and scientist .
John Wall Callcott ( 20 November 1766 -- 15 May 1821 ) was an eminent English composer .
Nathan Ashe ( born 5 October 1991 ) is a professional rugby league player .
Father D'Arcy D'Souza ( 1913 -- December 10 , 2009 , Karachi ) was a Pakistani Roman Catholic priest who spent 66 years of his priestly life serving the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Karachi , making him at the time of his death , the longest - serving priest in the archdiocese .
Enkelejda Shehu ( born 23 January 1969 ) is an Albanian shooter who competed at the 1992 Summer Olympic Games and the 1996 Summer Olympic Games .
Laban Korir ( born 30 June 1985 in Uasin Gishu District ) is a Kenyan long - distance runner who competes in road running competitions .
Brett Montgomery ( born 1 June 1973 ) is a retired Australian rules football player and current assistant coach with the Western Bulldogs .
Dr. Stephen Little Ph.D. ( born 1954 ) is an American Asian art scholar , museum administrator and artist .
John G. Cotton ( born 1951 ) is a retired vice admiral in the United States Navy .
Albert V , Duke of Mecklenburg ( 1397 -- 1 June /6 December 1423 ) was Duke of Mecklenburg from 1412 until his death .
Daan Vaesen ( born 11 July 1981 ) is a Belgian footballer currently playing for Duffel
Pierre Wack ( 1922 - -1997 ) was an unconventional French oil executive who was the first to develop the use of scenario planning in the private sector , at Royal Dutch Shell 's London headquarters in the 1970s .
Matthías Vilhjálmsson ( born 30 January 1987 ) is an Icelandic international footballer who plays as a striker for the Icelandic national football team and the Norwegian Premier League club Rosenborg .
Chris Gelbmann ( born 27 April 1972 ) is an Austrian singer - songwriter who had an eventful life .
Jana Revedin , Prof . Arch . PhD , born 1965 in Constance ( D ) , studied architecture and urban planning in Buenos Aires , Princeton and Milan and taught at the University of Venice where she submitted her doctorate on the role of public space in the development of a democratic civic identity .
Cecilia Ekelundh ( born 19 February 1978 ) is a Swedish golfer .
Joe Lefors ( February 20 , 1865 -- October 1 , 1940 ) was a lawman in the closing years of the Old West .
Moses Mahlangu ( born 1925 ) was a long - time supporter of the teachings of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter - day Saints ( LDS Church ) in South Africa .
George Lindemann ( born 1936 ) is an American businessman and the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of the Southern Union , a pipeline company .
Peter Abetz ( born 17 December 1952 ) is an Australian politician who was elected to the Western Australian Legislative Assembly at the 2008 state election , as the member for Southern River , which takes in the Perth suburbs of Canning Vale , Southern River and Huntingdale .
Kálmán Balogh ( born 18 January 1959 ) is a Hungarian cimbalom player and leader of Kalman Balogh 's Gypsy Cimbalom Band .
Robert Choulet ( born 28 February 1935 ) is a French aerodynamics engineer influential in race car dynamics .
Caroline Ansink ( born 8 August 1959 in Amsterdam ) is a Dutch musician , music educator and composer .
David Warlick ( born 1952 in Gastonia , North Carolina ) is an educator , author , programmer and public speaker .
Clinton Marius ( born 20 August 1966 in Pietermaritzburg ) is a South African writer and performer .
Baron Albert de Vleeschauwer van Braekel ( 1 January 1897 , Nederbrakel - 24 February 1971 , Kortenberg ) was a Belgian politician of the Catholic Party .
Olena Krasovska , née Ovcharova ( Ukrainian : Олена Красовська , born 17 August 1976 ) is a Ukrainian hurdler best known for winning a silver medal at the 2004 Olympic Games with a personal best time of 12.45 seconds .
Catherine McGuinness ( born 14 November 1934 ) is a retired judge and activist .
Hamza Namira ( Arabic : حمزة نمرة‎ ; born November 1980 ) is an Egyptian singer - songwriter , and multi - instrumentalist .
Harry Lourandos ( born 1945 ) is an Australian archaeologist , Adjunct Professor in the Department of Anthropology , Archaeology and Sociology , School of Arts and Social Sciences at James Cook University , Cairns .
Marie Marguerite Rose ( 1717 - August 27 , 1757 ) was an Guinea - born Canadian slave .
Heidi Sevdal ( born 6 March 1989 ) is a Faroese football forward who currently plays for HB Tórshavn , after representing various other teams in the Faroese 1 .
Joshua Gwillen Doan ( 1811 -- February 6 , 1839 ) was a farmer and tanner who participated in the Upper Canada Rebellion of 1837 .
Donna M. Loring ( born October 1 , 1948 ) is an author , broadcaster , and tribal representative of the Penobscot nation in the American state of Maine .
Doug Padgett ( born Douglas Ernest Vernon Padgett , 20 July 1934 ) is a former English cricketer , who played more than 500 first - class matches and represented England in Tests twice , both in 1960 .
John Tarring FRIBA ( 1806 - -1875 ) was an English Victorian ecclesiastical architect active in the mid - nineteenth century .
Leon Bolier ( Dutch pronunciation : ( ˈleːjɔn boːˈliːr ) ; born Leendert Wouter Bolier on October 21 , 1980 ) is a Dutch classically trained trance composer , DJ , and record producer .
John Michael Maisch ( 30 January 1831 Hanau , Germany - September 10 , 1893 ) was a United States pharmacist , the `` father of adequate pharmaceutical legislation . ''
David MacGregor ( born 9 June 1981 ) is a Scottish footballer who is currently without a club after leaving Queen 's Park in July 2015 .
Kyriakos Papadopoulos ( Greek : Κυριάκος Παπαδόπουλος ; born 23 February 1992 ) is a Greek footballer who plays as a centre back for Bayer Leverkusen and the Greek national team .
András Száraz ( born 2 March 1966 in Budapest ) is a Hungarian former figure skater and current coach .
Carl Steenstrup ( born 1934 in Vaasa , Finland ; died November 11 , 2014 , in Berlin , Germany ) was a Danish japanologist .
Lee Salk , AB , MA , PhD , ( 1926 - May 2 , 1992 ) was a child psychologist and author who is credited with discovering the calming effect the sound of a heartbeat has on infants .
Lasse Brun Pedersen ( born 1974 ) is a Danish mountain bike orienteering competitor and World Champion .
Toshinari Takaoka ( 高岡 寿成 ; born 24 September 1970 in Yamashiro , Kyoto ) is a Japanese long - distance runner who specializes in the 5000 metres , 10,000 metres and the marathon race .
Yavgeniy Olhovsky ( born 22 December 1983 ) is an Israeli pole vaulter .
Geoff Billington was born on 2 March 1955 , and started riding at the age of nine years at a local riding school .
Zoe Sheridan ( born in Adelaide , 1968 ) is an Australian television presenter , radio announcer and voice over artist .
Myma Seldon ( born 9 August 1979 ) is a British television and radio presenter and voiceover artist .
Pierre Mollaret ( 10 July 1898 -- 3 December 1987 ) was a neurologist who made significant scientific contributions to the study of infectious diseases and neurology .
Jacob Chandy was born on 23 January 1910 , in Kottayam , in the south Indian state of Kerala to an orthodox Christian family .
April Bulmer ( born 1963 ) is a Canadian poet whose poems have appeared in numerous literary magazines and anthologies , including Arc , the Malahat Review , Quills , and Ascent Aspirations .
H. L. Fischer ( 1822 - -1909 ) ( Henry Lee Fischer ) was a Pennsylvania German language writer and translator .
Anne - Elisa Alice Ducasse , born 1846 ( ? ) in Valparaiso , ( date of death unknown ) , was an opera singer and teacher active in Paris .
Dave Dorman ( born 1958 in Michigan ) is a science fiction , horror and fantasy illustrator best known for his Star Wars artwork .
Peter Pohl ( born 5 December 1940 ) is a Swedish author and former director and screenwriter of short films .
Robert Alan Jamieson ( born 1958 ) is a Scottish and Shetlandic poet and novelist who grew up on the crofting community of Sandness .
Giles Duley ( born 15 September 1971 , Wimbledon , London , England ) is a British documentary photographer and photojournalist .
Hassan Katsina ( 31 March 1933 -- 24 July 1995 ) was a Nigerian Army Major General and son of Usman Nagogo , the Emir of Katsina from 1944 to 1981 .
Petrișor Voinea ( born 28 May 1990 ) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays mainly as a midfielder .
Monsignor Agripino Núñez Collado ( b. La Galeta , Sabana Iglesia , 9 November 1933 ) is a Roman Catholic clergyman and scholar from the Dominican Republic .
Edmond Panariti ( born 1 June 1960 ) is an Albanian academic and politician , who is the former minister of foreign affairs and the minister of agriculture and rural development .
K.K. Raghava ( born 1980 in Bangalore , India ) also known as Raghava KK and Raghava K K , is a contemporary artist living and working in New York and India .
Efraín Amador Piñero ( born 1947 ) is a Cuban guitarist , lutist , composer and professor .
Taco Dibbits ( born 1968 ) is an art historian ( VU University Amsterdam / University of Cambridge ) and first came to the Rijksmuseum as curator of 17th - century painting in 2002 .
Selenia Iacchelli ( born 5 June 1986 ) is an Italian Canadian soccer player who is allocated to the Western New York Flash of the National Women 's Soccer League ( NWSL ) .
Willum Þór Þórsson ( born 17 March 1963 ) is a former football player and manager who currently serves on the Alþingi , the Icelandic parliament , for the Progressive Party .
Asle Sudbø ( born 3 May 1961 ) is a Professor of Physics at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology .
Maharaja Shri Bettada Chamaraja Wodeyar VIII Bahadur ( 27 August 1759 - 6 September 1776 . )
Dario Oliviero ( born 12 July 1972 ) , better known by his stage name Gabriel Garko , is an Italian actor and former fashion model .

Kenneth Wade , FRS ( 13 October 1932 -- 16 March 2014 ) was a British chemist , and professor emeritus at Durham University .

Ge Tian ( Chinese : 葛天 ; pinyin : Gě Tiān ; born 25 December 1988 ) is a Chinese actress and fashion model .
William Henry Coombes ( 8 May 1767 -- 15 November 1850 ) was an English Roman Catholic priest , theologian and writer .

Jaime Vallvé ( born in 1927 in Barcelona in Spain , died in 2000 ) was a Spanish comic strip artist who lived and worked in Denmark during most of his lifetime .
Romy Achituv ( born 1958 ) is an Israeli experimental multimedia artist .
Master Gunnery Sergeant Frankie Segarra ( born 1960 ) , is the first Hispanic to reach the rank of Master Gunnery Sergeant in his Military Occupational Specialty , 0451 air delivery specialist .
William Sitgreaves Cox ( 1790 - -1874 ) was a third lieutenant serving on USS Chesapeake during the War of 1812 .
Edward Welch ( 1806 - 1868 ) was an architect born in Overton , Flintshire , in North Wales .
Mihály Deák - Bárdos ( born 30 January 1975 ) is a Hungarian amateur Greco - Roman wrestler , who played for the men 's super heavyweight category .
Dom Francisco de Almeida ( Portuguese pronunciation : ( fɾɐ̃ˈsiʃku dɨ aɫˈmɐjðɐ ) ) , also known as `` the Great Dom Francisco '' ( ca . 1450 -- March 1 , 1510 ) , was a Portuguese nobleman , soldier and explorer .
Craig Ferguson ( born 17 May 1962 ) is a Scottish - born American television host , stand - up comedian , writer , actor , director , producer and voice artist .
Hilda Braid ( 3 March 1929 -- 6 November 2007 ) was an English actress who had a long career on British television .
Jade Faulkner ( born 21 December 1993 ) is a competitor in rhythmic gymnastics .
Ranveer Brar ( born 8 February 1978 ) is an Indian chef , a host / judge for TV shows and food stylist .
Mimi Heinrich ( born 1 November 1936 ) is Danish actress and writer .
Gabriel Gabrielsen Holtsmark ( 1 February 1867 -- 1954 ) was a Norwegian educator , physicist and actuary .
Neda Arnerić ( Serbian Cyrillic : Неда Арнерић ) ( born 15 July 1953 ) is a Serbian actress .
Michele Busiri Vici ( 2 May 1894 - 4 February 1981 ) was an Italian architect and urban planner , belonging to the Busiri Vici ( pronounced Booseeree Veechee ) family of architects who have been active since the seventeenth century .
Jörg Asmussen ( born 31 October 1966 ) is a German economist and politician who currently serves as State Secretary at the Federal Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs .
Reece Blayney ( born 24 July 1985 ) is an Australian professional rugby league player who currently plays for the Wynnum Manly Seagulls in the Queensland Cup competition .
Paula P - Orridge ( born 23 February 1963 ) , also known as Alaura O'Dell , is an English musician .
Ottavio Bianchi ( Italian pronunciation : ( otˈtavjo ˈbjaŋki ) ; born 6 October 1943 ) is an Italian former football player and coach .
Jean - Louis Bourgeois ( born 1940 ) is an author and the son of artist Louise Bourgeois and art historian Robert Goldwater .
Rebecca Grundy ( born 1990 ) is a cricketer for England women 's cricket team .
Linda Aksomitis , née Linda Demyen ( born 7 August 1954 ) is a Canadian author specialising in children 's and travel literature , as well as nonfiction about the history of the snowmobile .
Jessica Kürten ( 24 November 1969 ) is an Irish equestrian who competes in the sport of show jumping .
Peter Suchenwirt ( c. 1320 -- 1395 ) was an Austrian poet and herald .
Ada Andy Napaltjarri ( born c. 1954 ) is a Warlpiri-- and Luritja -- speaking Indigenous artist from Australia 's Western Desert region .
Liu Shahe ( Chinese : 流沙河 ; born 1931 in Chengdu ) is the pen name of the Chinese writer and poet Yu Xuntan ( Chinese : 余勛坦 ) .
Dick Mango ( né Richard J. Mango , 15 July 1912 , Pennsylvania -- 8 June 1975 , Olmsted County , Minnesota ) was an American bandleader , tenor saxophonist , vocalist , composer , and arranger originally from Detroit .
Christophe Impens ( born 9 December 1969 in Ghent ) is a retired Belgian athlete who competed in middle - distance events .
Lorraine Broderick ( born 1948 ) is an American television soap opera writer who got her start on All My Children as a protégée of the show 's creator , Agnes Nixon .
Simon Sadler ( British , b. 1968 in Solihull , West Midlands ) is Professor of Architectural and Urban History in the Art History Program at the University of California , Davis .
Sara Bossio ( born 7 April 1938 in Montevideo ) is a Uruguayan lawyer and former judge .
Thomas Pascoe ( born 10 March 1847 or 1853 , in Cornwall ) was an Englishman who initially worked in the royal navy for 7 years and also witnessed the opening of the Suez canal .
Jill Bilcock ( born 1948 ) is an Australian film editor , a member of the ASE ( Australian Screen Editors ) , as well as the ACE ( American Cinema Editors ) , and has edited films such as William Shakespeare 's Romeo + Juliet , Moulin Rouge ! and Road to Perdition .
Jan Ullrich ( German pronunciation : ( ˈjan ˈʊlrɪç ) ) ; born 2 December 1973 ) is a German former professional road bicycle racer .
Leigh Arnold ( born Megan Leigh Arnold on 17 October 1979 ) is an Irish actress .
Timothy Giles Paxman CMG LVO ( born 15 November 1951 ) is a British diplomat who was Ambassador to Mexico 2005 - -09 and then Ambassador to Spain 2009 - -13 .
Ben Damon ( born 24 October 1980 ) is an Australian journalist , TV presenter and screenwriter / director .
Stefan G. Bucher ( born 1973 ) is an American writer , graphic designer and illustrator .
Paul Schuss ( born 23 July 1948 in Munzkirchen , Austria ) is a French artist of the Ecole de Paris ( School of Paris ) .
Mordechai Mano ( Hebrew : מרדכי מנו‎ ) ( 1922 , Salonika , Greece -- 1969 ) was an Israeli businessman and member of the Mano family shipping family .
Marios Leousis ( 1936 -- 31 October 2011 ) was a Greek magician .
Octavian Popescu ( born 25 April 1938 ) is a Romanian former footballer and coach known in Germany and Turkey as Popi or Pope .
Giuseppe Moccia ( 22 June 1933 -- 20 August 2006 ) was an Italian screenwriter and film director .
Renee MacRae ( born Christina Catherine MacDonald , February 1940 ) is a Scottish woman who is missing , presumed to have been murdered .
Helen Fry ( born 1967 ) is British historian and biographer born in Ilfracombe , North Devon .
Alessio Gelsini Torresi ( born 17 February 1951 ) is an Italian cinematographer , sometimes credited as Alessio Gelsini .
Yosef Ba - Gad ( Hebrew : יוסף בא - גד‎ , born 10 February 1932 ) is an Israeli former Rosh Yeshiva and politician who served as a member of the Knesset between 1992 and 1996 .
Kristian Cox ( born 28 September 1992 ) is an English football striker who has played for Port Vale , Ilkeston , New Mills , Hyde , and Gresley .
Evelyn Haas , born Evelyn Traeger ( born 7 April 1949 ) is a German former First Senate Constitutional Court judge and current Honorary Professor of Law .
Erskine Anton Norris ( born 7 January 1940 in Kirtons , Saint Philip , Barbados ) is a former Barbadian high jumper .
Mehmet Barış Manço ( born Tosun Yusuf Mehmet Barış Manço ; 2 January 1943 -- 1 February 1999 ) , known by his stage name Barış Manço , was a Turkish rock musician , singer , songwriter , composer , and television producer .
Denise Thiémard ( born 24 March 1960 in Orsonnens ) is a retired Swiss javelin thrower .
Marika Nezer ( Greek : Μαρίκα Νέζερ ; 1906 -- July 18 , 1989 ) was a Greek actress .
Anne Crawford Flexner ( 27 June 1874 -- 11 January 1955 ) born Anne Laziere Crawford was an American playwright .
Leann Fennelly ( born 1990 ) is a camogie player and a student , who played in the 2009 All Ireland camogie final .
Bhimsen Thapa ( Nepali : भीमसेन थापा ; August 1775 -- 5 August 1839 ) was the mukhtiyar of Nepal ( equivalent to prime minister ) from 1806 to 1837 .
Kayne Lawton ( born 31 May 1989 ) is an Australian professional rugby League footballer who currently plays for AS Carcassonne in the Elite One Championship .
Antonio Benivieni ( 1443 - -1502 ) was a Florentine physician who pioneered the use of the autopsy , a postmortum dissection of a deceased patient 's body used to understand the cause of death .
John Richard Buckland ( 3 August 1819 -- 13 October 1874 ) , was an Australian school teacher and first headmaster of The Hutchins School , Tasmania .
Viktória Kokas ( born 15 November 1990 in Győr ) is a Hungarian handballer who plays for Veszprém Barabás KC as a right wing .
Miao Ruilin ( Chinese : 缪瑞林 ; pinyin : Miào Rùilín ; born November 1964 ) is a Chinese politician currently serving as Mayor of Nanjing .
Stanley Tuemler Escudero ( born 10 March 1942 ) is a retired American diplomat who served in the U.S. foreign service in multiple capacities .
George Kersley , Sr . ( 1817 - 1906 ) was a pioneer of Western Australia in the Beverley and Dumbleyung districts .
Djelloul Marbrook ( born 1934 in Bou Saâda , Algeria ) is a contemporary English language American poet and writer .
Alassane Touré ( born 9 February 1989 in Sarcelles ) is a French footballer player who currently plays for Gazélec Ajaccio in Ligue 1 .
Aravind Malagatti ( ಕನ್ನಡ : ಅರವಿಂದ ಮಾಲಗತ್ತಿ ) ( 1 May 1956 ) is a prominent Indian Dalit poet and writer writing in Kannada .
Kent Monkman ( born 1965 ) is a Canadian First Nations artist of Cree and Irish ancestry .
Tam Cowan ( born 21 April 1969 ) is a football journalist , radio and television presenter .
Marvin Essor ( born 27 August 1981 ) is a retired Jamaican sprinter who specialised in the 400 metres .
Robert Lucy ( born 20 February 1923 ) is a former Swiss gymnast .
Louise Shaffer ( born 5 July 1942 ) is an American actress , script writer , and author .
Florent Charpentier ( born 1982 ) is a French clarinetist .
Govind Singh Gurjar ( 9 March 1932 -- 6 April 2009 ) , six - time MLA from Nasirabad ( Ajmer ) and former Minister of Rajasthan .
