Harald Jockusch ( * 1939 in Frankfurt am Main ) is a German biologist and artist with the alias Hal Jos .
Jean Symes ( born 13 November 1986 in Johannesburg ) is a South African left - handed batsman and part - time slow left arm bowler who plays for Gauteng and Scotland .
Jozo Radoš ( pronounced ( jozo radoʃ ) ; born 3 November 1956 ) is a Croatian politician currently serving as one out of 11 Croatian members of the European Parlament .
Patrick Harrington ( born 24 May 1964 ) is a British political activist and writer , currently general secretary of Solidarity --
Jesse Tittsworth ( born 26 February 1979 ) , better known under his stage name Tittsworth , is an American DJ , producer , night club owner , and record label owner .
Greg Rowe ( born 1964 ) was a child actor starring in Australian films such as Storm Boy ( 1976 ) and Blue Fin ( 1978 ) , both based on novels by Colin Thiele .
Hans Zhang Han ( born 6 October 1984 ) is a Chinese actor , singer and host .
Martin Webb ( Born 1970 ) is a British born entrepreneur and television presenter .
Julian Prictoe ( born 1962 , London , England ) is an English engineer , journalist , TV producer and professional photographer .
Laura Forster ( 1858 - -1917 ) was an Australian medical doctor , surgeon and nurse noted for her service in Belgium and Russia during World War I.
Xavier Davis ( born 1971 in Grand Rapids , Michigan ) is a jazz pianist , composer , arranger , producer , and music educator who leads the Xavier Davis Trio .
Kung Tsui - chang ( simplified Chinese : 孔垂长 ; traditional Chinese : 孔垂長 ; pinyin : Kǒng Chuícháng , born 1 July 1975 ) is the Sacrificial Official to Confucius in the Republic of China ( Taiwan ) and Senior Advisor to the President of the Republic of China .
Rebecca Lane Hooper Eastman ( 23 March 1877 -- 1937 ) was an American suffragist , journalist , and author of short stories .
Carl Morgan , born 1981 , is a former producer of the rap group So Solid Crew .
Ken Bracewell ( born 5 October 1936 ) is an English former professional football player and coach .
Hu Zongxian ( Chinese : 胡宗憲 ; November 4 , 1512 -- November 25 , 1565 ) , courtesy name Ruzhen ( 汝貞 ) and art name Meilin ( 梅林 ) , was a Chinese general of the Ming dynasty who presided over the government 's response to the wokou pirate raids during the reign of the Jiajing Emperor .
Alan Vaughan Lowe QC ( born 1952 ) is a barrister and academic specialising in the field of international law .
Franklyn Keith Musto OBE ( born 12 January 1936 ) is a British sailor and businessman .
Anthony Marinelli ( born 19 March 1959 ) is a classically trained American pianist , composer and conductor .
Lawrence W. Sherman ( born Schenectady , NY , 25 October 1949 ) is an experimental criminologist and the founder of `` evidence - based policing . ''
Michael Noel Canavan , Garda Síochána 21578C and recipient of the Scott Medal , born 1958 .
Vice Admiral Joseph Metcalf , III ( 20 December 1927 - 2 March 2007 ) was born in Holyoke , Massachusetts .
Phaedon Georgitsis ( Greek : Φαίδων Γεωργίτσης ; 26 January 1939 ) is a Greek actor .
Azzedine Lagab ( born 18 September 1986 ) is an Algerian road bicycle racer for UCI Continental team Groupement Sportif des Pétroliers d´Algérie .
Jonathan Chait ( /ˈtʃeɪt/ ; born 1972 ) is a commentator and writer for New York magazine .
Akshay Kumar Sen was born in 1854 in a village called Maynapur in the Bankura district of Bengal to Haladhar Sen and Bidhumukhi Devi .
Federica Del Buono ( born 12 December 1994 ) is an Italian middle - distance runner who competes mainly in track events .
Henry Stopes ( 1852 , Colchester -- 1902 , Greenhithe ) was a brewer , architect and amateur paleontologist of repute in late 19th century London .
Geoff Burrowes ( born 1945 ) is an Australian filmmaker best known for the movie The Man from Snowy River ( 1982 ) , the TV mini - series Anzacs ( 1985 ) , and the Burrowes Film Group .
Abd Al - Rahman al - Nuaimi ( Abderrahman Al Nuaimi ) , ( born 1954 ) is a Qatari human rights advocate and co - founder of Alkarama .
Wang Can ( Chinese : 王粲 ; 177 - -217 ) , courtesy name Zhongxuan , was a politician , scholar and poet who lived in the late Eastern Han Dynasty .
Bittor Alkiza Fernández ( born 26 October 1970 ) is a Spanish retired footballer who played for both Real Sociedad and Athletic Bilbao .
Abraham Yakin ( Hebrew : אברהם יכין‎ ; 1924- ) is an Israeli artist .
Li Qiming ( Chinese : 李启明 ) ( September 1915 -- December 19 , 2007 ) was a People 's Republic of China politician .
Sorin Antohi ( born 20 August 1957 ) is a Romanian historian , essayist , and journalist .
Nelly Wies - Weyrich ( born 1933 ) is a Luxembourgian archer .
Kapil Muni Tiwary ( born 1932 ) is a former professor and head of the department of Linguistics and Literature at Patna University and currently a professor of English in Yemen .
Simon James Musk ( 7 January 1985 ) is a British professional wrestler better known by his ring name El Ligero .
Zachary Mason ( born 1974 ) is a computer scientist and author .
Louis Tsatoumas ( Greek : Λούης Τσάτουμας , born 12 February 1982 ) is a Greek long jumper .
Pavlo Polubotok ( Ukrainian : Павло Полуботок ) ( born around 1660 , died on 29 December 1724 ) , was a Cossack political and military leader and Acting Hetman of the Left - bank Ukraine between 1722 and 1724 .
Pietro Francesco Caccialupi ( Pizzighettone , 1735 - April 19 , 1814 ) was an Italian painter .
Sonali Deraniyagala ( born 1964 in Colombo ) is a Sri Lankan memoirist and economist .
Melissa Breen ( born 17 September 1990 ) is an Australian 100 metres and 200 metres runner .
Chikondi Mpulula ( Born in 1993 in Malawi ) is a Malawian footballer who currently plays as a striker for the Malawian football club , Blue Eagles FC of Lilongwe in the Malawi Premier Division .
Mateus Alberto Contreiras Gonçalves ( born 7 March 1983 ) , commonly known as Manucho , is an Angolan professional footballer who plays for Spanish club Rayo Vallecano as a striker .
Nicholas Robinson - Baker ( born 24 June 1987 ) is an English diver .
George Wharton Edwards ( March 1859 -- January 18 , 1950 ) was an American impressionist painter and illustrator , and the author of several books of travel and historical subjects .
Tamara van Ark ( born 11 August 1974 ) is a Dutch politician and former civil servant and management consultant .
Saint Peter Yu Tae - chol ( 유대철 베드로 ) ( c. 1826 -- October 31 , 1839 ) was one of the 103 canonised Korean Martyrs and a son of a government interpreter named Augustine Nyou Tjin - kil , also a martyr .
Richard Swain ( born 2 July 1975 in Tamworth , New South Wales ) is a retired professional rugby league footballer of the 1990s and 2000s .
Masood Khalili , also Massoud Khalili and Masud Khalili ( Persian : مسعود خلیلی‎ ; born 5 November 1950 ) is an Afghan diplomat , linguist and urbane poet .
Oliver Vikalo ( born 14 October 1991 Travnik , Bosnia and Herzegovina ) is a Canadian water polo player who lives in Calgary , Canada .
Kálmán Ghyczy de Ghicz , Assakürt et Ablánczkürt ( 12 February 1808 -- 28 February 1888 ) was a Hungarian politician , who served as Minister of Finance between 1874 and 1875 .
Christopher Odhiambo Okinda ( born 15 December 1980 ) is a prominent Kenyan actor , film director , producer , author and radio presenter .
Dominic Barton ( born 1962 ) is a Canadian management consultant .
Gunnar Stavrum ( born 24 October 1961 ) is a Norwegian newspaper editor and author .
Elizabeth Doocey , Baroness Doocey OBE ( née O'Keefe ; born 2 May 1948 ) , best known as Dee Doocey , is a British Liberal Democrat politician and businesswoman , and a former Chair of the London Assembly .
Le Roux Smith Le Roux ( 1914 - -1963 ) , sometimes rendered LeRoux Smith LeRoux , was a South African artist , actor , broadcaster , art critic and art dealer , considered to be the most distinguished specialist muralist the country has produced .
Ananda Lal ( born 1955 ) is an Indian academic and theatre critic .
Leslie James Bennett ( 1920 -- October 18 , 2003 ) was a British / Canadian citizen who spend most of his working life as a counter - intelligence official , first for Britain 's GCHQ , and later for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police ( RCMP ) Security Service .
Mott T. Greene ( born 1945 ) is an American historian of science , and is John B. Magee Professor of Science and Values Emeritus , at the University of Puget Sound , from which he retired in 2012 .
Michael Eitan ( Hebrew : מיכאל איתן ; born 6 March 1944 ) is an Israeli politician .
Samuel Shuckford ( 1693?--1754 ) was an English cleric , antiquarian , and mythographer .
Nirmala Kishanchand Sadhu Singh Nagpal popularly known as Saroj Khan ( born 22 November 1948 ) is one of the most prominent Indian dance choreographers in Hindi cinema .
Sam Winterbotham ( born 1 October 1973 ) is a British college tennis coach and former college player .
Robert Racic ( 8 January 1964 -- 25 October 1996 ) was an Australian DJ and record producer .
Blythe Bohnen ( b. Evanston , Illinois , 1940 ) is an artist known for her minimalistic graphite drawings and photographs that capture the essence of motion .
Owen McDonnell ( born 1974 ) is an Irish actor best known for playing Garda Sergeant Jack Driscoll in RTÉ Television 's Single - Handed .
Jovan Damjanović ( Serbian Cyrillic : Joвaн Дaмjaнoвић ; born 4 October 1982 ) is a Serbian footballer , who last played for Novi Pazar in the Serbian SuperLiga .
Michael Dunbar ( 30 October 1863 -- 6 September 1921 ) was a Scottish footballer .
Miriam Glazer - Ta'asa ( Hebrew : מרים גלזר - תעסה‎ , born 11 August 1929 ) is an Israeli former politician who served as a member of the Knesset for Likud between 1981 and 1988 , and as Deputy Minister of Education and Culture from 1981 until 1984 .
Bill McGovern ( born 2 January 1937 ) is a British former auto racing driver from Ireland .
Erik Egeland ( 21 July 1921 -- 19 March 1996 ) was a Norwegian journalist and art critic .
Alessandro Cesca ( born 1 December 1980 ) is an Italian professional football player who currently plays for Lega Pro Seconda Divisione team Rimini .
Sir Callum McCarthy ( born 29 February 1944 ) is the former Chairman of the Financial Services Authority .
Guy d'Hardelot ( August 1858 -- January 7 , 1936 ) was the pen name of Helen Rhodes ( née Helen Guy ) , a French composer , pianist , and teacher .
Kjeld Kirk Kristiansen ( born 27 December 1947 ) is the former president and CEO of The Lego Group ( 1979 - -2004 ) .
Born on 22 December 1972 , Keyti , real name Cheikh Sène , is one of the first hardcore rapper emerging in the late mid-1990s in Senegal .
Wendy Harmer ( born Wendy Brown , 10 October 1955 in Yarram , Victoria ) is an Australian author , children 's writer , playwright and dramatist , radio show host , comedian and television personality .
Alan LeQuire ( born 1955 ) is an American sculptor from Nashville , Tennessee .
Dr Dame Katherine Anderson DBE BA PhD ( 4 July 1903 , Lytham St Annes , Lancashire -- 15 July 1979 , Northallerton , Yorkshire ) , known as Kitty Anderson , was headmistress of North London Collegiate School from 1945 - 65 .
Morris Schinasi ( Turkish : Moris Şinasi ; 1855 -- September 10 , 1928 ) was a wealthy American businessman in the tobacco industry and philanthropist of Ottoman origins .
Werner von Moltke ( born 24 May 1936 ) is a German former decathlete who won a European title in 1966 and finished second in 1962 .
Erminio Spalla ( 7 July 1897 -- 14 August 1971 ) was an Italian professional heavyweight boxer , film actor and singer .
Giovanni Battista Mancini ( 1 January 1714 -- 4 January 1800 ) was an Italian soprano castrato , voice teacher , and author of books on singing .
Peter Kinderman ( born 1965 ) is professor of Clinical Psychology at the University of Liverpool , and is a Chartered Clinical Psychologist .
Ramil Ganiyev ( Рамиль Ганиев ; born 23 September 1968 in Yangiabad , Surxondaryo Region ) is a retired Uzbekistani decathlete of Tatar parents .
Jean - Jacques Blairon ( born 9 August 1947 ) is a Belgian musician active in the 1980s under the name J. J. Lionel .
Gino Pivatelli ( born 27 March 1933 ) is a former Italian footballer who played for AC Milan and was part of their European Cup victory in 1963 .
Teresa Helena Higginson ( 27 May 1844 -- 15 March 1905 ) was a British Roman Catholic mystic .
Krystian Zalewski ( born 11 April 1989 in Drawsko Pomorskie ) is a Polish distance runner specialising in the 3000 metres steeplechase .

Li Yifu ( Chinese : 李義府 ; 614 - -666 ) was a chancellor of the Chinese dynasty Tang Dynasty , during the reign of Emperor Gaozong .

Rufina Amaya ( 1943 -- March 6 , 2007 ) was the sole survivor of the El Mozote massacre on December 11 and December 12 , 1981 , in the Salvadoran department of Morazán during the Salvadoran Civil War .

Ivan Zorman ( 1885 - 1957 ) was a Slovene poet and composer .
Seán Heuston , ( Irish : Seán Mac Aodha 21 February 1891 -- 8 May 1916 ) , born Jack Heuston , and sometimes referred to as J. J. Heuston , was an Irish rebel and member of Fianna Éireann who took part in the Easter Rising of 1916 .
Rosi Braidotti ( born 28 September 1954 ) is a contemporary philosopher and feminist theoretician .
Ziad Abu Amr ( Arabic : زياد أبو عمرو‎ ; born 1950 ) is a Palestinian politician , author , and member of the Palestinian Legislative Council .
Prof Very Rev Alexander Brunton DD FRSE FSA ( 1772 -1854 ) was a Scottish minister in the Church of Scotland who rose to its highest rank , Moderator of the General Assembly in 1823 .
Thomas Lever ( Leaver , Leiver ) ( 1521 - -1577 ) was an English Protestant reformer and Marian exile , one of the founders of the Puritan tendency in the Church of England .
K. Krishna Mohan ( born 21 August 1984 ) is an Indian track and field athlete who became the first Indian to break the 14 second barrier in 110 metre hurdles .
José Narciso da Cunha Rodrigues ( born 1940 ) is a Portuguese jurist and judge at the European Court of Justice .
Harry E. Luther ( 1952 -- October 17 , 2012 ) was an American botanist , having conducted extensive botanical expeditions to USA ( Florida ) , Mexico , Panama , Bolivia , Colombia , Ecuador , Peru and Brazil .
Blagoje Simić ( born 1 July 1960 in Bosanski Šamac , Bosnia and Herzegovina , then Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia ) is a Serbian war criminal who is sentenced by the International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia ( ICTY ) for his crimes during the Bosnia war .
Michiel van der Heijden ( born 3 January 1992 in Den Bosch ) is a Dutch mountain biker and Cyclo Cross Rider .
Nemanja Petrović ( Serbian Cyrillic : Немања Петровић ; born 17 April 1992 ) is a Serbian professional footballer who plays for Israel club Maccabi Netanya on loan from Partizan , as a left - back .
Mary Helen Bowers ( born 1979 ) is an American celebrity fitness guru , entrepreneur and former New York City Ballet dancer originally from Charlotte , North Carolina .
Paddy Devlin ( 8 March 1925 -- 15 August 1999 ) was an Irish social democrat and Labour activist , a former Stormont MP , a founder of the Social Democratic and Labour Party ( SDLP ) and a member of the 1974 Power Sharing Executive .
Naz Edwards ( born Nazig Dombalagian ( Armenian : Նազիգ Դոմբալագիան ) on February 2 , 1952 ) is an American voice actress , singer , and Broadway star who is most remembered as the voice of antagonist Queen Beryl in the DiC English version of Sailor Moon .
Alexander Horváth ( born 28 December 1938 ) is a former Slovak football player , of Hungarian ethnic origin .
John Pringle Nichol FRSE ( 13 January 1804 -- 19 September 1859 ) was a Scottish educator , phrenologist , astronomer and economist who did much to popularise astronomy in a manner that appealed to nineteenth century tastes .
Paul Siegfried ( born 1948 ) is an attorney based in New York City .
Danniel Thomas ( born 11 November 1992 ) is a Jamaican athlete whose specialty is the shot put .
Martin Jacques ( born 1945 ) is a British journalist and academic .
Egon Müller IV ( born 20 August 1959 ) , is a German winemaker and owner of the wine producer Weingut Egon Müller , Scharzhof , located just outside Wiltingen .
Sigurd Haveland ( born 30 March 1964 in Gibraltar ) is a Gibraltarian triathlete and cyclist .
David Carnegie , 5th Earl of Northesk ( 11 June 1701 -- 24 June 1741 ) was the son of David Carnegie , 4th Earl of Northesk and Lady Margaret Wemyss .
Roberto Sabatino Lopez ( October 8 , 1910 -- July 6 , 1986 ) , also known as Robert S. Lopez , was an Jewish - Italian - American historian of medieval European economic history .
Charles Erskine , Earl of Mar ( 19 October 1650 -- 23 May 1689 ) was a Scottish nobleman .
Pietro Ruffo ( born 1978 ) is an Italian contemporary artist .
Albert Eric Maschwitz OBE ( 10 June 1901 -- 27 October 1969 ) , sometimes credited as Holt Marvell , was an English entertainer , writer , broadcaster and broadcasting executive .
Dušan David Pařízek ( 10 August 1971 ) is a Czech theatre director , mostly working in German - speaking countries .
William Henry Smith , 5th Viscount Hambleden , known as Henry Smith ( born 18 November 1955 ) , is a British peer , and descendant of the founders of the stationery group W H Smith .
Stevie Appleton ( born 1 May 1989 , Surrey , England ) is a British singer , songwriter and record producer .
Jonathan Mullin ( born 1978 ) is an Irish journalist , former footballer and coach .
Li Jinjun ( simplified Chinese : 李进军 ; traditional Chinese : 李進軍 ; pinyin : Lǐ Jìnjūn ; born May 1956 ) is a Chinese diplomat and currently the Chinese Ambassador to North Korea .

Howard Blum ( /ˈblʌm/ ) ( born 1948 ) is an American author and journalist .

Malcolm Nash ( born 9 May 1945 ) is a Welsh cricket coach and former first - class cricketer .
Alessandro Marchesini ( 30 April 1664 -- 27 January 1738 ) was an Italian painter and art merchant of the late - Baroque and Rococo , active in Northern Italy and Venice .

Robert Forester Mushet ( 1811 - -1891 ) was a British metallurgist and businessman , born on 8 April 1811 , in Coleford , in the Forest of Dean , Gloucestershire , England .
Antonia Rados ( born 15 June 1953 in Klagenfurt , Carinthia ) is an Austrian television journalist working for RTL Television since 1993 .
Nea - Stina Liljedahl ( born 16 January 1993 ) is a Finnish footballer currently playing for FC Honka 's women 's team in the Naisten Liiga .
Deepak Tripathi , PhD , FRHistS , FRAS ( born 1951 ) is a British historian with particular reference to South Asia , the Middle East , the Cold War and the United States in the post - Soviet world .
Linda Lappin is a poet , novelist , and translator born in Tennessee in 1953 .
Daithí Cooney ( born 1954 ) is an Irish retired hurler who played as a goalkeeper for the Cork senior team .
Glesca Marshall ( 1907 - -1987 ) was an actress and theatrical benefactor who was known primarily as the most enduring lover of Alla Nazimova , silent screen actress and a legend of her time .
Maria Zuchowicz ( born in Poznań , in 1930 ) - Polish lawyer and figure skating official - Chairperson of Appeal Commission of the International Skating Union , Vice - President of the Polish Figure Skating Associations .
William Henry Monk ( 16 March 1823 -- 1 March 1889 ) was an English organist , church musician and music editor who composed popular hymn tunes , including one of the most famous , `` Eventide '' , used for the hymn `` Abide with Me '' .
Maya Rosa Ariana Stefanie ( born 17 August 1986 in Wonosobo ) better known as Maya Rosa , is an Indonesian professional tennis player .
Dirk Heidolf ( b. 14 September 1976 , Hohenstein ) is a former German Grand Prix motorcycle road racer .
Dani real name Danielson Gomes Monteiro ( born 6 February 1984 ) is Cape Verdean footballer .
Miriam Lord ( b. 1962 ) is an Irish journalist and political sketch writer employed by The Irish Times newspaper .
Nematjan Zakirov ( Russian : Нематжан Закиров ; born 1 January 1962 ) is a former Kyrgyzstani international footballer .
Janelle Smiley ( born 1981 ) is an American ski mountaineer and mountain climber .
Samuel Bowly ( 1802 - -1884 ) was an English slavery abolitionist and temperance advocate .
Born in 1835 , Kicking Bird was a Kiowa though his grandfather had been a Crow captive who was adopted by the Kiowa .
Desha Bhakta Konda Venkatappaiah or Konda Venkatappayya B.L. ( Telugu : కొండా వెంకటప్పయ్య ) ( 1866 - -1948 ) was a noted lawyer , Indian freedom fighter and politician from Andhra Pradesh . , He is one of the founders and first editor of `` Krishna Patrika '' , leading weekly Telugu magazine during the early 20th century .
Emil Bodnăraș ( 10 February 1904 , in Iaslovăț , Suceava County -- 24 January 1976 ) was an influential Romanian Communist politician , an army officer , and a Soviet agent .

Mohamed Ould Tolba ( born 1962 ) was the Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mauritania from 2002 to 2003 .
Sadia Azmat ( Urdu : عظمت سعدیہ‎ ; born 1987 ) is an English stand - up comedian of Pakistani descent .
Pierre - Joseph van Beneden FRS FRSE FGS FZS ( 19 December 1809 -- 8 January 1894 ) was a Belgian zoologist and paleontologist .
Detta O'Cathain , Baroness O'Cathain , OBE ( surname pronounced oh ka - HOYN , born 2 February 1938 , County Limerick ) is an Irish - born British businesswoman and politician .
Cliffton Delroy Yee Narm Ho aka Cliff Ho ( born 19 December 1985 ) is an international VJ and TV host , writer , producer & director .
Fahrudin Radončić ( pronounced ( rǎdoːnt͡ʃit͡ɕ ) ; born 24 May 1957 in Montenegro then Yugoslavia ) is a Bosnian businessman and politician .
Kylie Robilliard ( born 11 June 1988 ) is an athlete from Guernsey , who most notably took part in the 2010 Commonwealth Games .
Carl Ertel ( born 15 October 1959 ) is a retired German rower who won one gold and one silver medal in the coxless pairs at the world championships of 1982 - -1983 , rowing with Ulf Sauerbrey .
Mohammad Sharif ( born 1933 in Nepal ) , was the head of the Youth Unit , Centre for Social Development and Humanitarian Affairs at the United Nations from 1979 - -1987 and then became in charge of 3 sections : disability , ageing and youth sections .
Gitobu Imanyara ( born c. 1954 ) is a Kenyan human rights lawyer , journalist , and politician .
Bishop William Andrew Macdonell , Roman Catholic Bishop of Alexandria in Ontario , Canada was born on 30 November 1853 at Rivière - aux - Raisins , Saint Clair County , Michigan .

Darcy Moore ( born 25 January 1996 ) is an Australian rules footballer who currently plays for the Collingwood Football Club .
Liz Halliday ( born 14 December 1978 ) is an auto racing driver , equestrian rider , and commentator .
Gilles Dreyfus ( born 24 May 1951 ) is a French cardiac surgeon .
Derek Warfield ( born 1943 ) is an Irish singer , songwriter , historian , and a founding member of the musical group Wolfe Tones .
Sir Archibald Ross OBE ( 1867 - 19 March 1931 ) was a pioneering marine engineer .
Napoleon Sarony ( March 9 , 1821 -- November 9 , 1896 ) was an American lithographer and photographer .
Klaus Kotter ( 27 May 1934 -- 13 May 2010 ) was a West German - German tax consultant who served as the third president of the Fédération Internationale de Bobsleigh et de Tobogganing ( FIBT -- International Bobsleigh and Tobogganing Federation ) , serving as interim from 1978 to 1980 , then as president from 1980 to 1994 .
Ferdinand Alexander Porsche ( 11 December 1935 -- 5 April 2012 ) , nicknamed `` Butzi '' , son of Ferry Porsche , grandson of Ferdinand Porsche , was a German - Austrian designer whose best known product was the first Porsche 911 .
Fanjanteino Félix ( née Rakotomalala ; born 26 January 1980 ) is a French middle distance runner .
Kelvin Graham ( born 27 April 1964 ) is an Australian sprint canoer who competed in the late 1980s and early 1990s .
Ante Pešić ( born 27 August 1974 ) is a retired Croatian football player who was the bronze medalist in the 1999 Russian Top Division with PFC CSKA Moscow .
Tsai Ing - wen ( Chinese : 蔡英文 ; pinyin : Cài Yīngwén ; born 31 August 1956 ) is a Taiwanese politician who is the president - elect of the Republic of China , the first woman elected to the office .
Guyi Shen(born 8 March 1979 , in Hangzhou , China ) is an entrepreneur best known as the founder and CEO of Save22 , South - East Asia 's largest mobile shopping application .
Akashdeep Saigal aka ' Sky Walker ' ( born 29 October 1974 ) is an Indian model and a television actor .
Tallaal Adrey ( born 1975 ) is an Australian citizen from Auburn , New South Wales sentenced to four years imprisonment in Kuwait on terrorism - related charges .
Ulrich Noethen ( born 18 November 1959 ) is a German actor who has appeared in many movies and TV films .
Baimurat Allaberiyev ( born 20 February 1971 ) also known as Tajik Jimmy , is a vocalist and musician from Tajikistan of Uzbek ethnic origin .
William Birkmyre ( 1838 - 19 April 1900 ) was Liberal Member of Parliament ( MP ) for Ayr Burghs from 1892 to 1895 .
Lieutenant - Colonel Sir Vijay Ananda Gajapathi Raju pronunciation ( 28 December 1905 -- 2 December 1965 ) , better known as the Maharajkumar of Vizianagram or Vizzy , was an Indian cricketer , cricket administrator and politician .
Hassan Mourhit ( born 2 January 1982 ) is a Moroccan - Belgian long - distance runner .
Eddie Powell ( 9 March 1927 - 11 August 2000 ) was a British stuntman and actor .
Ty Votaw ( born February 1962 ) is an American lawyer and an executive in the golf industry .
Elena Antoci ( née Buhăianu , divorced Iagăr ; born 16 January 1975 in Braşov ) is a Romanian middle distance runner who specializes in the 1500 metres .
Frank Land FBCS ( born 1928 ) is an information systems researcher and was the first United Kingdom Professor of Information Systems .
Fabrizio Poletti ( born 13 July 1943 ) is a former Italian football manager and former player who played as a full - back .
Claudio von Planta ( born 16 September 1962 ) is a Swiss cameraman , director and filmmaker , based in London .
Caroline Wilson ( born Julia Caroline Wilson , 7 June 1960 ) is a multiple Walkley Award winning Australian sports journalist .
Trần Huỳnh Duy Thức ( born 29 November 1966 ) is a Vietnamese engineer , entrepreneur and human rights activist .
Italo Viglianesi ( 1 January 1916 -- 19 January 1995 ) was an Italian trade unionist politician and syndicalist .
Kim Sæther ( born 1975 at Lille Skensved , near Køge ) , better known as DJ Noize is a Copenhagen - based Danish hip - hop - DJ . His company , Noizeworks places all his activities under one moniker .
Maurice Manning ( born 14 June 1943 ) is an Irish academic and former Fine Gael politician .
Vakhtang Kolbaia ( Georgian : ვახტანგ ყოლბაია ; born 9 September 1952 ) is a Georgian politician .
Rohan Spong ( born 15 September 1981 ) is an Australian film director and photographer .
Gerard McKeown ( born 1980 ) is a writer from Ballymena , Northern Ireland .
Yaronsho Ngalung ( born 21 , January 1978 ) is a social activist , scholar and a politician from the Tangkhul Naga tribe in the state of Manipur , India .
Peter Hounam ( born 1944 ) is a British journalist who has worked for Sunday Times , Daily Mirror , the London Evening Standard , and BBC Television , as well as having published several books .
William Spetz ( born 4 April 1996 in Umeå ) is a Swedish comedian and television personality .
Abdullah CD ( real name Cik Dat bin Anjang Abdullah ) ( born October 1923 ) was the Chairman and currently General Secretary of the Communist Party of Malaya ( CPM ) .
B. R. Dionysius ( born 1969 ) is an Australian poet , editor , arts administrator and educator .
Wang Hongyao ( Chinese : 王洪尧 ; born November 1951 ) is a general ( shang jiang ) of the People 's Liberation Army ( PLA ) of China .
Sebastjan Sovič ( born 26 February 1976 in Slovenj Gradec , Slovenia ) is a retired professional handball player .
Lowell Fitz Randolph ( 7 October 1894 - 28 May 1980 ) was an American scientist , in the field of genetics , botany and horticulture .
Oscar Bronner ( born 14 January 1943 ) is an Austrian newspaper publisher and painter .
John Sloss ( born 1956 ) is an entertainment lawyer and film sales agent , who has executive produced over 50 films including the Academy Award - winning The Fog of War and Boys Do n't Cry .
Simon Colosimo ( born 8 January 1979 ) is an Australian retired football ( soccer ) player who played as a central defender .
Samuel Rostill Lines ( 15 January 1804 -- 9 November 1833 ; sometimes listed as Samuel Restell Lines ) was an English painter and illustrator .
Florian Opahle ( born 1983 ) is a German rock musician best known for his work with progressive rock artist Ian Anderson of band Jethro Tull .
Stephen Stubbs ( born 1951 ) is a lutenist and music director and has been a leading figure in the American early music scene for nearly thirty years .
Jackie Bird ( née Macpherson , born 31 July 1962 in Bellshill , North Lanarkshire ) is a Scottish journalist and newsreader , currently anchor of BBC Scotland 's news programme Reporting Scotland .
Jukka Hartonen ( born 14 March 1969 in Kiihtelysvaara ) is an active Finnish cross country skier who competed from 1991 to 1998 and again from 2006 to present day .
Branko Tucak ( born 19 June 1952 in Runović , SFR Yugoslavia ) is a Croatian former professional football player who last coached the Rwandan national team .
David Clarkson ( born 10 September 1985 ) is a Scottish footballer who currently plays for St Mirren , on loan from Scottish Premiership side Motherwell .
Jesús Dagoberto Perdomo Chávez ( b. 13 October 1967 in Santa Bárbara ) is a Honduran doctor and politician .
Adela Christian Bach Bottino ( born 9 May 1959 ) is an Argentine - Mexican actress and producer of telenovelas .
Tretius Kauhangengo ( born 1981 ) , better known as Tre Van Die Kasie , most commonly referred to as Tre is a Namibian kwaito musician and rapper .
John de Silva ( 1857 - -1922 ) was an influential Sri Lankan playwright .
Lucas Miré ( born 1972 ) is an American singer / songwriter based in Atlanta , Georgia , whose music is characterized by personal lyrics , relationship themes , and melancholy melodies .
Lawrence of Ilok ( Croatian : Lovro Iločki , Hungarian : Újlaki Lőrinc ; c. August 1459 -- c. June 1524 ) was a Croatian nobleman , a member of the Iločki noble family , very wealthy and powerful in the Kingdom of Hungary - Croatia .
Ashley Horace Thorndike ( 1871 -- April 17 , 1933 ) was an American educator and expert on William Shakespeare .
Adam Frelin ( born 1973 ) is an American artist working in sculpture . , video , photography , and performance .
Ben Rahav ( Hebrew : בן רהב‎ ; born 29 April 1989 ) is an Israeli footballer who currently plays at Hapoel Kfar Saba .
Vladimir Avilov ( born 10 March 1995 ) is an Estonian professional footballer of Russian descent who plays as a central defender for Estonian Meistriliiga club Infonet and the Estonia national football team .
Robert Scott Thompson ( born 1959 , California ) is a composer of ambient , instrumental and electroacoustic music .
Abraham Petros I Ardzivian ( Armenian : Աբրահամ Պետրոս Ա. Արծիւեան ; 1679 - 1749 ) was an Armenian Catholic Catholicos Patriarch of Cilicia .
Derek Kreckler is an Australian visual artist , born in Sydney in 1952 .
Ralph Cupper ( born 9 August 1954 ) is an organist , director and composer who was born and raised in Norwich , within the county of Norfolk , England .
Igor Crnadak ( born 28 July 1972 ) is a Bosnian politician , Minister of Foreign Affairs of Bosnia and Herzegovina since March 2015 .
Shailesh Jogia , known as `` Joe '' ( born 13 November 1975 ) is an English former professional snooker player of Indian descent .
Henriette Grové ( September 26 , 1922 - December 15 , 2009 ) is a South African writer of Afrikaans origin .
Alexander Gonzalez ( born 1946 ) is the 11th president of California State University , Sacramento ( Sacramento State ) , where he began in 2003 .
Joan of Artois , Countess of Foix , Viscountess of Béarn ( French : Jeanne d'Artois ; 1289 -- after 24 March 1350 ) , was a French noblewoman , and the wife of Gaston I de Foix , Count of Foix , Viscount of Béarn .
Penny Spencer ( born 1 January 1948 ) is a British actress , best remembered for her performance as coquettish schoolgirl Sharon Eversleigh in the long - running LWT television comedy series Please Sir ! ( 1968 - 70 ) .
Erik Lester Eriksson ( born 16 November 1942 ) is a retired Swedish swimmer who won two bronze relay medals at the 1966 European Aquatics Championships .
Anna Mei ( 10 July 1967 ) is a racing cyclist , mountain biker and a breaker of long - distance ( 24h ) records .
J. Quin Monson ( born 1969 ) is an associate professor of political science at Brigham Young University and the director of the BYU Center for the Study of Elections and Democracy .
Karel Uyttersprot ( born 10 July 1949 in Denderbelle ( Lebbeke ) ) is a Belgian politician and is affiliated to the N - VA .
Anja Mihr ( born 1969 ) is a German political scientist and human rights researcher , who has worked largely in the area of international human rights regimes , human rights education and within the civil society sector .
Heinz Jost ( 9 July 1904 -- 12 November 1964 ) was an SS - Brigadeführer and a Generalmajor ( Brigadier General ) of Police .
Tomas Maier ( born 1957 ) is a German - born designer who is Creative Director at the Italian luxury lifestyle brand Bottega Veneta , which is part of Kering .
Sutapa Biswas ( born 1962 ) is a British Indian conceptual artist .
Mary Jane Marcasiano ( born September 23 , 1955 ) is an American fashion and costume designer , film producer , and social entrepreneur .
Gu Jinchi ( Chinese : 顧金池 ) ( February 1932 -- March 17 , 2009 ) was a People 's Republic of China politician .
Mel Broughton ( born 5 July 1960 ) is a British landscape gardener who has risen to public prominence as one of the UK 's most notable animal rights advocates .
Ary Scheffer ( 10 February 1795 -- 15 June 1858 ) was a Dutch - French Romantic painter .
Mickey Herskowitz was born as Milton Leon Herskowitz in 1933 in Houston , Texas to Herbert S. and Sarah Rheva Herskowitz , perhaps most notable as the former ghost writer to George W. Bush .
Rahul Bose ( born 27 July 1967 ) is an Indian film actor , director , screenwriter , social activist , and rugby player .
Borislav Tsonev ( Bulgarian : Борислав Цонев ; born on 29 April 1995 ) is a Bulgarian footballer .
Marvin Zelen ( June 21 , 1927 -- November 15 , 2014 ) was Professor Emeritus of Biostatistics in the Department of Biostatistics at the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health ( HSPH ) , and Lemuel Shattuck Research Professor of Statistical Science ( the first recipient ) .
Guido Pedroni ( 21 August 1883 -- 6 February 1964 ) was an Italian professional footballer , who played as a forward , and football referee .
Valeriya Kononenko ( born 14 May 1990 ) is a Ukrainian racing cyclist .
Tania Davis ( born 4 July 1975 ) is the first violinist of the British / Australian classical crossover string quartet bond .
Nanette Hassall ( born 1947 ) is an Australian dancer , choreographer and dance teacher .
Count László Listi de Köpcsény et Jánosháza ( List , Listi , Listh , Listhy , Liszti , Liszty , Listius ; 1628 -- February 16 , 1662 ) was a Hungarian poet and criminal , who was executed for counterfeiting coins in 1662 .
Rashid Zia ( born 6 April 1974 in Gujranwala , Punjab , Pakistan ) is an American cricketer .
Marcello Ciorciolini ( born in 1922 ) is an Italian screenwriter , director , playwright , television and radio author and lyricist .
Louis Ng Kok Kwang ( Chinese : 黄国光 ; born 8 December 1978 ) is a Singaporean politician and founder of Animal Concerns Research and Education Society ( ACRES ) .
Henk Jaap Beentje ( born 1951 , Bakkum ) is a Dutch botanist .
Hamdan Al Abri ( born 18 April 1981 in Dubai ) is a Singer / Songwriter and one of the founders and front man of Dubai - based soul band ABRI .
Preethi Nair ( born 1971 ) is a British author of Indian heritage .
Mike Hallett ( born 2 July 1959 ) is an English former professional snooker player and television sports commentator .
Athanase Jean , better known by the name of Doctor Jean , was born on 24 November 1861 at Saint - Cesaire , Charente - Maritime , into a family of winemakers .
O. Panneerselvam ( born 14 January 1951 ) is an Indian politician who served as Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu from 2001 to 2002 and again from 2014 to 2015 .
Martina Krupičková ( Czech pronounced ( Kru - pich - kov - ah ) ) ( born 15 September 1975 ) is a Czech artist who paints in the Post - Impressionism style .
David K. Hoadley ( born 1938 ) is the first known storm chaser and was founder of Storm Track magazine .
Stuart Littler ( born 19 February 1979 in Higher End , Wigan , Greater Manchester , but a lifelong resident of Leigh ) is an English rugby league player .
Iekeliene Stange ( pronunciation : EE - kuh - LEE - nuh ; born 27 July 1984 ) is a Dutch fashion model .
Sabine Everts ( born 4 March 1961 ) is a former West German heptathlete .
Seyni N'Diaye ( born 6 September 1973 ) is a retired Senegalese football striker formerly played with AEL FC in Cyprus .
Randy DuBurke ( born 1962 ) is an American artist best known as the author and illustrator of the Steptoe Award winning book The Moon Ring ( 2003 ) and as the illustrator of Yummy : the Last Days of a Southside Shorty ( 2010 ) .
László Lakos ( born 31 August 1945 ) is a Hungarian veterinarian and former politician , who served as Minister of Agriculture between 1994 and 1996 .
Martí Guixé ( born 1964 ) is a Spanish designer living in Barcelona and Berlin .
Povl Ahm CBE FICE FREng ( 26 September 1926 -- 15 May 2005 ) was a structural engineer and former chairman of Ove Arup & Partners .
Yves Gentet ( 1965 - -present ) , is a French engineer , known for inventing a process to create multicolored holograms .
Tore Pryser ( born 9 January 1945 ) is a Norwegian historian , who has served as professor at the Lillehammer University College since 1993 .
Paolo Di Canio ( born 9 July 1968 ) is an Italian football manager and former professional footballer .
Faysal Ali Warabe ( pronunciation fah - EE - suhl AH - lee wah - RAH - bee ) ( Somali : Faysal Cali Waraabe , Arabic : فيصل علي ورابي‎ ) ( born 1948 ) , also spelled Faisal Ali Warabe , is a Somali engineer and politician .
Jonathan Coy is a British actor born in Hammersmith , London on 24 April 1953 .
Patricia Hooker ( 17 February 1933 -- 2001 ) was an Australian writer who worked extensively in England .
Capt . Henry Lee I ( 1691 - -1747 ) was a prominent Virginian colonist , brother of Governor Thomas Lee , grandfather of Revolutionary War hero Henry `` Light Horse Harry '' Lee , and great - grandfather of Confederate general Robert E. Lee .
Michael Mahonen ( born 27 April , 1964 ) is a Canadian actor , director and screen writer .
Mal Blum ( born 1988 ) is an American songwriter and performer from New York Critics often remark on Blum 's strength as a lyricist .
William Lawrence Bottomley ( born February 24 , 1883 in New York , New York ) , was a noted architect in twentieth - century New York , New York , Middleburg , Virginia and Richmond , Virginia .

Þráinn Bertelsson ( born 30 November 1944 ) is an Icelandic film director , writer , politician , journalist and newspaper editor .
Dion Dublin ( born 22 April 1969 ) is an English former footballer and TV presenter .
Mayilvahanan Natarajan was born as the third child of Dr. Natarajan and Janaki on 24 December 1954 .
Angus Gardner ( born 24 August 1984 ) is an Australian professional rugby union referee who was appointed to the Super Rugby referees panel in 2012 .
Ernest Joseph Bailly , ( or Baillu , ) who was born at Lille in 1753 , studied first in the Academy of Ghent , then at Antwerp , and subsequently at Paris .
Judy Jordan ( b. 1961 ) is an American poet .
John Lasarus Williams ( 29 October 1924 -- 15 June 2004 ) , known as John L , was a Welsh nationalist activist .
Michael Mailer ( born 1964 ) is a film producer and the oldest son of Beverly Bentley and writer Norman Mailer .
Patrick Murphy Malin ( 1903 -- December 13 , 1964 ) was an American activist and administrator who followed Roger Nash Baldwin as the second Executive Director of the American Civil Liberties Union .
Kanubhai Hasmukhbhai Tailor was born on 17 May 1956 in a small village of Adas , in the Kheda district of the Indian state Gujarat , in a family with meagre financial resources .
Joe Wiseman Howland , M.D. , Ph.D. ( 21 December 1908 -- 12 October 1978 ) a pioneer researcher in radiation toxicity , health and safety .
Armando Aste ( born 6 January 1926 ) is one of the most influential Italian alpinists of the postwar period .
Li Shenglin ( Chinese : 李盛霖 ; pinyin : Lǐ Shènglín ; born November 1946 ) is a Chinese politician .
Alexandr Rodin , sometimes spelled as Alexander Rodin ( Belarusian : Аляксандр Родзін ; Belarusian pronunciation : Aliaksandr Rodzin ; born 15 May 1947 ) is a Belarusian contemporary painter , and is currently ( August 2011 ) residing in Berlin , Germany .
S’manga Khumalo ( born 29 November 1985 ) is a South African Thoroughbred horse racing jockey .
Paul Van Nevel ( born 4 February 1946 ) is a Belgian conductor , musicologist and art historian .
Henry Hering was an American sculptor who was born New York City on February 15 , 1874 and died there on January 17 , 1949 .
Bertil Nordahl ( 26 July 1917 -- 1 December 1998 ) was a Swedish footballer and football manager .
Frank Meysman ( born as François Louis Virginie Meysman on 6 April 1952 ) is the Chairman of the travel company Thomas Cook Group plc . Frank Meysman is a Belgian national ( Dutch - speaking ) .

Yep Kramer ( born 15 November 1957 ) is a Dutch - Frisian long track and marathon speed skater .
Jim Haney ( born c. 1949 ) was the head basketball coach at the University of Oregon in Eugene for five seasons , from 1978 to 1983 .

Arie W. Kruglanski ( born in 1939 ) is a social psychologist best known for his work on Cognitive Closure .

Pelly Ruddock Mpanzu ( born 17 July 1993 ) is an English footballer who plays for Luton Town .

Mustafa Hulusi ( born in 1971 , London , United Kingdom ) is a British artist .

Pietro Forquet ( born 1925 ) is an Italian bridge player , one of the most famous in bridge history .

Carina Cruz Arenas , ( born 18 April 1983 ) , is a Colombian actress , model and designer .
Alesha Dixon ( born 7 October 1978 ) is a British singer , dancer , rapper , model and television presenter from Welwyn Garden City , England .

Karle Hammond ( born 25 April 1974 in Widnes , Cheshire ) is an English former professional rugby league footballer of the 1990s and 2000s .
Siarhei Byk ( Belarusian : Сергей Александрович Бык ; born 8 July 1990 ) is a Belarusian foil fencer , member of the national team .

Declan Carr ( born 30 July 1965 ) is an Irish retired hurler who played as a midfielder for the Tipperary senior team .

Major General Charles Ramsay Stirling Stein ( born 1897 , date of death unknown ) was a Canadian Army officer who commanded the 5th Canadian ( Armoured ) Division during World War II .

Panagiotis Stroubakos ( Greek : Παναγιώτης Στρουμπάκος ; born 8 September 1972 in Athens ) is a retired Greek middle distance runner who specialized in the 800 metres .

Malin Wollin , ( born 8 December 1978 ) is a Swedish journalist , writer and blogger .

Countess Noemi Marone Cinzano ( born 1957 ) is an Italian businessperson .
Sabina Khatun ( Bengali : সাবিনা খাতুন ; born 25 October 1993 ) is a Bangladeshi international footballer who plays as a Forward for Bangladesh team and Mohammedan .

James G. Aton , best known as Jim Aton or Jimmy Aton ( 1925 -- September 16 , 2008 ) was an American jazz bassist , pianist , vocalist and composer .
Rohan Hancock ( born 18 June 1955 in Toowoomba , Queensland ) is an Australian former rugby league footballer of the 1970s and 80s .
Charles Alfred Kellett ( born circa 1820 in Plymouth , Devonshire ) was a British Master Mariner famous for having sailed the Chinese Junk Keying from China , around the Cape of Good Hope to the United States and England between 1846 and 1848 .
Jozef Regec ( born 29 March 1965 in Kežmarok , Prešov Region ) was a Czechoslovak national bicycle team member between 1986 and 1993 and Czech between 1993 and 2000 .
Paul Hollander ( born 1932 in Hungary ) is an American political sociologist , communist studies scholar and non - fiction author .
Shane Mortimer ( born 24 December 1955 ) is a Ngambri man with a strong connection to the local Canberra region .
Peter Blanker ( born 11 June 1939 in Delfshaven ) is a Dutch singer and artist .
Brian Roy Goble , ( January 4 , 1957 -- December 7 , 2014 ) , also known as Wimpy Roy or Brian `` Sunny Boy Roy '' Goble , was a Canadian singer and musician .
Imerio Massignan ( born 2 January 1937 ) is an Italian former professional road cyclist .
Joseph Bell DeRemer ( 1871 - -1944 ) , who lived and worked in Grand Forks , North Dakota , was one of the finest architects in North Dakota .
Mario Gaspar Pérez Martínez ( born 24 November 1990 ) , known simply as Mario ( Spanish pronunciation : ( ' maɾjo ) ) , is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for Villarreal CF as a right back .
Émile Vadbled ( born 21 April 1876 , date of death unknown ) was a French cyclist .
Jack McCallum ( born 1949 ) is an American novelist and sportswriter .
Vicko Bujović ( 1660 -- May 6 , 1709 ) was a Venetian military commander and captain of Perast .
Dirk Kreimer ( born 12 July 1960 ) is a German physicist who pioneered the Hopf - algebraic approach to quantum field theory with Alain Connes and other co - authors .
Virgilije Nevjestić ( 22 November 1935 - 25 August 2009 ) was a Croatian graphic artist , painter and poet who lived in Paris .
Rev. Michael C. McFarland , S.J. ( born 1948 ) was the 31st president of the College of the Holy Cross in Worcester , Massachusetts .
Gianfranco D'Angelo ( born 19 August 1936 ) is an Italian actor and comedian .
Benjamin Goodfellow ( 12 January 1864 -- 11 June 1946 ) was a British solicitor and philatelist who signed the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists in 1923 .
Mihai Olteanu ( born 14 April 1980 in Piteşti ) is a former Romanian footballer . , he played all his career for Mioveni .
Moses Chamberlain Edey ( 1845 - -1919 ) was an Ottawa architect who designed the Aberdeen Pavilion at Lansdowne Park , a National Historic Site and the Daly Building ( 1905 - 1992 ) which was Ottawa 's first department store .
Sir James Oxenden , 2nd Baronet ( 4 April 1641 -- 29 September 1708 ) , of Dene , Kent was an English politician who sat in the House of Commons between 1679 and 1702 .
Jack Rubinacci ( born Giuliano Alberto Brian Rubinacci 31 August 1975 ) is an Anglo - Italian singer , musician and songwriter .
Richard Cohn ( born 1955 ) is a music theorist and Battell Professor of Music Theory at Yale .
Frank Irving ( 7 April 1925 -- August 2005 ) was a British aeronautical engineer , glider pilot , author and university Senior Lecturer .
Céline Distel - Bonnet ( born 25 May 1987 ) is a French athlete competing in the sprinting events .

Coluthur Gopalan FRCP , FRS , FAMS , FASc ( born 29 November 1918 ) is an Indian nutritionist .

Sonny Esslemont ( born 29 December 1993 ) is a professional rugby league player for Hull KR . He plays as a back - rower , and is currently part of Hull KR 's first team .

Mark Pellew CVO ( born 28 August 1942 ) , a British diplomat , was Her Britannic Majesty 's Ambassador to the Holy See 1998 - 2002 .
Alex Coutinho ( born 19 June 1959 ) is a Ugandan physician , public health advocate , academic , and Executive Director of the Infectious Diseases Institute of Makerere University .
Yvetta Hlaváčová ( born 26 May 1975 ) is a Czech national team member in long - distance swimming and women 's world record holder from swimming the English Channel in a time of 7 h , 25 mins .
Joseph LaDou ( 1938- ) is an occupational and environmental medicine physician and founding editor of the International Journal of Occupational and Environmental Health .
Ian Venables ( born 1955 ) is a British composer of art songs and chamber music .
Skip Palenik ( born 1946 ) is an American analytical microscopist , forensic scientist , lecturer , and author .
Robert Colquhoun ( 20 December 1914 -- 20 September 1962 ) was a Scottish painter , printmaker and theatre set designer .
Mamdouh bin Abdulaziz ( born 1940 ) is the former governor of the Tabuk Province and a member of Saudi royal family , House of Saud .
Odeen Ishmael ( born 1948 ) is a veteran retired Guyanese diplomat .
Jan Waters ( born 28 January 1937 ) is an English actress of the theatre , television , and film .
Murari Rao Ghorpade ( 1699 - 1779 ) , known simply as Murari Rao , was an army general in the Maratha Army from Gooty who administered the fort of Tiruchirappalli and surrounding areas from 1741 to 1743 .
Rupert Read ( born 1966 ) is an academic and a Green Party politician in England .
Thomas P. Riccio ( born 1955 ) is an American multimedia artist and academic .
Megan Burns ( born 25 June 1986 ) , also known as Betty Curse , is a British musician and actress .
Humphrey Foulkes ( 1673 - -1737 ) was a Welsh priest and antiquarian .

Shmulik Perlman ( 1925 -- 24 September 2003 ) was an Israeli football player and manager .
Pat Denner ( 1924 -- September 25 , 2011 ) was the designer of Vegas Vic .
Claire Eagan ( born 1950 ) is a district judge for the United States District Court for the Northern District of Oklahoma .

Julia Beljajeva ( born 21 July 1992 ) is an Estonian épée fencer , 2013 world champion and 2014 team world silver medallist .
Hariss Harun ( born 19 November 1990 ) is a Singaporean footballer who plays for Malaysia Super League side Johor Darul Ta'zim as a central midfielder .
Scott Quigg ( born 9 October 1988 ) is a British professional boxer and the current WBA super bantamweight champion .
Olié Koffi Kan Tobie ( born 7 June 1984 in Sincody ) is an Ivorian footballer who last played Moroccan side Hassania Agadir .
Ahmad Allam - Mi ( born 1948 ) is a Chadian diplomat who has been Secretary - General of the Economic Community of Central African States since 2013 .
John Jacob Zink ( 1886 - 1952 ) was an American architect who designed movie houses in Washington , D.C. , and Baltimore .
Sheenagh Pugh ( born 20 December 1950 ) is a British poet , novelist and translator who writes in the English language .
Gülşen Bubikoğlu ( born 5 December 1954 , İstanbul ) is a Turkish actress , one of the leading ladies of Turkish cinema in the 1970s and into the early 1980s .
Oltion Luli ( 18 August 1969 ) born in Shkodër he is a former Albanian athlete , who competed at the 2000 Summer Olympic Games in the Men 's 100 m he finished 8th in his heat and failed to advance .
Carl Norac ( born 29 June 1960 ) is a Walloon Belgian author of children 's books and poetry .
Alaa Abdulkareem Fartusi ( c. 1978 -- February 10 , 2008 ) was an Iraqi journalist for al - Furat , a Shiite - backed satellite news station .
Boštjan Frelih ( born 10 February 1993 ) is a Slovenian footballer who plays as left - back defender for Inter Zaprešić in the Prva HNL .
Mikey Mileos ( born 6 December 1980 ) is a stand up comedian and comedy writer from Sydney , Australia who lives in Arizona , USA .
Jessica Manley ( born 1985 ) is a British actress who has had appearances in a number of movies and numerous plays and TV series .
Horace Finch ( 23 July 1906 -- 28 September 1980 ) was an English pianist and organist .
Yvonne Ducksworth ( born in 1967 in Burlington , Ontario ) is a Canadian singer , actress ( known for Trouble ) and TV presenter .
Sir Joseph Gurney Pease , 5th Baronet ( born 16 November 1927 ) is a British hotelier and a Liberal Party politician .
Abraham David Sofaer ( born May 6 , 1938 ) is a former federal judge for the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York , and then a Legal Adviser to the United States State Department .
Eugene Kang ( born 1984 ) is the Special Projects Coordinator and Confidential Assistant to President Barack Obama .
Ani Batikian ( born 22 November 1982 ) is an Armenian violinist currently living in Scotland .
Yogaraj Bhat ( born 8 October 1973 ) is an Indian Kannada film director , lyricist , producer and screenwriter .
Nahum Het ( Hebrew : נחום חת‎‎ , born 1896 , died 15 January 1990 ) was an Israeli politician who served as a member of the Knesset for the General Zionists between 1951 and 1955 .
Maksim Lukashevich ( Belarusian : Максiм Лукашэвiч ; Russian : Максим Лукашевич ; born 28 March 1992 ) is a Belarusian footballer .
Dr. Miklós Baranyai ( 1934 - -1997 ) was a Hungarian physician and politician , member of the National Assembly ( MP ) for Hatvan ( Heves County Constituency IV ) between 1990 and 1994 .
François Coulomb the Younger ( La Ciotat , 1691 - Toulon , July 1751 ) was a French naval architect ( ingénieur - constructeur ) , the son of François Coulomb the Elder .
Bill Gaston ( born 1953 ) is a Canadian novelist , playwright and short story writer .
Åsa Beckman ( born 1961 ) is a Swedish literary critic .
Maren Meinert ( born 5 August 1973 in Rheinhausen ) is a retired German football midfielder / striker and currently the coach for the German U-20 Women 's squad .
Srinu Pandranki ( Telugu : శ్రీను పాండ్రంకి ) ( born 5 October 1987 ) is an Indian author , short film maker and screenwriter .
Field Marshal Dr. Mohammed Aly Fahmy ( 11 October 1920 -- 11 September 1999 ) , known as the `` father of the Egyptian Air Defense '' graduated from the Egyptian Military Academy in 1940 .
Marek Čmejla ( * 7 June 1967 ) A Czech entrepreneur and musician .
Sir Joseph Child Priestley , KC , JP , DL ( 11 January 1862 -- 9 June 1941 ) was an English lawyer , active in public life in Hertfordshire .
John Shiwak ( 1889 -- November 20 , 1917 ) born Rigolet , Labrador , and died at Masnieres , France , when a German shell exploded killing him and six of his fellow soldiers during the First World War .
Crispin S. Gregoire ( born 1956 , Commonwealth of Dominica ) is the Permanent Representative to the United Nations for the Commonwealth of Dominica .
Dan Glass ( born c. 1959 ) is the current president of the Kansas City Royals Major League Baseball team .
Michael Barton Akehurst ( 1940 - 4 October 1989 ) was an international lawyer .
Owen Martin O'Hagan , ( 23 June 1950 -- 28 September 2001 ) was an Irish investigative journalist from Lurgan , Northern Ireland and a former member of the Official Irish Republican Army who spent much of the 1970s in prison .
Louis - Raphaël Bischoffsheim ( 22 June 1800 -- 14 November 1873 ) was a German banker , from the Bischoffsheim family .
Stanley Frederick Utz ( 17 May 1898 - 6 May 1974 ) was an Australian businessman and official of the Australian Liberal Party .
John L. Lahey ( born 1946 ) is the president of Quinnipiac University .
Stephen Sargent Visher ( 1887 - 1967 ) was an American regional geographer and eugenicist .
Bert de Ruijter ( born 1952 ) , known as Leigh Blond , is a Dutch composer , singer and songwriter .
Baek Min - chul ( Korean : 백민철 ; born 2 April 1986 , in Seoul ) is a Korean professional ice hockey center .
Tom Jaine ( born 4 June 1943 ) is a former restaurateur , a food writer and the proprietor of Prospect Books .
Stacy McGaugh ( born 11 January 1964 ) is an American astronomer and professor in the Department of Astronomy at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland , Ohio .
Jean - Albin Régis ( born 19 February 1912 ) was a French sports shooter .
Jeffery John Mumford Speed CBE FRSA FInstLM FRGS ( born 3 October 1936 ) was Director of Fundraising and the Treasurer 's Department at Conservative Central Office ( 1995 - -96 ) .
Lisa Castel ( born 1955 in Quela , Malanje Province ) , is an Angolan writer and journalist .
Stewart Fellows ( born 9 October 1948 ) is an English former professional footballer who played as a half - back in the Football League for York City , in non - League football for King 's Lynn , and was on the books of Newcastle United without making a league appearance .
Michael Laudrup ( born 15 June 1964 ) is a retired Danish footballer and former manager of Qatar Stars League club Lekhwiya .
Jouni Joensuu ( born 26 October 1962 ) is a Finnish football manager currently working as the Executive Director for FC Jazz .
Roland Huntford ( born R. Horwitch in 1927 ) is an author , principally of biographies of Polar explorers .
Helga Gunerius Eriksen ( born 11 October 1950 ) is a Norwegian novelist and children 's writer .
Ruth Emmanuella Davies ( born 1967 ) , known professionally as Rudi Davies , is an English actress , the daughter of Alan Sharp ( 1934 - 2013 ) and the writer , Dame Beryl Bainbridge ( 1932 - -2010 ) .
Catherine C. Blake ( born 1950 ) is the Chief United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the District of Maryland .
Clas Håkan Jesper Strömblad ( born 28 November 1972 ) is a Swedish musician who is the guitarist for the bands Dimension Zero and The Resistance .
Clyde Apperson ( born 1955 ) a.k.a . C was arrested on Nov. 6th 2000 for running the largest illicit LSD manufacturing operation in the history of the United States with partner William Leonard Pickard .
James P. Hynes ( born 1948 ) is the founder of COLT Group , one of the United Kingdom 's largest telecommunications businesses .
`` Spencer Gene Settles was born in Houston , Texas on 25 February 1953 to the late Paul Silas and Martha Ann Tate Settles .
Julien Alexandre Achard de Bonvouloir ( 10 May 1749 Passais - la - Conception - 1783 ) was a secret French envoy to the American colonies , in 1775 .
Ama Agbeze ( surname pronounced `` Ab - wear - zeh '' ) ( born 12 November 1982 in Selly Oak , England ) is an English international netball player .
Jeremiah Hacker ( 1801 - -1895 ) was a reformer and journalist who lived and wrote in Portland , Maine from 1845 to 1866 .
Jung Seung - hwa ( Hangul : 정승화 ; born 27 March 1981 ) is a South Korean épée fencer , individual bronze medallist and team silver medallist at the 2015 World Fencing Championships .

Thomas Gumpert ( * 11 December 1952 in Lauchhammer , Brandenburg ) is a German actor .
Jonathan Pedley ( born 1962 ) is a British authority on wine .
Jin Zhenji ( Chinese : 金振吉 ; Korean Hangul : 김진길 ; RR : Gim Jin - gil ; born February 1959 ) is a Chinese politician of Korean ethnic origin .
Janne Tolsa ( born 7 March 1970 ) is a Finnish heavy metal musician .

Kieran Hanrahan is an Irish radio host and musician , born in Ennis , Co. Clare in 1957 .

DJ Clazzi ( born Kim Sung Hoon ; 15 November 1974 ) , also known simply as Clazzi , is a South Korean electronica musician .
Andrew Giddings ( born 10 July 1963 ) is an English keyboardist and was a member of Jethro Tull from 1991 to 2007 .
Ilya Nikkolai ( born 25 September 1939 in Kiev , Ukraine ) is an Australian visual music artist and architectural designer currently residing in Perth , Western Australia .
Brad Adkins ( born 1973 in Kalispell , Montana ) is a self - taught American artist and curator currently residing in Portland , Oregon .
Constance Isabel Smith ( born June 1894 , Battersea , London ) was a popular British novelist .
Marvin Goldstein ( born 1950 ) is an acclaimed professional pianist and performer .
Ato ( Mr. ) Mersha Nahusenay ( አቶ መርሻ ናሁሠናይ ) was born about 1850 near the town of Ankober , the former capital of Shewa .

Abigail Ozora Simpson ( born 1964 ) is a contemporary sculptor working in clay .
Marcel Dallemagne ( born c. 1898 ) was a French professional golfer who won several prestigious tournaments in Europe in the 1930s and 1940s .
Herman Armour Webster ( b. New York City , 6 April 1878 ; d. 1970 ) was an American artist .
Thomas J. Wilson ( born 1958 ) is chairman , president and chief executive officer of The Allstate Corporation and Allstate Insurance Company .
Katherine Frances `` Katy '' Brand ( born 13 January 1979 ) is an English actress , comedian and writer , known for her ITV2 series Katy Brand 's Big Ass Show and for Comedy Lab Slap on Channel 4 .
Susanna Carson Rijnhart , ( 1868 - 1908 ) , better known as Susie Rijnhart or `` Doctor Susie , '' was a Canadian medical doctor , Protestant missionary , and Tibetan explorer .

Geoff Angus ( born 19 August 1948 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Hawthorn in the VFL .
Nigel Roder , ( born 1967 ) , also known professionally as Kester the Jester , was designated the official `` State Jester '' of England in 2004 by English Heritage .
Wolf Henzler ( born 5 April 1975 ) is a German professional racing driver known for his success with Porsches .
Alfonso Quijada Urías ( born 8 December 1940 ) , is a Salvadoran poet and an author .
Francis Aungier , 1st Baron Aungier of Longford ( 1558 - -1632 ) , also known as Lord Aungier , was the progenitor of the Earldom of Longford , member of the House of Lords , Privy Councillor for Ireland , and Master of the Rolls in Ireland under James I and Charles I.
Jesper Christensen ( Danish pronunciation : ( jesb̥ɐ ˈkʰʁɛsd̥n̩sn̩ ) ; born 16 May 1948 ) is a Danish actor .
Nayda Collazo - Llorens ( born 1968 in San Juan , PR ) is a visual artist whose work spans drawing , painting , printmaking , installation , video , and public art . Her work combines images , sound , and text to investigate how the mind processes information .
Peter Brabrook ( born 8 November 1937 ) is an English former footballer who made nearly 500 appearances in the Football League playing for Chelsea , West Ham United and Orient , and was capped three times for the England national team .
Goreti Venkanna ( born 1963 ) is a popular Indian poet and folk singer .
Mihret Abebe ( born 1988 ) is an Ethiopian beauty queen .

Joseph Lytle Moore ( 1826 -- December 1 , 1871 ) was an Irish - born lawyer and political figure in New Brunswick .

Andrey Yuryevich Yudin ( born 11 June 1967 ) is a former Russian futsal player and current head coach of Dina Moscow .
Hilario Chi Canul ( Born 16 October 1981 ) is a Mexican linguist of Maya ethnicity who worked as a translator and Yucatec Maya language coach in the production of the 2006 movie Apocalypto by Mel Gibson .
Estelle Winwood ( 24 January 1883 -- 20 June 1984 ) was an English stage and film actress who moved to the United States in mid - career and became celebrated for her wit and longevity .
Derwyn Jones ( born 14 November 1970 Carmarthen , Wales ) is a former professional Welsh rugby union player and Welsh international .

Miles Bland ( 1786 - -1868 ) was an English cleric and mathematician .
Andreas Zick ( born 1962 ) is professor of Socialization and Conflict Research at Faculty of Education Science , Bielefeld University .
Richard Durrant , Dip RCM , ARCM , FLCM ( born 2 November 1962 ) is an English guitarist & multi - instrumentalist .
Steve Selvin ( born 1941 ) is a professor of biostatistics at UC Berkeley .
Zoltan Hajos ( born 3 March 1926 ) is a Hungarian - born and trained American organic chemist .
Annmarie Adams ( born 1960 ) is an architectural historian and university professor .
Israel Militosyan ( Armenian : Իսրայել Միլիտոսյան , born 17 August 1968 ) is an Armenian former weightlifter .
Andy Reay ( born 1 April 1983 in Hillingdon ) is an English rugby union player for Moseley in the Aviva Championship .
Alpheus P. Hodges ( 1821 - July 29 , 1858 ) was the first Mayor of Los Angeles , California after the city was incorporated on April 4 , 1850 .
Laila Bērziņa ( born 1965 ) is a deputy of Līgatne City Council belonging to the New Era Party , currently she also work as a school teacher .
Tim Okamura ( born 1968 in Edmonton , Alberta , Canada ) is a contemporary Canadian painter known for his depiction of African - American and minority subjects in urban settings , and his combination of graffiti and realism .
Chris Calhoun , a Korean War veteran , was born in Opa - locka , Florida in 1934 .
Gédéon Foulquier ( 1855 - 1941 ) , was a French entomologist who specialised in Lepidoptera .

Vít Valenta ( born 4 January 1984 in Uherské Hradiště ) is a former Czech professional football player .
George Claude Lockhart ( 1885 - -1979 ) was the first ringmaster to wear the `` pink '' hunter tails and top hat , and was referred to in his World 's Fair obituary as `` The Doyen of Ringmasters '' .
Zhang Beisan ( Chinese : 张备三 , born 1952 ) , Chinese diplomat , is the former Ambassador to Angola and Portugal of the People 's Republic of China .
Haukur Ingi Guðnason ( born 8 September 1978 , in Keflavik ) is a retired Icelandic footballer who last played for Grindavík .
Grace Birungi ( born 10 October 1973 ) is an Ugandan runner who specialized in the 800 metres and to a lesser extent 400 metres .
Herbert Sutcliffe ( born 24 November 1894 at Summerbridge , Nidderdale , West Riding of Yorkshire ; died 22 January 1978 at Cross Hills , North Yorkshire ) was an English professional cricketer who represented Yorkshire and England as an opening batsman .

Hasan Iğsız ( born 1946 , Istanbul , Turkey ) is a retired General in the Turkish Army .
Hammadullah Khan ( or Hammad Ullah Khan ; born 1 October 1981 ) is a Pakistani - born Malaysian cricketer .
Robert R. Nathan ( 1908 - -2001 ) was a noted American economist who was heavily involved in US industrial mobilization during World War II . Prior to the war he had worked with the Commerce Department but was appointed chair of the War Production Board 's planning committee in 1942 .
Frano Mlinar ( born 30 March 1992 ) is a Croatian football player currently playing for Inter Zaprešić , on loan from Granada CF .
Yin T. Hsieh ( Traditional Chinese : 謝英鐸 ) ( Taiwan , 14 April 1929 ) is a Taiwanese scientist based in Dominican Republic .

Born in 1941 , Clive Coates worked for The Wine Society in Stevenage in the late 1960s and early 1970s .

Edward Sorel ( born Edward Schwartz , 26 March 1929 , the Bronx ) is an illustrator , caricaturist , cartoonist , and graphic designer whose work is known for its storytelling , its left - liberal social commentary its criticism of reactionary right - wing politics and organized religion .

Daphne Phelps ( 23 June 1911 -- 30 November 2005 ) was a British writer who spent most of her life in Taormina , Sicily .
Derek Foran ( born 9 October 1989 ) is an Irish footballer currently playing for Sacramento Republic .

Laura Leiner ( born 22 April 1985 ) is a Hungarian writer who made her publishing debut in 2005 .
Ali Kibar ( born 1958 ) is a Turkish businessman and diplomat .
Lew Yates ( born June 1947 in Sutton , St Helens ) also known as Wild Thing , was a boxer , doorman , bareknuckle and unlicensed fighter and all round hardman , associated with the fighting and criminal fraternity .

Mohammed Abduba Dida ( born 1974 ) is a Kenyan teacher who vied for the country 's presidency in the 2013 presidential elections on an Alliance of Real Change party ticket .
Patrick Henry Weathers ( born 1870 ) , commonly known as P.H. Weathers , was an architect of Jackson , Mississippi .
Øivind Larsen ( born 6 September 1938 ) is a Norwegian physician and Professor Emeritus of history of medicine at the University of Oslo .
Mark Camphouse ( born 1954 in Oak Park , Illinois ) is an American composer and conductor who has written primarily for symphonic winds , but whose output also includes works for orchestra , choir and chamber brass .
John Wooler ( born 1958 ) is a producer , former record label executive , and co - founder of Exolution .
Andros Kyprianou ( Greek : Άνδρος Κυπριανού ; 26 October 1955 ) is a Cypriot politician .
Stuart J Edelstein ( born 1941 ) is a biophysicist , emeritus professor from the University of Geneva , professeur extraordinaire at the École Normale Supérieure and visiting scientist at the Babraham Institute .

Liu Hongcai ( born June 1955 ) is a Chinese diplomat , currently the deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the Communist Party of China ; he is the former Chinese Ambassador to North Korea .
Llewelyn Powys ( 13 August 1884 -- 2 December 1939 ) was a British novelist and essayist and younger brother of John Cowper Powys and T. F. Powys .
János Veres ( born 5 February 1957 ) is a Hungarian politician , who served as Minister of Finance between 2005 and 2009 .
John Deasley ( 1861 - -1910 ) was a professional baseball player .
Parag Khanna ( born 27 July 1977 ) is an international relations expert and best - selling author .
Basil Chivers ( born 31 December 1939 ) was an English cricketer who played for Wiltshire .
Wang Lijun ( born 26 December 1959 ) is a former Chinese regional police chief .
Vaughan Savidge ( born 1956 ) is a British freelance newsreader and continuity announcer who works on BBC Radio 4 and BBC Radio 3 , and formerly the World Service .
Mary Ellen Tracy ( aka Sabrina Aset ) ( born 1943 ) is the high priestess of the Church of the Most High Goddess , who was convicted in 1989 of a single misdemeanor count of running a house of prostitution in connection with the operation of the church , located in West Los Angeles , California .
Aamer Gulzar ( born Rana Aamer Gulzar on 27 October 1985 ) is a former Pakistani cricketer .
Onofre Abellanosa ( 1913 -- 1974 ) was a Filipino Visayan writer of short stories and plays .
Neill Gorton ( born September 6 , 1969 ) is an English special effects artist , visual effects specialist and make - up artist specialized in animatronics and prosthetics .

Radek Dosoudil ( born 20 June 1983 ) is a Czech footballer , who plays as a centre back .

William Harrison Folsom ( 1815 - -1901 ) was an architect and contractor .
Steven Townsend is a self - taught artist who was born in Colne , Lancashire , in 1955 .
Callum Turner ( born 15 February 1990 ) is an English actor and model , who is known for his roles as Bill Rohan in Queen and Country and as Eli in E4 series Glue .
Pauline Joutard ( 1890 - -1957 ) was a French - born pianist who performed under the stage name Miirrha Alhambra .
Sir James Henderson - Stewart , 1st Baronet ( 6 December 1897 -- 3 September 1961 ) , born James Henderson Stewart , was a British banker , Army officer and politician .
