Murder Without Crime is a 1950 British crime film directed by J. Lee Thompson ( his first film ) and starring Dennis Price , Derek Farr and Patricia Plunkett .
The Law Is the Law ( French : La loi , c'est la loi , Italian : La legge è legge ) is a 1958 French - Italian comedy film directed by Christian - Jaque .
The Mountain Calls ( German : Der Berg ruft ) is a film directed by Luis Trenker which recreates the struggle between Edward Whymper and Jean - Antoine Carrel for the first successful ascent of the Matterhorn in 1865 .
Le Péril jeune ( French pronunciation : ​(ləpeʁil ʒœn ) ) or The Good Old Daze is a 1994 French coming of age comedy - drama directed by Cédric Klapisch .
La Roue ( pronounced : ( la ʁu ) , `` The Wheel '' ) is a French silent film , directed by Abel Gance , who also directed Napoléon and J'accuse!.
The White Storm , formerly known as The Cartel War ( Chinese : 掃毒 ) is a 2013 Hong Kong - Chinese crime thriller film directed by Benny Chan and starring Sean Lau , Louis Koo , and Nick Cheung .
Django , Prepare a Coffin ( Italian : Preparati la bara ! , lit . `` Prepare a Coffin ! '' ) , alternatively titled Viva Django , is a 1968 Italian spaghetti western film directed by Ferdinando Baldi .
Belle ma povere ( internationally released as Pretty But Poor ) is a 1957 Italian comedy film directed by Dino Risi .
Waldo Salt and Norman Wexler wrote the screenplay , adapting Peter Maas 's biography of NYPD officer Frank Serpico , who went undercover to expose corruption in the police force .
Big Momma 's House is a 2000 American comedy film directed by Raja Gosnell , written by Darryl Quarles and Don Rhymer , and starring Martin Lawrence as FBI agent Malcolm Turner .
Harmony Lessons ( Kazakh : Асланның сабақтары , Russian : Уроки гармонии ) is a 2013 Kazakh - German drama film directed by Emir Baigazin .
The Past Is a Foreign Land ( Italian : Il passato è una terra straniera ) is a 2008 Italian neo - noir film directed by Daniele Vicari .
Dallas 362 is a 2003 film , starring and directed by Scott Caan .
Les Bidasses en folie is a French comedy film directed by Claude Zidi released in 1971 .
Holy Smoke ! is a 1999 Australian drama film directed by Jane Campion , who co - wrote the screenplay with her sister Anna .
Die Scheinheiligen is a German low - budget comedy film , written and directed by Thomas Kronthaler and based on a true incident in his hometown of Irschenberg .
The Bucket List is a 2007 American comedy - drama film directed by Rob Reiner , produced by Reiner , Alan Greisman , Craig Zadan and Neil Meron , written by Justin Zackham , and starring Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman .
Day Night Day Night is a 2006 drama film written and directed by Julia Loktev , starring Luisa Williams .
Paolo Barca , Schoolteacher and Weekend Nudist ( Italian : Paolo Barca , maestro elementare , praticamente nudista ) is a 1975 Italian comedy film directed by Flavio Mogherini .
Young Winston is a 1972 British film based on the early years of British Prime Minister Winston Churchill .
Sexual Chronicles of a French Family ( French : Chroniques sexuelles d'une famille d'aujourd'hui ; lit : Sexual Chronicles of a Modern Family ) is a 2012 French comedy - drama film produced and directed by Pascal Arnold and Jean - Marc Barr .
Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge ( English : The Big - Hearted Will Take Away the Bride ) , also known by the initialism DDLJ , is an Indian romance film written and directed by Aditya Chopra and produced by Yash Chopra .
Piccolo mondo antico ( literally : Little Ancient World ) , also known as Old - Fashioned World , is a 1941 Italian drama film directed by Mario Soldati and based on the 1895 novel The Little World of the Past by Antonio Fogazzaro .
The Gang That Sold America ( Italian : Squadra antigangsters ) is a 1979 Italian `` poliziottesco''-comedy film directed by Bruno Corbucci .
Riding Giants is a 2004 documentary film directed and narrated by Stacy Peralta , a famous skater / surfer .
Night of the Ghouls is a 1958 horror film ( released in 1959 ) written and directed by Ed Wood , and a sequel of sorts to the 1955 film Bride of the Monster .
Quiero ser ( I want to be ... ) is a 2000 short drama film directed by Florian Gallenberger .
Grumpier Old Men was directed by Howard Deutch , with the screenplay written by Mark Steven Johnson and the original music score composed by Alan Silvestri .
Five Graves to Cairo is a 1943 World War II film by Billy Wilder , starring Franchot Tone and Anne Baxter .
Jonah Who Will Be 25 in the Year 2000 ( French : Jonas qui aura 25 ans en l'an 2000 ) is a 1976 Swiss film directed by Alain Tanner and written by Tanner and John Berger .
Carlo Giuliani , Boy ( Italian : Carlo Giuliani , ragazzo ) is a 2002 Italian documentary film directed by Francesca Comencini .
Payment on Demand is a 1951 drama film directed by Curtis Bernhardt that stars Bette Davis .
The Little Napoleon ( German : Der kleine Napoleon ) is a 1923 German silent historical comedy film directed by Georg Jacoby and starring Egon von Hagen , Paul Heidemann and Harry Liedtke .
The Longest Summer ( Simplified Chinese : 去年烟花特别多 , Traditional Chinese : 去年煙花特別多 ; lit : `` The Flurry of Fireworks last year '' ) is Hong Kong independent director Fruit Chan 's second feature in the `` 1997 trilogy '' , first released in 1998 .
The Left - Hand Side of the Fridge ( French : La Moitié gauche du frigo ) was the first full - length feature film by Canadian film director Philippe Falardeau , released in 2000 .
The Sino - Japanese War at Sea 1894 is a 2012 Chinese historical war film directed and written by Feng Xiaoning , starring Lu Yi , Xia Yu and others .
The January Man is a 1989 comedy / thriller film , directed by Pat O'Connor from a screenplay by John Patrick Shanley .
Good Dick is a 2008 film directed by Marianna Palka .
The Skin I Live In ( Spanish : La piel que habito ) is a 2011 Spanish psychological thriller film written and directed by Pedro Almodóvar , starring Antonio Banderas , Elena Anaya , Marisa Paredes , Jan Cornet , and Roberto Álamo .
So Can I ( Persian : منم میتونم , Manam mitunam‎ ) is a 1975 Iranian short film directed by Abbas Kiarostami .
It 's Always Fair Weather is a 1955 MGM musical satire scripted by Betty Comden and Adolph Green , who also wrote the show 's lyrics , with music by André Previn and starring Gene Kelly , Dan Dailey , Cyd Charisse , Dolores Gray , and dancer / choreographer Michael Kidd in his first film acting role .
Mankatha is a 2011 Indian Tamil black comedy - action film written and directed by Venkat Prabhu .
Her Favourite Husband ( also known by the alternative titles The Taming of Dorothy and Quel bandito sono io ) is a 1950 British - Italian comedy film directed by Mario Soldati and starring Jean Kent , Robert Beatty and Margaret Rutherford .
A Screaming Man ( French : Un homme qui crie ) is a 2010 French - Chadian drama film by Mahamat Saleh Haroun , starring Youssouf Djaoro and Diouc Koma .
Tarzan and His Mate is a 1934 American Pre - Code action adventure film based on characters created by Edgar Rice Burroughs .
Burnt Money ( Spanish : ' ' Plata quemada '' ) is a 2001 Argentine action thriller directed by Marcelo Piñeyro and written by Piñeyro and Marcelo Figueras .
La liceale seduce i professori ( literally The high school girl seduces the teachers , internationally released as How to Seduce Your Teacher ) is a 1979 commedia sexy all'italiana directed by Mariano Laurenti .
Toto and the King of Rome ( Italian : Totò e i re di Roma ) is a 1951 Italian comedy film directed by Mario Monicelli and Steno .
Fish and Elephant ( Chinese : 今年夏天 ; pinyin : Jīn nián xià tiān ; literally : `` This summer '' ) is documentary filmmaker and former TV hostess Li Yu 's feature film directorial debut .
Exit : una storia personale ( Exit : a personal history ) , is a 2010 Italian indie drama film written and directed by Massimiliano Amato and starring Luca Guastini , Nicola Garofalo , Marcella Braga , Paolo Di Gialluca and Antonio Calamonici .
The Duchess and the Dirtwater Fox is a 1976 Western romantic comedy film starring Goldie Hawn and George Segal , produced , directed and co - written by Melvin Frank .
The Doctor 's Horrible Experiment ( French : Le Testament du docteur Cordelier ) is a 1959 French black - and - white television film directed by Jean Renoir .
The Games of Countess Dolingen ( French : Les Jeux de la comtesse Dolingen de Gratz ) is a 1981 French fantasy - drama film written and directed by Catherine Binet and starring Carol Kane .
The Girls and Daddy is a 1909 American silent short drama film directed by D. W. Griffith with Griffith appearing in a small blackface role .
Flowers of Reverie ( Hungarian : Szirmok , virágok , koszorúk ) is a 1984 Hungarian drama film directed by László Lugossy .
Deadbeat at Dawn is a low - budget film written and directed by Jim Van Bebber and starring Paul Harper , Megan Murphy , and Marc Pitman .
Concrete Night ( Finnish : Betoniyö ) is a 2013 drama film directed by Finnish filmmaker Pirjo Honkasalo .
Kalos ilthe to dollario ( Greek : Greek : Καλώς ήλθε το δολλάριο , Welcome the Dollar ) is a 1967 Greek theatrical comedy film directed by Alekos Sakellarios .
Tarzan and the Leopard Woman was a 1946 action film based on the Tarzan character created by Edgar Rice Burroughs and portrayed by Johnny Weissmuller .
Living in Oblivion is a 1995 low - budget independent comedy - drama film , written and directed by Tom DiCillo and is also Peter Dinklage 's debut role .
The Big Tease is a 1999 comedy film starring Craig Ferguson , directed by Kevin Allen , and written by Ferguson and Sacha Gervasi .
The Time to Live and the Time to Die ( also known as A Time to Live , A Time to Die ; Chinese : 童年往事 ; pinyin : Tóngnián wǎngshì , lit . `` Incidents from a Childhood Past '' ) is a 1985 film directed by Hou Hsiao - Hsien .
Clandestine Childhood ( Spanish : Infancia clandestina ) is a 2011 Argentine historical drama film directed by Benjamín Ávila and starring Natalia Oreiro , Ernesto Alterio and César Troncoso .
Uthiripookkal ( English : Scattered flowers ) is a 1979 Indian Tamil drama film written and directed by J. Mahendran .
Saint John , the Beheaded ( Italian : San Giovanni decollato ) is a 1940 Italian comedy film directed by Amleto Palermi and Giorgio Bianchi and starring Totò , Titina De Filippo and Silvana Jachino .
8½ ( Italian title : Otto e mezzo ( ˈɔtto e ˈmɛddzo ) ) is a 1963 Italian comedy - drama film directed by Federico Fellini .
Death Rite ( French : ' ' Les Magiciens '' ) is a 1976 film co - written and directed by Claude Chabrol .
La banda Casaroli is a 1962 Italian crime - drama film directed by Florestano Vancini .
I Met Him in Paris is a 1937 film made by Paramount Pictures , directed by Wesley Ruggles , written by Claude Binyon , and starring Claudette Colbert , Melvyn Douglas , and Robert Young .
Männin is a 2015 French - German philosophical drama film ( short film ) written and directed by Mika'ela Fisher .
The Perfect Furlough is a 1958 romantic service comedy directed by Blake Edwards and written by Stanley Shapiro .
The Godfather Part II is a 1974 American epic crime film produced and directed by Francis Ford Coppola from a screenplay co - written with Mario Puzo , starring Al Pacino and Robert De Niro .
Hail the Judge ( Chinese : 九品芝麻官 ) is a 1994 Hong Kong comedy film directed by Wong Jing , starring Stephen Chow , Cheung Man , and Ng Man Tat .
The New Adventures of the Elusive Avengers ( Russian : Новые приключения Неуловимых , translit . Novye prikluchenya Neulovimykh ) is a 1968 Soviet action movie , a sequel of The Elusive Avengers , directed by Edmond Keosayan and made on Mosfilm .
Boxing Helena won Worst Director for Jennifer Lynch at the 14th Golden Raspberry Awards in 1994 .
Arsène Lupin Returns is a 1938 American mystery film directed by George Fitzmaurice and written by James Kevin McGuinness , Howard Emmett Rogers and George Harmon Coxe .
Aagathan ( Malayalam : ആഗതന്‍ ) is a 2010 Malayalam film directed by Kamal starring Dileep , Sathyaraj , Charmee Kaur and Lal .
The Monk and the Fish ( French : Le Moine et le poisson ) is a 1994 animated short film made by Michaël Dudok de Wit at the studio Folimage .
Lemmy pour les dames is a 1962 French eurospy film directed by Bernard Borderie .
Hercules , Samson and Ulysses , ( Italian : Ercole sfida Sansone ) is a 1964 Italian peplum film directed by Pietro Francisci .
Le Divorce is a 2003 Merchant Ivory Productions film directed by James Ivory from a screenplay by Ruth Prawer Jhabvala and Ivory , based on Diane Johnson 's best - selling novel of the same name .
Mozart 's Sister ( French title : Nannerl , la sœur de Mozart ) is a 2010 French drama film written and directed by René Féret and starring two of his daughters .
Die , Mommie , Die ! is a 2003 American satirical comedy film written by Charles Busch , who also plays the lead role .
A Soldier 's Story is a 1984 American drama film directed by Norman Jewison , based upon Charles Fuller 's Pulitzer Prize - winning Off Broadway production A Soldier 's Play .
The Clearstream Affair ( French title : L'Enquête ) is a 2014 thriller film directed by Vincent Garenq , based on the Clearstream scandal in 2001 .
Identity Thief is a 2013 American crime comedy film directed by Seth Gordon , written by Craig Mazin , and starring Jason Bateman and Melissa McCarthy .
The Exorcism of Emily Rose is a 2005 American courtroom drama horror film directed by Scott Derrickson and starring Laura Linney and Tom Wilkinson .
A Very Harold & Kumar 3D Christmas is a 2011 3D stoner comedy Christmas film directed by Todd Strauss - Schulson , written by Jon Hurwitz and Hayden Schlossberg , and starring John Cho , Kal Penn , and Neil Patrick Harris .
The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film , co - produced and directed by Todd Phillips and written by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore .
Only God Forgives is a 2013 Danish - French psychological thriller film written and directed by Nicolas Winding Refn , starring Ryan Gosling , Kristin Scott Thomas , and Vithaya Pansringarm .
`` Demon with a Glass Hand '' is an episode of The Outer Limits television series , the second to be based on a script by Harlan Ellison , which Ellison wrote specifically with actor Robert Culp in mind for the lead role .
Fellini Satyricon , or simply Satyricon , is a 1969 Italian fantasy drama film written and directed by Federico Fellini and loosely based on Petronius 's work Satyricon , written during the reign of the emperor Nero and set in imperial Rome .
A Man and His Dog ( Un Homme et Son Chien ) is a 2008 French film directed by French director Francis Huster , starring Jean - Paul Belmondo , based on the 1952 film Umberto D. directed by Vittorio De Sica , and written by Cesare Zavattini .
The New Barbarians ( Italian : I nuovi barbari ) is a 1983 Italian post - apocalyptic action film directed by Enzo G. Castellari .
Stowaway in the Sky ( French : Le Voyage en ballon ) is a 1960 French family adventure film , directed by Albert Lamorisse .
Farewell , My Queen was directed by Benoît Jacquot and based on a script by him , Chantal Thomas , and Gilles Taurand .
To Die For is a 1995 American crime comedy - drama film , made in a mockumentary format , directed by Gus Van Sant and written by Buck Henry , based on the novel of the same name by Joyce Maynard , which in turn was based on the factual story of Pamela Smart .
Il male oscuro ( internationally released as Dark Illness and The Obscure Illness ) is a 1990 Italian drama film directed by Mario Monicelli .
Back in Crime ( French : L'Autre Vie de Richard Kemp ) is a 2013 French crime film directed by Germinal Alvarez .
Searching for Bobby Fischer , released in the United Kingdom as Innocent Moves , is a 1993 American drama film written and directed by Steven Zaillian .
Putham Pudhu Payanam ( English : Brand New Journey ) is a 1991 Tamil language drama film directed by K. S. Ravikumar .
Subconscious Password is a 2013 3-D animated film by Chris Landreth offering an imaginary , comedic look at the inner workings of Landreth 's mind , as he tries to remember someone 's name at a party .
Motherland Hotel ( Turkish : Anayurt Oteli ) is a 1986 Turkish film directed by Ömer Kavur .
Lisa and the Devil ( Italian : Lisa e il diavolo ) is a 1973 Italian horror film directed by Mario Bava .
The Bird with the Crystal Plumage ( Italian : L'uccello dalle piume di cristallo ) is a 1970 Italian giallo film directed by Dario Argento , in his directorial debut .
In the Country Fell a Star ( Italian : In campagna è caduta una stella ) is a 1939 Italian comedy film directed by Eduardo De Filippo .
Guai ai vinti ( Woe to the Vanquished Ones ) is a 1954 Italian melodrama film directed by Raffaello Matarazzo .
Il tenente dei carabinieri ( The lieutenant of Carabinieri ) is a 1986 Italian crime - comedy film directed by Maurizio Ponzi .
The Amazing Mr. Blunden is a 1972 family mystery and ghost film directed by Lionel Jeffries , based on the novel The Ghosts by Antonia Barber .
The Intouchables ( French : Intouchables ( ɛ̃tuʃabl ) , UK : Untouchable ) is a 2011 French comedy - drama film directed by Olivier Nakache & Éric Toledano .
The Girl in the Café is a British made - for - television drama film directed by David Yates , written by Richard Curtis and produced by Hilary Bevan Jones .
In una notte di chiaro di luna ( internationally released as Crystal or Ash , Fire or Wind , as Long as It 's Love , also known as On a Moonlit Night and As Long as It 's Love ) is a 1989 Italian drama film directed by Lina Wertmüller .
If the Sun Never Returns ( French : Si le soleil ne revenait pas ) is a Franco - Swiss film directed by Claude Goretta , with a script written by the director , from the original novel by Charles Ferdinand Ramuz and stars Charles Vanel , Catherine Mouchet and Philippe Léotard .
Willy the Sparrow ( Hungarian : Vili , a veréb ) is a 1989 Hungarian animated film directed by József Gémes .
Face / Off was a spec script which writers Mike Werb and Michael Colleary tried to sell to a studio from as early as 1990 .
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * ( * But Were Afraid to Ask ) is a 1972 comedy film directed by Woody Allen .
Man at Bath ( French : Homme au bain ) is a 2010 French film by Christophe Honoré starring François Sagat and Chiara Mastroianni .
Romanzo popolare ( internationally released as Come Home and Meet My Wife ) is a 1973 Italian comedy drama film directed by Mario Monicelli .
Saravana is a 2006 Tamil action drama film directed by K. S. Ravikumar .
The Law of the Border ( Turkish : Hudutların Kanunu ) is a 1966 Turkish drama film , written by Yılmaz Güney and directed by Ömer Lütfi Akad .
The Color of Lies is a 1999 film co - written and directed by Claude Chabrol .
Snake Fang ( Persian : Dandan - e - mar‎ ) is a 1990 Iranian war film directed by Masoud Kimiai .
Ham and Eggs is an animated cartoon produced by Walter Lantz , and as part of the Oswald the Lucky Rabbit series .
Pathram ( English : The Newspaper ) is a 1999 Malayalam political thriller film written by Renji Panicker and directed by Joshi , starring Suresh Gopi , Murali , Manju Warrier , N. F. Varghese , Biju Menon , T. P. Madhavan and Spadikam George .
Distant Voices , Still Lives is a 1988 British film directed and written by Terence Davies .
Blind Woman 's Curse ( Japanese : 怪談昇り竜 ) is a 1970 Japanese action film directed by Teruo Ishii .
See How They Dance ( French : Voyez comme ils dansent ) is a 2011 French drama film directed by Claude Miller .
Vulcan , Son of Giove ( Vulcano , figlio di Giove ) is a 1962 Italian fantasy - adventure film directed and co - written by Emimmo Salvi in his directorial debut .
Formula for a Murder ( Italian : 7 , Hyden Park - La casa maledetta ) is a 1985 Italian giallo - horror film written and directed by Alberto De Martino ( here credited as Martin Herbert ) .
Live Like a Cop , Die Like a Man was based off a screenplay by Fernando Di Leo originally titled Poliziotti si nasce poliziotti si muore ( Born a Cop , Die a Cop ) .
The Clemenceau Case is a 1915 American silent drama film written and directed by Herbert Brenon and starring Theda Bara .
Separado ! is a 2010 British documentary film directed by Dylan Goch and focuses on Gruff Rhys going to South America in search of a distant relative René Griffiths .

The Children Are Watching Us ( Italian : I bambini ci guardano ) is a 1944 Italian drama film directed by Vittorio De Sica .
Season for Assassins ( Italian : Il tempo degli assassini , also known as The Time of the Assassin and Mad Men ) is a 1975 Italian poliziottesco - drama film written and directed by Marcello Andrei .
The White Ribbon is a 2009 black - and - white German - language drama film written and directed by Michael Haneke .
Diary of a Country Priest ( French : Journal d'un curé de campagne ) is a 1951 French film written and directed by Robert Bresson , and starring Claude Laydu .
I giorni contati ( internationally released as His Days Are Numbered , The Days are Numbered and Numbered Days ) is a 1962 Italian drama film directed by Elio Petri .
Mad Dog Morgan is a 1976 Australian bushranger film directed by Philippe Mora and starring Dennis Hopper , Jack Thompson and David Gulpilil .
La seconda volta non si scorda mai ( `` The second time is never forgotten '' ) is a 2008 Italian romantic comedy film directed by Francesco Ranieri Martinotti and starring Alessandro Siani and Elisabetta Canalis .
The Terminator is a 1984 American science fiction action film directed by James Cameron , written by Cameron and the film 's producer Gale Anne Hurd , and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger , Michael Biehn and Linda Hamilton .
37 1/2 , sometimes written 37 og et halvt is a 2005 Norwegian comedy - drama film directed by Vibeke Idsøe , starring Helén Vikstvedt .
Bye Bye Monkey ( Italian : Ciao maschio , French : Rêve de singe ) is a 1978 Italian - French film , directed by Marco Ferreri and starring Gérard Depardieu , Marcello Mastroianni , James Coco and Geraldine Fitzgerald .
Uno contro l'altro , praticamente amici ( Against one another , virtually friends ) is a 1981 Italian comedy film directed by Bruno Corbucci .
Lord of Illusions is a 1995 American horror film written and directed by Clive Barker , based on his earlier short story , The Last Illusion ( from Books of Blood Vol . 6 ) .
Your Friends & Neighbors is a 1998 black comedy film written and directed by Neil LaBute and starring Amy Brenneman , Aaron Eckhart , Catherine Keener , Nastassja Kinski , Jason Patric , and Ben Stiller in an ensemble cast .
Nina Frisk is a Swedish comedy film from 2007 , written and directed by Maria Blom .
Salò , or the 120 Days of Sodom ( Italian : Salò o le 120 giornate di Sodoma ) , commonly referred to as simply Salò ( Italian : ( saˈlɔ ) ) , is a 1975 Italian - French art film written and directed by Pier Paolo Pasolini , with uncredited writing contributions by Pupi Avati .
Una bella governante di colore is a 1976 Italian commedia sexy all'italiana directed by Luigi Russo and starring Renzo Montagnani with Pasolini muse Ines Pellegrini .
The Last Minute is a 2001 British urban gothic film , written and directed by Stephen Norrington .
Do n't Play with Tigers ( Italian : Ricchi , ricchissimi ... praticamente in mutande ) is a 1982 Italian comedy film directed by Sergio Martino .
The Olsen Gang Long Gone ( Danish : Olsen - banden over alle bjerge ) is a 1981 Danish comedy film directed by Erik Balling and starring Ove Sprogøe .
Under Ten Flags ( Italian : Sotto dieci bandiere ) is a 1960 Italian - American war film directed by Duilio Coletti .
Alle tijd ( US Title : Time to Spare ) is a Dutch film directed by Job Gosschalk and starring Paul de Leeuw and Karina Smulders .
Based on the novel The 25th Hour by David Benioff , who also wrote the screenplay , it tells the story of a man 's last 24 hours of freedom as he prepares to go to prison for seven years for dealing drugs .
The film was adapted by Dudley Nichols from the plays The Moon of the Caribbees , In the Zone , Bound East for Cardiff , and The Long Voyage Home by Eugene O'Neill .
Maria Marten , or the Mystery of the Red Barn is a 1913 British silent drama film directed by Maurice Elvey .
Periya Kudumbam ( English : Big Family ) is a 1995 Tamil drama film , directed by K. S. Ravikumar , starring Prabhu , Kanaka , Vineetha , Manorama , Vijayakumar , Lakshmi , Chandrasekhar , Chithra , Goundamani , Senthil .
Tokyo - Ga is a 1985 documentary film ( shot in spring 1983 ) directed by Wim Wenders ostensibly about filmmaker Yasujiro Ozu .
Camille Claudel 1915 is a 2013 French biopic written and directed by Bruno Dumont .
In the Name of the Sovereign People ( Italian : In nome del popolo sovrano ) is a 1990 Italian historical comedy - drama film written and directed by Luigi Magni .
Cela s'appelle l'aurore ( English : This is Called Dawn ) is a 1956 Franco - Italian film , directed by Luis Buñuel .
Jakob the Liar is a 1999 American drama film directed by Peter Kassovitz and starring Robin Williams , Alan Arkin , Liev Schreiber , Hannah Taylor - Gordon , and Bob Balaban .
Natale a Rio ( Christmas in Rio ) is a 2008 Italian cinepanettone directed by Neri Parenti with Christian De Sica .
Colombiana is a 2011 French action film , co - written and produced by Luc Besson and directed by Olivier Megaton .
Sex Traffic is a British - Canadian drama two - part series directed by David Yates , written by Abi Morgan , and produced by Veronica Castillo and Derek Wax .
Demons of War ( Polish : Demony wojny według Goi ) is a 1998 Polish war drama by Władysław Pasikowski set during the Bosnian War .
Adrien 's Story ( French : Histoire d'Adrien ) is a 1980 Occitan language French drama film written , directed and produced by Jean - Pierre Denis .
The Virgin of Stamboul is a 1920 American drama film directed by Tod Browning and starring husband and wife team Priscilla Dean and Wheeler Oakman and featuring Wallace Beery in a supporting role .
This Happy Feeling is a 1958 film by Blake Edwards adapted from the F. Hugh Herbert play For Love or Money .
The Citroën DS ( French pronunciation : ​(sitʁoɛn de ɛs ) ) is a front - engine , front - wheel - drive executive car manufactured and marketed by the French company Citroën from 1955 to 1975 in sedan , wagon / estate and convertible body configurations .
Edith Charlotte Price ( 1872 - -1956 ) was an English female chess master .
Máel Coluim , Earl of Angus , ruled roughly 1214 - -1240 , was mormaer of Angus , and the last of his family in the male line with title over that province .
Andrew Lesuuda ( b. 1991 - 04 - 15 ) is a male long - distance runner from Kenya .
Ip Pui Yi ( Chinese : 葉珮兒 ; pinyin : Yè Pèi'ér ; Jyutping : jip6 pui3 ji4 ; born November 28 , 1978 ) is a Hong Kong female sport shooter .
Helen May Butler ( 1867 - -1957 ) was an American bandleader and composer who has been called `` The female Sousa '' .
Wu Jiani ( Chinese : 吴佳妮 ; 1966 - ) is a former female Chinese gymnast .
Sarah Groenewald ( born 5 May 1985 in Lilydale , Victoria ) is a female Australian football ( soccer ) player who currently plays for Melbourne Victory in the W - League ( Australia ) .
Miyuki Fukumoto née Aoyama ( born 4 January 1977 ) is a female high jumper from Japan .
Natasha Brennan ( born October 11 , 1986 ) is a female rugby union and represented England at the 2014 Women 's Rugby World Cup .
Wang Zhengming ( born February 16 , 1990 in Guangzhou , Guangdong ) is a male badminton player from China .
Assa Koïta ( born June 28 , 1991 in Vitry - sur - Seine ) is a French female rugby union player .
Meliha İsmailoğlu ( born Meliha Smajlović on September 17 , 1993 in Gradačac , Bosnia and Herzegovina ) is a Bosnian - Turkish female volleyball player .
' Herman Puig ( born German Puig Paredes on 25 February 1928 ) is a pioneer of male nude photography .
Brooke Krueger - Billett ( born 9 July 1980 in Tailem Bend ) is a female hammer thrower from Australia .
Years later , Russ Regan publicly disclosed his surprise and confusion that Dahlstrom 's albums had not been high profile successes , saying , `` In my career there are two female singer / songwriters who I signed , that should 've been stars , Patti Dahlstrom and Harriet Schock '' .
Yan Fang ( simplified Chinese : 阎芳 ; traditional Chinese : 閻芳 ; pinyin : Yán Fāng ; born July 26 , 1969 ) is a female Chinese softball player .
María Gabriela Pazos ( born September 20 , 1967 ) is a retired female field hockey player from Argentina .
In Norse mythology , Jörð ( Icelandic `` earth '' , pronounced ( ˈjœrð ) and from Old Norse jǫrð , pronounced ( ˈjɔrð ) , sometimes Anglicized as Jord or Jorth ; also called Jarð , ( jɑrð ) as in Old East Norse ) , is a female jötunn .

Jun Mizutani ( Japanese : 水谷 隼 ; born 9 June 1989 ) is a male Japanese table tennis player .
Anna Jelmini is an American female track and field athlete .
Xie Zhongbo ( Chinese : 谢中博 ) , is a male badminton player from People 's Republic of China .
Zita Urbonaitė ( September 3 , 1973 -- May 26 , 2008 ) was a female road racing cyclist from Lithuania .
Zhang Xiyan(simplified Chinese : 张喜燕 ; traditional Chinese : 張喜燕 ; pinyin : Zhāng Xǐyàn ; April 22 , 1980 in Harbin , Heilongjiang ) is the most successful female Chinese amateur and professional boxer .
Rie Ueno ( born June 11 , 1976 ) is a female long - distance runner from Japan , who is best known for winning the women 's 5,000 metres at the 1999 Summer Universiade .
Fábio Paranhos Marcelino nicknamed Pinha ( born 11 March 1973 ) is a former Brazilian male volleyball player .
Myrella Cohen QC FRSA LLD ( Hon ) ( Manchester , 1927 -- October 2002 ) was one of the first female judges in Great Britain .
Baptiste Giabiconi ( born 9 November 1989 ) is a French male model and singer from Marignane , France .
Cara - Beth Burnside , nicknamed `` CB '' , is a pioneer of women 's professional skateboarding and snowboarding from Orange , California and ranks amongst the top female athletes in these sports in the world .
Song Kai ( born 1984 - 01 - 29 ) is a male Chinese rower , who competed for Team China at the 2008 Summer Olympics .
Marie Owens ( 1853 - -1927 ) is believed to have been the first female police officer in the U.S. , joining the Chicago Police Department in 1891 , and retiring in 1923 .

Moheschunder Bannerjee ( Bengali : মহেশচন্দ্র বন্দ্যোপাধ্যায় , fl . 1850 ) or Mahesh Chandra Banerjee was a strong chess player from Bengal , many hundred of whose games survive through the writings of John Cochrane , who regularly played Bannerjee between 1848 and 1860 , during Cochrane 's tenure at the Calcutta bar .
J. Timothy Gannon , a.k.a . Tim Gannon , is an American businessman and polo player .
Craig Fitzgibbon ( born 16 June 1977 ) is an Australian former professional rugby league footballer of the 1990s , 2000s and 2010s .
FC Wacker München is a German association football club of about 200 members based in the Sendling borough of Munich , Bavaria .
Jaroslav Levinský ( born 11 February 1981 ) is a professional doubles tennis player from the Czech Republic .
Western Sydney Wanderers FC Youth is an Australian semi - professional association football team based in the western region of Sydney , New South Wales .
Rhys Priestland ( born 9 January 1987 ) is a Welsh international rugby union player .
The 2000 Cairns Cyclones season was the fifth and final season that the Cairns Cyclones rugby league team competed in the Queensland Cup .
Martin Mrva ( born 12 December 1971 , Prešov ) is a Slovakian chess grandmaster .
Christophe Laussucq ( born May 20 , 1973 in Bordeaux ) is a retired rugby union player and current coach for CA Brive in the Top 14 .
Steve Moria ( born February 3 , 1961 ) is a British - Canadian ( dual nationality ) professional ice hockey player .
Joe Loprieno ( born October 8 , 1986 ) is an American former professional ice hockey player who played in the American Hockey League ( AHL ) and ECHL .
Briggs Sports F.C. was an English amateur association football team .
Debbie Graham or Debbie Graham Shaffer ( born August 25 , 1970 ) is a retired women 's tennis player from the United States .
Tamsyn Leevey ( born 24 January 1978 , in Taumarunui , New Zealand ) is a professional squash player from New Zealand .
The 1975 Five Nations Championship was the forty - sixth series of the rugby union Five Nations Championship .
Leonard Hamilton ( born August 4 , 1948 ) is an American basketball coach and the current men 's basketball head coach at Florida State University .
Supporters ' groups or supporters ' clubs are independent fan clubs or campaign groups in football , mostly association football .
Ryan Blackadder ( born 11 October 1983 ) is a Scottish association football player who currently plays for Glenrothes FC .
Vuelta Ciclista Por Un Chile Lider was an elite men 's professional road bicycle racing stage race held annually in Chile .
Elliott Liu ( born November 25 , 1989 in Boston , Massachusetts , United States ) is an American chess player from San Diego , California .
Charles Elliot Allen ( October 14 , 1880 -- January 15 , 1966 ) was an Irish rugby union forward .
The 2007 Pavel Roman Memorial was the Pavel Roman Memorial competition for the 2007 - -2008 figure skating season .
The 2009 Baseball World Cup was an international baseball tournament that started on 9 September 2009 .
The 2006 NBA Europe Live Tour was an international basketball exhibition and competition produced jointly by the National Basketball Association and the Euroleague , as part of the NBA Global Games .
Derek Campbell ( born April 14 , 1980 in Nepean , Ontario ) is a Canadian professional ice hockey player , currently a free agent .
The 2007 Croatia Open Umag was the 18th edition of the Croatia Open Umag tennis tournament .
The 2010 FIBA Under-17 World Championship for Women was an international basketball competition , held in Toulouse and Rodez , France from July 16 - -25 , 2010 .
The European Mixed Curling Championship was a mixed curling tournament held annually in the autumn for European nations .
María Josefina Sruoga ( 23 August 1990 ) is an Argentine field hockey player .
The Grinnell System , sometimes referred to as The System , is a fast - tempo style of basketball developed by coach Dave Arseneault at Grinnell College in Grinnell , Iowa , USA .
Ognjen Kuzmić ( Serbian Cyrillic : Огњен Кузмић , IPA : ( ǒɡɲen kûzmit͡ɕ ) ; born May 16 , 1990 ) is a Serbian professional basketball player who plays for Panathinaikos of the Greek Basket League .
Bernard Hopkins vs. Chad Dawson was a boxing match contested for both the WBC and The Ring light heavyweight championships .
Lindsay Hairston ( born December 8 , 1951 in Detroit , Michigan ) is a retired professional basketball player who spent one season in the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) as a member of the Detroit Pistons during the 1975 - -76 season .
The 2007 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship Division B was the third edition of the Division B of the FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship , the second tier level of European basketball .
The CVS Health Charity Classic is a professional golf tournament .
Peter Draisaitl ( born December 7 , 1965 ) is a Czech - born German former professional ice hockey centre and Olympian .
Eddie Donovan ( June 2 , 1922 , Elizabeth , New Jersey -- January 20 , 2001 ) was a professional basketball coach and executive .
Dayán Viciedo Pérez ( born March 10 , 1989 ) is a Cuban professional baseball outfielder for the Chunichi Dragons of the Nippon Professional Baseball League ( NPB ) .
The 2003 Shanghai Open was a tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts in Shanghai in the People 's Republic of China and was part of the International Series of the 2003 ATP Tour .
The 2011 Rugby World Cup was the seventh Rugby World Cup , a quadrennial international rugby union competition inaugurated in 1987 .
The 1957 Bandy World Championship was contested between three men 's bandy playing nations and was the first ever Bandy World Championship .
The Lethbridge Broncos were a junior ice hockey team in the Western Hockey League from 1974 until 1986 .
Anton Burdasov ( born May 9 , 1991 in Chelyabinsk ) is a Russian professional ice hockey forward .
The CONCACAF Giants Cup was an international association football club competition held in 2001 to replace CONCACAF Cup Winners Cup .
Clarisse Machanguana ( born 4 October 1976 ) is a professional women 's basketball player from Mozambique .
The Kozły Poznań ( English : Goats Poznań ) are an American football team based in Poznań , Poland , which currently competes in the Topliga , the top division of Polish American Football League .
The NWA World Middleweight Championship was a professional wrestling championship in the National Wrestling Alliance ( NWA ) between 1939 and 2010 .
Ellen Kiessling ( born 17 February 1968 ) is a German former track and field athlete who was a middle - distance specialist .
Chevakata Vologda ( Russian : Вологда-Чеваката ) is a Russian women 's basketball club from Vologda playing in the Russian Premier League .
Rory Kockott ( born 25 June 1986 in East London , South Africa ) is a South African - born French international rugby union player , who attended Selborne College .
Simone Greiner - Petter - Memm ( born September 15 , 1967 in Jena , as Simone Greiner - Petter ) is a German cross country skier and biathlete who competed from 1987 to 1997 in cross country skiing and from 1992 to 2000 in biathlon .
The 2012 Asian Beach Volleyball Championship was a beach volleyball event , that was held from November 7 to 10 , 2013 in Wuhan , China .
The 2013 San Marino CEPU Open was a professional tennis tournament plays on clay courts .
Bijapur Bulls is franchise cricket team representing Gulbarga zone , Karnataka in the Karnataka Premier League ( KPL ) .
Adolfo Cambiaso ( born April 15 , 1975 in Cañuelas , Buenos Aires Province ) is an Argentine polo player with a 10-goal handicap .
Lorne Smith ( 1928 - -2002 ) was an ice hockey player and later a coach who played defence .
Angela Marino ( born 3 February 1986 ) is a New Zealand professional women 's basketball player currently playing for the Adelaide Lightning in the Women 's National Basketball League .
Hong - Chih Kuo ( Chinese : 郭泓志 ; pinyin : Guō Hóngzhì ; Wade -- Giles : Kuo1 Hung2 Chih4 ; born July 23 , 1981 in Tainan , Taiwan ) is a Taiwanese professional baseball pitcher .
Philippe Cavoret ( born January 11 , 1968 in Aix - les - Bains , Savoie ) is a French skeleton racer who competed from 1992 to 2006 .
Oliver Golding ( born 29 September 1993 ) is an English tennis player and former child actor .
The South Queensland Crushers were an Australian rugby league football club based in Brisbane , Queensland .
Grażyna Szmacińska ( born 29 January 1953 ) is a Polish chess player who six times won the Polish Women 's Chess Championship .
Craig Callahan ( born May 26 , 1981 ) is an American - born naturalized Italian professional basketball player who currently plays for Pallacanestro Varese of the Lega Basket Serie A.
The 2013 Philippine Collegiate Championship was the sixth edition of the Philippine Collegiate Champions League ( PCCL ) , the postseason tournament to determine the national collegiate champions in basketball organized by the Samahang Basketbol ng Pilipinas ( SBP ) , the national basketball federation .
The TCL Classic was a men 's professional golf tournament which was played on a course designed by American Robert Trent Jones , Jr. at Yalong Bay Golf Club in Sanya on Hainan Island , People 's Republic of China four times between 2002 and 2007 .
The 2004 Dutch Figure Skating Championships were the Dutch Figure Skating Championships of the 2004 - 2005 figure skating season .
The Apertura 2014 Copa MX Final was the final of the Apertura 2014 Copa MX , the fifth edition of the Copa MX under its current format and 72nd overall organized by the Mexican Football Federation , the governing body of association football in Mexico .
The 1989 Grand Prix de Tennis de Toulouse was a men 's tennis tournament played on Indoor Carpet in Toulouse , France that was part of the Regular Series of the 1989 Grand Prix tennis circuit .
Hillclimbing ( also known as hill climbing , speed hillclimbing or speed hill climbing ) is a branch of motorsport in which drivers compete against the clock to complete an uphill course .
Hans Moldenhauer ( born 10 April 1901 - 29 December 1929 ) was Germany 's first major international tennis player , competing in Wimbledon , the Davis Cup and the French Open , and repeatedly winning the German national Championships both as a single player and in mixed doubles .
The Guarujá Open was a men 's tennis tournament held in Guarujá , Brazil .
Souths Rugby Club , or Souths is an Australian rugby union club based in Brisbane that currently plays in the Queensland Premier Rugby club competition .
Ronald Petrovický ( born February 15 , 1977 in Žilina , Czechoslovakia ) is a Slovak ice hockey right wing formerly playing for Kontinental Hockey League ( KHL ) team Dinamo Riga .
The British and Irish Cup is an annual rugby union competition for second tier , semi - professional clubs and the reserves or developing teams from professional clubs from Britain and Ireland .
The 2007 Danish Figure Skating Championships ( Danish : Danmarks Mesterskaberne 2007 ) were the Danish Figure Skating Championships of the 2006 - 2007 figure skating season .
Panagiotis Gionis ( born January 7 , 1980 ) is a Greek table tennis player and a dentist .
Barbara Potter ( born October 22 , 1961 ) is a former tennis player from the United States , who competed professionally on the Sony Ericsson WTA Tour , winning six singles titles and nineteen doubles titles .
Woodville Football Club was an Australian rules football club that competed in the South Australian National Football League ( SANFL ) from 1964 to 1990 , when it merged with the West Torrens Football Club to form the Woodville - West Torrens Eagles .
Havant Hockey Club is a field hockey club based in Havant , Hampshire , England .
Julien Ingrassia made his debut in rallying in 2002 at the Critérium des Cévennes .
Carlos Ignacio Fernández Lobbe ( born 20 November 1974 in Buenos Aires ) is a retired Argentine rugby union footballer .

Marko Tuulola ( born February 7 , 1971 in Hämeenlinna , Finland ) is a Finnish professional ice hockey defenceman .
The 1924 Australasian Championships was a tennis tournament that took place on outdoor Grass courts at the Warehouseman 's Cricket Ground in Melbourne , Australia from 19 January to 26 January .
Alex Kemp was a Scottish association football Full back who played professionally in Canada and the United States .
Robert Lindstedt ( born 19 March 1977 ) is a Swedish professional tennis player , who turned pro in 1998 , and is a doubles specialist .

Nélson Baptista Júnior , usually known as Nelsinho Baptista ( born July 22 , 1950 ) , is a former association football right back and is currently a manager .

The Dutch Basketball League ( DBL ) , formerly the Eredivisie , is the highest professional basketball league in the Netherlands .

The 2011 European Junior Baseball Championship was an under-18 international baseball competition held in Gijón , Spain from July 4 to July 10 , 2011 .
Amir Hosseini ( Persian : امیر حسینی‎‎ , born 23 July 1975 in Mashhad ) is a retired Iranian volleyball player who played as a setter for the Iranian national team .
Mirna Jukić ( born 9 April 1986 ) is a retired Austrian swimmer of Croatian origin who won a bronze medal in both short course and long course at the world championships in swimming .
Mack Tuck ( born February 21 , 1975 ) is a retired American basketball player and current coach born in Mineola , Texas .
Sándor Takács ( 10 February 1893 -- 22 April 1932 ) was a Hungarian chess master , born Károly Sydlauer in Miskolc , Hungary .
The 1995 Tokyo Indoor also known as `` Seiko Super Tennis '' was a tennis tournament played on Indoor Carpet Courts in Tokyo in Japan that was part of the IBM 1995 ATP Tour and was an ATP Championship Series event , today known as the ATP World Tour 500 series .
The 2008 NBA All - Star Game was an exhibition basketball game played on February 17 , 2008 at the New Orleans Arena in New Orleans , Louisiana , home of the New Orleans Hornets .
Garrett Stafford ( born January 28 , 1980 ) is an American professional ice hockey defenseman , currently an unrestricted free agent .

The 2000 Kremlin Cup was a tennis tournament played on indoor carpet courts at the Olympic Stadium in Moscow in Russia that was part of the International Series of the 2000 ATP Tour and of Tier I of the 2000 WTA Tour .
Robbie Weingard ( born May 15 , 1963 ) is an American former basketball player known for his college career at Hofstra University .

The Finnish Hockey Hall of Fame is part of the Vapriikki Museum Centre in Tampere , Finland and was created in 1979 to honor those individuals who have contributed to Finnish ice hockey .

Wyant Group Raceway ( formerly Auto Clearing Motor Speedway ) is a paved oval auto racing facility located in Saskatoon , Saskatchewan , Canada .
The All Japan Ice hockey Championship ( 全日本アイスホッケー選手権大会 ) is an annual ice hockey tournament for Japanese teams , that began in 1930 , making the tournament one of the oldest sporting competitions in the country .

Peter Doohan ( born 2 May 1961 ) is a former tennis player from Australia , who won one singles title ( 1984 , Adelaide ) and five doubles titles during his career .
Winston Frederick Churchill Guest ( May 20 , 1906 -- October 25 , 1982 ) , was an Anglo - American polo champion and a member of the Guest family of Britain .

The 2014 Arab Cup U-17 was the third edition of the Arab Cup U-17 , an association football tournament between Arabic countries .

The 2011 LPGA Tour was a series of weekly golf tournaments for elite female golfers from around the world that began in Thailand on February 17 , 2011 and had its last official event end on November 20 , 2011 in Florida .

Club Curupaytí is an Argentine rugby union club .
Miles Zaharko ( born April 30 , 1957 in Mannville , Alberta ) is a Canadian professional ice hockey player whose career extended from 1977 to 1984 .
T. J. Frier ( born August 17 , 1977 ) is a former American football defensive tackle who played one season with the Los Angeles Avengers of the Arena Football League .
The 2010 Tuvalu A - Division was the tenth season of association football competition .
Daniel Babka ( born March 30 , 1972 ) is a Slovak professional ice hockey defenceman who played with HC Slovan Bratislava in the Slovak Extraliga .
The Amsterdam Marathon ( branded TCS Amsterdam Marathon for sponsorship reasons ) is an annual marathon ( 42.195 km ) in Amsterdam in the Netherlands since 1975 .
Denagamage Praboth Mahela de Silva Jayawardene ( Sinhalese : මහේල ජයවර්ධන ; born 27 May 1977 ) , known as Mahela Jayawardene , is a former Sri Lankan cricketer and captain of the Sri Lankan cricket team .
The Deutsche Bank Players Championship of Europe was an annual 72-hole stroke play professional golf tournament for men .
The São Tomé and Príncipe national football team is the national association football team of São Tomé and Príncipe and is controlled by the Federação Santomense de Futebol .
The Fort Worth Cats were a professional baseball team based in Fort Worth , Texas , in the United States .
The 1998 Men 's Hockey Champions Trophy was the 20th edition of the Hockey Champions Trophy men 's field hockey tournament .
Ronalda Pierce ( February 23 , 1985 -- June 8 , 2004 ) was a Florida State University basketball player who died of an aneurysm .
Dave Schellhase ( born October 14 , 1944 ) is a retired American collegiate basketball coach and former basketball player in the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) .
Denis Legersky ( born March 25 , 1987 in Liptovský Mikuláš , Czechoslovakia ) is a Slovak ice hockey player and coach .
The 1990 Hopman Cup was the second edition to the Hopman Cup tennis event located at the Burswood Entertainment Complex in Perth , Australia .
Jan Leschly ( born 11 September 1940 ) is a Danish businessman and former professional tennis player .
The Deutsche Wertungszahl ( abbreviation : DWZ , ger . German Evaluation Number ) is an evaluation number in chess to compare the playing performance of individual players .
The Oceania Cup is an international men 's and women 's field hockey competition organised by Oceania Hockey Federation ( OHF ) .
Isaiah Whitehead ( born March 8 , 1995 ) is an American college basketball player who currently plays for the Seton Hall Pirates men 's basketball team .
OK Budvanska Rivijera Budva , is a professional volleyball team based in Budva , Montenegro .
Stavros Toutziarakis ( in Greek : Σταύρος Τουτζιαράκης ; born November 5 , 1987 ) is a Greek professional basketball player .
Woolwich Cricket Club was an English cricket club based in the town of Woolwich , Kent .
Kamran Akmal is a quick - scoring batsman and a wicket - keeper , who has achieved 6 centuries in Test cricket .
Alexei Koznev ( born October 3 , 1975 ) is a Russian professional ice hockey Forward who currently plays for Vityaz Chekhov of the Kontinental Hockey League ( KHL ) .
Stelios Ioannou ( Greek : Στέλιος Ιωάννου ; born July 28 , 1987 in Athens , Greece ) is a Greek professional basketball player .
Liudmila Belavenets ( or Lyudmila Belavenets , Russian : Людмила Сергеевна Белавенец ; born June 7 , 1940 , in Moscow ) is a Russian woman International Correspondence Chess Grandmaster , the fourth ICCF Women 's World Champion in correspondence chess ( 1984 - -1992 ) .
Currently Bulldog Stadium ranks 110th on the List of American football stadiums by capacity .
Danielle Goyette ( born January 30 , 1966 in St - Nazaire , Quebec ) is a retired women 's ice hockey player , and has been on the Canadian national team .
The 2013 WNBA All - Star Game was an exhibition basketball game that was played on July 27 , 2013 at the Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville , CT , the current home of the Connecticut Sun . This was the 11th edition of the WNBA All - Star Game , and was played during the 2013 WNBA season .
The Wrocław Open ( formerly known as KGHM Dialog Polish Indoors ) is a professional tennis tournament played on indoor hard courts .
Rafael Guijosa Castillo ( born 31 January 1969 in Alcalá de Henares ) is a former Spanish handball player , and current manager of Iran national handball team .
José Biriukov ( born 3 February 1963 ) is a retired Spanish and Soviet professional basketball player .
Melville Cole Armstrong ( born August 24 , 1983 in Surrey , British Columbia ) is a former professional baseball catcher , who has played in international competition with the Canada national baseball team .
The 1995 St. Petersburg Open was a tennis tournament played on indoor carpet courts in St. Petersburg , Russia at the Petersburg Sports and Concert Complex .
FC Zelenograd ( Russian : Футбольный клуб `` Зеленоград '' ) is an association football club from Zelenograd , Moscow .
The Richmond Virginians was the name of a minor league baseball Class AAA International League franchise that played in Richmond , Virginia , from 1954 through 1964 .
The Milton Keynes Lightning are a semi - professional ice hockey team from Milton Keynes , Buckinghamshire , currently playing in the EPIHL .
2011 Guam Men 's Soccer League , officially named Budweiser Guam Men 's Soccer League due to sponsorship reason , is the association football league of Guam .
Dorji Dema ( born October 16 , 1983 ) is an athlete from Bhutan who competes in archery .
The 2008 ICC World Cricket League Africa Region Division Three was a cricket tournament in South Africa , taking place between 13 and 18 April 2008 .
Sava Ranđelović ( Serbian Cyrillic : Сава Ранђеловић ; born 17 July 1993 ) is a Serbian water polo player , who won an European Championship gold medal with Serbia in 2014 , in Budapest , Hungary .
The Epson Grand Prix of Europe was a European Tour golf tournament which was held annually from 1986 to 1991 at St. Pierre Golf & Country Club in Chepstow , South Wales .
Terrill Byrd is an American football defensive tackle who is currently a free agent .
The 2003 Spanish Figure Skating Championships ( Spanish : Campeonato De España De Patinaje Sobre Hielo 2002 - 03 ) were the Spanish Figure Skating Championships of the 2002 - 2003 figure skating season .
Sydney Johnson ( born April 26 , 1974 ) is an American college basketball coach and the current head coach at Fairfield University for the Fairfield Stags men 's basketball team .
The Mexican Pacific League ( Spanish : Liga Mexicana del Pacífico or LMP ) is a winter baseball league in Mexico .
Styliani Kaltsidou ( Στυλιανή Καλτσίδου , born January 12 , 1983 ) , or Stella Kaltsidou ( Στέλλα Καλτσίδου ) , is a Greek professional basketball player .
VKP Bratislava is Slovak volleyball team based in Bratislava founded in 1946 .
SC Eisenstadt ( Croatian : NK Željezno ) was an Austrian association football club based in Eisenstadt .
Luke Stauffacher ( born December 17 , 1980 in Madison , Wisconsin ) is an American professional ice hockey player , currently playing for the Odessa Jackalopes of the Central Hockey League .
The Chatham Cup , currently known as the ASB Chatham Cup for sponsorship purposes , is New Zealand 's premier knockout tournament in men 's association football .
Viktor Pankrashkin ( Russian : Виктор Александрович Панкрашкин ; 10 December 1957 - 24 July 1993 ) was a Soviet basketball player .
Yaquelín Plutín Tizón ( born July 9 , 1979 in Majagua , Ciego de Ávila ) is a women 's basketball player from Cuba .
Randall Hough ( born 1946 ) is a chess expert , and a former member of the Executive Board of the United States Chess Federation .
Simon Line ( born 1 November 1971 ) is an English association football manager who was in charge of Hednesford Town and Market Drayton Town .
Nyon Rugby Club is a Swiss rugby union football club based in Nyon , situated on the shores of lake Geneva between Geneva and Lausanne .
Tomáš Berdych ( Czech pronunciation : ( ˈtomaːʃ ˈbɛrdɪx ) ; born September 17 , 1985 ) is a Czech professional tennis player .
Daniel Revenu is the son of French fencing coach Ernest Revenu , from Melun .
Tommy Earl ( born June 10 , 1947 in Niagara Falls , Ontario ) is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey player who played 347 games in the World Hockey Association .
Petr Kalus ( born June 29 , 1987 in Ostrava , Czechoslovakia ) is a Czech professional ice hockey player currently wanted back with Nottingham Panthers .
George Dickson ( born September 27 , 1923 in Boston , Massachusetts ) is a retired American football player and coach was the head coach of the Hamilton Tiger - Cats of the Canadian Football League for the first two games of the 1976 season .
Wheelchair rugby is played indoors on a hardwood court , and physical contact between wheelchairs is an integral part of the game - with the rules including elements from wheelchair basketball , ice hockey , handball and rugby union .
The Jamaica Athletics Administrative Association ( JAAA ) is the national governing body for the sport of athletics ( including track and field , long - distance running and racewalking ) in Jamaica .
The FC Oberlausitz Neugersdorf is a German association football club from the town of Neugersdorf in the Upper Lusatia ( German : Oberlausitz ) region of Saxony .
The Quebec Caribou are a rugby union club based in Montreal , Quebec , Canada .
Lelo Saracens ( or formally Rugby Club Lelo Tbilisi ) is a Georgian semi - professional rugby union club from Tbilisi , who plays in the Georgia Championship , the first division of Georgian rugby .
William Lance Berkman ( born February 10 , 1976 ) , nicknamed `` Big Puma '' , is a former American professional baseball outfielder and first baseman .
The 1877 Wimbledon Championship was a men 's tennis tournament held at the All England Croquet and Lawn Tennis Club ( AEC & LTC ) in Wimbledon , London .
The 2011 Rally Sweden was the opening round of 2011 World Rally Championship season .
The 2007 Women 's South American Volleyball Championship was the 27th edition of the South American Volleyball Championship , organised by South America 's governing volleyball body , the Confederación Sudamericana de Voleibol ( CSV ) .
Leadgate Park F.C. was an English association football club based in the village of Leadgate , County Durham .

Patrik Ćavar ( born 24 March 1971 in Metković ) is a retired Croatian handball player .

BC Krasny Oktyabr is a Russian professional basketball club based in Volgograd , that plays in the VTB United League .
The 1988 Virginia Slims of Houston was a tennis tournament played on outdoor clay courts at the Westside Tennis Club in Houston , Texas in the United States and was part of Tier III of the 1988 WTA Tour .
The 1971 Memorial Cup was the 53rd annual Memorial Cup competition , organized by the Canadian Amateur Hockey Association ( CAHA ) to determine the champion of major junior A ice hockey .
The 2008 MAAC Men 's Basketball Tournament was an NCAA college basketball tournament held at the Times Union Center in Albany , New York on March 7 - -10 , 2007 , to decide the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference champion .
Dick Roberge ( born April 7 , 1934 ) is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey forward and coach .

Serdar Apaydın ( born 21 October 1966 in Turkey ) is a retired Turkish professional basketball player and former assistant coach of Fenerbahçe Ülker .
Dominique Daquin ( born November 10 , 1972 in Martinique ) is a French volleyball player , who won the bronze medal with the France men 's national volleyball team at the 2002 World Championship .
Cortez Hankton ( born January 20 , 1981 ) is a former American football wide receiver who is currently an assistant coach at Vanderbilt University .
Lukas Klapfer ( born 25 December 1985 ) is an Austrian Nordic combined skier who has been competing since 2002 .
Yuri Schukin ( Russian : Ю́рий Ива́нович Щу́кин , born 26 June 1979 ) is a Russian - born Kazakhstani tennis player .

Simone Parodi ( born 16 June 1986 ) is an Italian volleyball player , a member of Italy men 's national volleyball team and Italian club Cucine Lube Civitanova , a bronze medalist of the Olympic Games London 2012 , FIVB World League ( 2013 , 2014 ) and silver medalist of European Championship 2013 .
The South Adelaide Football Club is an Australian rules football club that competes in the South Australian National Football League ( SANFL ) .
Finnmarksløpet is the world 's northernmost sled dog race .
The CCNY point shaving scandal of 1950 - -51 was a college basketball point shaving gambling scandal that involved seven schools in all , with four in Greater New York and three in the Midwest .
Colombo Hockey and Football Club ( also known as CH & FC ) is a Division ' A ' rugby union team based in Colombo , Sri Lanka that competes in the Dialog Rugby League in Sri Lanka .
Jason Elliott ( born 10 November 1975 in Inuvik , Northwest Territories ) , is a retired Canadian ice hockey player .
The 2014 FIBA Under-17 World Championship for Women was an international basketball competition held in Klatovy and Plzeň , Czech Republic , from 28 June to 6 July 2014 .
The 1922 Australasian Championships was a tennis tournament that took place on outdoor Grass courts at the White City Tennis Club , Sydney , Australia from 2 December to 9 December .
Davide Bresadola ( born 10 September 1988 ) is an Italian Nordic combined athlete .
Top Girls Fassa Bortolo ( UCI team code : MIC ) is a professional cycling team based in Italy , which competes in elite road bicycle racing events such as the UCI Women 's Road World Cup and elite road races .
Helgi Ólafsson ( born 15 August 1956 ) is an Icelandic chess grandmaster who won the Icelandic Chess Championship six times and , as of 2009 , holds an Elo rating of 2522 .

John Fergus Slattery ( born 12 February 1949 in Dún Laoghaire , Ireland ) is a former rugby union player who represented Ireland .
Amos Burn ( 1848 - -1925 ) was an English chess player , one of the world 's leading players at the end of the 19th century , and a chess writer .

The ACW Heavyweight Championship was the top professional wrestling championship title in the American independent promotion Assault Championship Wrestling .
Wins Above Replacement or Wins Above Replacement Player , commonly abbreviated to WAR or WARP , is a non - standardized sabermetric baseball statistic developed to sum up `` a player 's total contributions to his team '' .
The Louisville Slugger Museum & Factory , a museum located in Louisville , Kentucky 's `` Museum Row '' in the West Main District of downtown , showcases the history of the Louisville Slugger brand of baseball bats made by Hillerich & Bradsby , and of baseball in general .

Sydney University Football Club , founded in 1863 ( this date was disputed by historian Tom Hickie who argues that it was 1865 ) , is the oldest club now playing rugby union in Australia .
The Western Professional Hockey League ( abbreviated WPHL ) is a defunct minor professional ice hockey league .

Vugar Gashimov ( Azerbaijani : Vüqar Həşimov ; 24 July 1986 -- 11 January 2014 ) was an Azerbaijani chess grandmaster .

Leo Klein Gebbink ( born 9 January 1968 in Zelhem , Gelderland ) is a former field hockey midfield player from The Netherlands , who represented his native country in two consecutive Summer Olympics ( 1992 and 1996 ) .

Aaron Gorrell ( born 31 March 1981 in Wollongong , New South Wales ) is a former Australian professional rugby league footballer for the Brisbane Broncos of the NRL .

Charles Moehle ( Möhle ) ( 26 November 1859 , New York -- 1898 ) was an American chess master .
Harley Marques Silva ( born 6 July 1974 in Rio de Janeiro ) is a beach volleyball player from Brazil .

Frank Rediker ( Born March 15 , 1985 in Sterling Heights , Michigan ) is a retired American ice hockey player who most recently played for the Stockton Thunder of the ECHL .
The Dundee Hurricanes are an American football team based in Dundee , Scotland .
The 1976 Aryamehr Cup was a men 's professional tennis tournament played on outdoor clay courts in Tehran in Iran .
Tim Swinson ( born 17 February 1987 in London , England ) is a Scottish internationalist rugby union player .
The Belize Premier Football League ( BPFL ) ( Caribbean Motors Cup ) was the premier division of association football in Belize sanctioned by the Football Federation of Belize .

The Soviet Figure Skating Championships were a figure skating national championship held annually to determine the national champions of the Soviet Union .
Steve Gatzos ( born June 22 , 1961 in Toronto , Ontario and raised in Bramalea , Ontario ) is a former professional ice hockey player who played 89 games in the National Hockey League .
Sašo Ožbolt ( born 4 April 1981 ) is a Slovenian retired professional basketball player who played for KK Portorož of the Slovenian League .
Lucas Monteverde , born December 18 , 1976 , is an Argentine professional polo player with a handicap of 9 ( formerly 10 ) .
Ervin Kassai ( 16 March 1925 -- 12 October 2012 ) was a Hungarian basketball referee .
Valeri Nikitin ( born June 20 , 1939 in Moscow , Russia -- died January 13 , 2002 ) was an ice hockey player who played in the Soviet Hockey League and National Hockey League .
Paolo Tofoli ( born August 14 , 1966 in Fermo ) is a former Italian volleyball player and current coach , standing at 188 cm . He played 342 times for the Italy national volleyball team .
Luka Pavićević ( Serbian Cyrillic : Лука Павићевић ; born June 17 , 1968 in Titograd ) is a Montenegrin professional basketball head coach for Chorale Roanne of the LNB Pro A and for the Montenegro national basketball team .
Greg Guy is a retired American professional basketball player most known for being the NCAA Division I scoring champion during the 1992 - -93 season .
Tyson Demos ( born 3 July 1988 ) is an Australian professional basketball player who currently plays for the Illawarra Hawks of the National Basketball League ( NBL ) .
Jean - Emmanuel Cassin is a French rugby footballer who currently plays rugby union for Oyonnax Rugby and represented his country at rugby league in the 2000 World Cup .
Alfonso Solis ( born December 23 , 1962 ) , better known as Al Solis , is a retired Filipino professional basketball player in the Philippine Basketball Association .
The 2010 ICC World Twenty20 was the third ICC World Twenty20 competition , an international Twenty20 cricket tournament that was held in the West Indies between 30 April and 16 May 2010 .
Samalog ( or samalogue in UK spelling ; sometimes sammenlagt in both Norwegian and Danish : `` put together '' , `` total sum '' ) is a scoring system in speed skating .
William Carlisle Towery ( June 20 , 1920 -- November 25 , 2012 ) , nicknamed `` Blackie '' or `` Big Boy '' , was an American basketball player .
Karl Dennis Persson(born June 2 , 1988 ) is a Swedish professional ice hockey defenceman .
Bernt Frilén is a Swedish orienteering competitor , winner of the 1974 Individual World Orienteering Championships .
The Cyprus national football team ( Greek : Εθνική ομάδα ποδοσφαίρου της Κύπρου ) represents Cyprus in association football and is controlled by the Cyprus Football Association , the governing body for football in Cyprus .
Hellé Nice ( born Mariette Hélène Delangle ; 15 December 1900 -- died 1 October 1984 ) was a French model , dancer , and a Grand Prix motor racing driver .
The Montreal Junior Canadiens were a junior ice hockey team in the Quebec Junior Hockey League from 1933 to 1961 , and the Ontario Hockey Association from 1961 to 1972 .
Max Brito ( born 8 April 1971 in Abidjan , Ivory Coast ) is a former rugby union player on the Ivory Coast rugby team .
The OMEGA Heavyweight Championship was the top singles title in the Organization of Modern Extreme Grappling Arts ( OMEGA ) independent professional wrestling promotion .
Aren Davoudi Chegani ( Persian : آرن داوودی چگانی‎‎ ; Armenian : Արեն Դավուդի , born July 12 , 1986 ) is a professional Iranian Armenian basketball player who currently plays for Hamyari Shahrdari of the Iranian Super League and also for the Iranian national basketball team .
Sauro Bufalini ( 28 April 1941 -- 1 April 2012 ) was an Italian basketball player .
Dražen Marović ( born January 14 , 1938 in Split ) is a Croatian ( former Yugoslav ) chess player , trainer , journalist , writer and broadcaster .
The Queen 's Gambit Declined ( or QGD ) is a chess opening in which Black declines a pawn offered by White in the Queen 's Gambit : 1 .
Sophie Milliet ( born 2 November 1983 in Marseille ) is a French chess player and four times national women 's champion ( 2003 , 2008 , 2009 and 2011 ) .
Venugopal Chandrasekhar is a former National table tennis champion and Arjuna Award winner from Tamil Nadu , India .
Jon Welsh ( born 13 October 1986 ) is a Scottish rugby union player currently playing for Newcastle Falcons .
The Tour of Chongming Island , officially the Tour of Chongming Island International Cycling Race is an annual elite women 's road bicycle racing stage race held in Shanghai , China , named after Chongming Island .
The 1993 FIVB Volleyball World League was the fourth edition of the annual men 's volleyball tournament , played by 12 countries from May 21 to July 31 , 1993 .
Rayos de Hermosillo is a basketball club based in Hermosillo , Sonora , Mexico that plays in the Circuito de Baloncesto de la Costa del Pacífico ( CIBACOPA ) .
Dennis Owchar ( born March 28 , 1953 ) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey player who played 288 games in the National Hockey League .
Royal Birkdale Golf Club is a golf course in the town of Southport , England , and is one of the clubs in the Open Championship rotation for both men and women .
Jonathan Janil ( born September 24 , 1987 ) is a French ice hockey defenceman who played for France at the 2011 IIHF World Championship .
The ISU Grand Prix of Figure Skating ( ISU Champions Series from 1995 to 1997 ) is a series of senior international figure skating competitions organized by the International Skating Union .
Christophe Moly ( born 16 July 1982 in France ) is a rugby league player for the Pia Donkeys and previously Carcassonne club in the French Rugby League Championship competition .
Fife Lions ARLFC are a rugby league club located in the east of Scotland .
Jeremy Cota ( born October 24 , 1988 ) is an athlete on the U.S. Ski Team ; he competes in the freestyle skiing events of Moguls and Dual Moguls .
The FIBA Americas Under-18 Championship is the name commonly used to refer to the American basketball championships for players under 18 years that take place every two years among national teams of the continent .
Christian Ramota ( born April 14 , 1973 ) is a former German team handball player ( goalkeeper ) .
Chris Bergeron ( born November 28 , 1970 in Wallaceburg , ONT , Canada ) is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey center who played for various minor league teams for 7 seasons between 1993 and 2000 , with the most stints with the Toledo Storm and Cincinnati Cyclones .
The Mauritius women 's national football team is a women 's association football team that represents the country of Mauritius .
Christian Magleby ( born June 8 , 1977 ) is a Danish former professional association football player , who played as a midfielder .
The NIT Season Tip - Off is an annual college basketball tournament that takes place in November of each year , towards the beginning of the season .
Arlington Stadium was a baseball stadium located in Arlington , Texas , United States , located between Dallas and Fort Worth , Texas .
The 1988 Virginia Slims of Kansas was a tennis tournament played on indoor hard courts at the Kansas Coliseum in Wichita , Kansas in the United States and was part of Tier V of the 1988 WTA Tour .
Sergey Belavenets ( Russian : Серге́й Всеволодович Белавенец ; 8 July 1910 -- 7 March 1942 ) was a Soviet chess master , theoretician , and chess journalist of Belarusian descent .
Candice Holley ( born April 23 , 1981 in Memphis , Tennessee ) is a women 's college basketball athlete that played for The University of Cincinnati and University of Mississippi .
The 2005 Swedish Open , also known by its sponsored name Synsam Swedish Open , was a men 's tennis event played on outdoor clay courts in Båstad , Sweden .
The 99th Grey Cup was a Canadian football game between the East Division champion Winnipeg Blue Bombers and the West Division champion BC Lions to decide the champion of the Canadian Football League in the 2011 season .
Nathan Peavy ( born on March 31 , 1985 ) is a Puerto Rican - American professional basketball player who currently plays for the Atenienses de Manatí of the BSN .
MTV Wolfenbüttel is a German association football and sports club based in Wolfenbüttel , Lower Saxony .
Princess Shi ( 石王后 , personal name unknown ) , who might have taken the title Empress Shi ( 石皇后 ) at one point , was the wife of Lü Guang ( Emperor Yiwu ) , the founder of the Chinese / Di state Later Liang .
Crabro cribrarius , common name Slender Bodied Digger Wasp , is a species of wasps belonging to the family Crabronidae .
Joseph Schmidt ( March 4 , 1904 -- November 16 , 1942 ) was an Austro - Hungarian and Romanian Jewish tenor and actor .
